Summary: Room was clean. Towels were fresh. Room had a nice sized refrigerator and a microwave. Staff was so friendly and accommodating. Plenty of parking, never had an issue finding a spot. I didn‚Äôt use the pool or jacuzzi but I did see other guest enjoying them. Very reasonably priced vending machines. Laundry amenities available (coin operated- one washer and one dryer) Quiet location, felt safe walking around premises. Late night Taco shop down the street, Subway, donut shop, and gas station. I love Best Westerns. Will definitely stay again.

I have stayed here frequently in the last year after moving out of the area.  Good value and conveniently located to Fwy 405, restaurants, shopping and beaches. The facilities are a bit dated but kept clean and neat.  Staff is always friendly and efficient.

Summary Heading: Hotel is in need of work
Summary: The shower loses hot water randomly and suddenly when another source also uses hot water (e.g., a person in a nearby room), making for a very unpleasant shower. The mini-fridge in the kitchen was rattling all night. The door would not unlock unless you very forcefully pulled on it after closing it -- you can hear the latch engage after closing it, but you need to tug on it hard after that point if you want the key card to successfully unlock it later when you return. Overall, a hotel that is in need of a lot of work. The breakfast was very mediocre -- but it's free, so I really can't count that in my review. If you want anything remotely wholesome though, you'll need to go elsewhere. It was basically dirt-cheap cereal, microwaveable Eggo-style waffles, and small plastic utensils.
Manager Response: Hello, Thank you for your feedback, we are sorry to hear about your room's condition after your departure.  Please be assured your feedback has been shared with our housekeeping manager. We wish the opportunity was given to us, during your stay to resolve this.  We still hope that you will give us another opportunity to serve you again.

Manager Response: Hello,  Thank you for your feedback, i would like to inform you customer satisfaction is our top priority. Summary Heading: Basic Clean Hotel Room And Nice Staff

Plus, along the way there are a ton of places to eat or get groceries including Trader Joe's or Whole Foods.  Go the other way on Westminster and there's Albertsons or Aldi plus a ton of fast food -- and yes, an In-And-Out Burger.  As for the facility itself, it's a basic stay hotel with a few amenities. Manager Response: Hello,  Thank you for your feedback, please assured that your feedback has been shared to the concerned department. We are happy to know you enjoyed your stay with us overall.  We are looking forward to welcome you again on your next visit to Westminster.  Regards, BW Management

In addition, the floor carpeting in front of the refrigerator was all wet. There was a toggle switch on the wall opposite, that read ‚Äúrefrigerator‚Äù. So my guess is the toggle switch got turned off at some point in the refrigerator defrosted and leaked. Why it was allowed to operate dependent upon a toggle switch I have no idea.

Summary: My mother passed away and we had to come to California to make her final arrangements.  We always stay at Best Western because they are normally pretty clean and decent. I read several of the reviews for this specific hotel and thought it would be a good choice for our family...however, I have discovered the people that left good reviews are delusional! I asked for a handicapped accessible room because I am disabled. I got the room but no place to park. The 2 handicapped spots were taken by cars that didn't have any handicapped placards or license plates. Ok fine, whatever...I told the office and they didn't really care. Got to the room, room was dark, dingy and smelled. I couldn't get my money back because when you book a room on the bestwestern.com website, it is
Manager Response: Hello,   Thank you for your feedback, our condolences on the passing of your mother. As you can see from the other reviews, we have been getting praised by all our guests for providing exceptional customer service and a comfortable stay, and your review indeed came as a surprise for us.  I would like to inform you, the guest with a car in question was notified to remove the vehicle once we were told by you that there is an unauthorized car parked on the accessible parking spots. My understanding is that our staff was able to find you a parking spot close to your room.  We take pride in informing you that our hotel was awarded by TripAdvisor and other 3rd part travel websites for being the cleanest property. As part of our daily quality cleaning routine, our dedicated housekeeping supervisor inspects the room before renting them. After reading your reviews, i can tell we did miss few check-marks, and please be assured your feedback has been shared with our concerned department. All our room has Simmons beauty rest mattresses, which is one of the top-notch mattresses available in the market with 5-star rating. However, we do understand some things are not for everyone.  Our hotel understands the importance of quality sleep and, based on the same reasoning, and we have double panel noise cancellation windows installed in all our rooms.  I have to disagree with your comments regarding water being bad, orange county is one of the only states which has a dedicated groundwater replenishment system, which provides clean water throughout the county; however, we do offer complimentary water bottles for each room, and extra water can also be availed at the front-desk 24X7.  We would have resolved all your concerns only if the opportunity was given during your stay.  I'm sorry that our hotel did not meet your standards; however, I do hope that you provide another Best Western opportunity for your future stays.  Regards, BW Management

Summary Heading: Great Place to stay for a quiet and comfortable. experience
Summary: I have stayed at this location for weeks at a time and found the place to be well kept, a friendly staff and  most of all a relaxing experience. Management has kept this location safe and clean. despite the covid 19 pandemic. Rooms are sanitized daily unless someone is a weekly resident then those rooms are cleaned and sanitized every 7 days. The staff is reasonable , friendly and engaging. Price is reasonable and even more so if you are rewards member.
Manager Response: Hello,  Thank you for your feedback, reading feedback like yours is such a treat for our eyes, when we get to see, we are delivering the kind of service, we wish to deliver.  Here at BW Westminster Inn providing comfortable and secure stay is our top notch priority and we are taking all the precautions to stop the spread of Covid-19 and keep our valuable guests safe.   I will go ahead and pass your kind word to our team and we are looking forward to serve you again, when travel brings you back to Westminster again.  Regards, BW Management

Summary: I enjoyed my stay at the Best Western Westminster Inn it was very clean the grab-and-go breakfast was great and I loved how they decorated for the holidays thank you Best Western Westminster Inn enjoyed how friendly the housekeeping was thank you and happy holidays
Manager Response: Hello,  Thank you for your feedback, we are happy to know you enjoyed your stay with us and we are looking forward to serve you again .  Also, Westminster Inn loves you back.  Regards, BW Management

Summary: the staff at Westminster best western inn f are amazing so helpful and personable ...my daughter loves it here at best western westminster inn ....clean and comfortable ... we feel safe here at the best western westminster inn .its totally worth the price and rewards program is amazing ....
Manager Response: Hello,  Thank you for your feedback, we are happy to know you enjoyed your stay with us and we are looking forward to serve you again .  Also, Westminster Inn loves you back.  Regards, BW Management

Summary: The hotel is fine and fairly priced except the internet is awful. I had to check out and change hotels the next day. It's a good price for a Best Western in Orange County. The building isn't as nice as some of their other ones in the area but there's no point in staying here until they fix their internet issues.
Manager Response: the hotel internet is top notch.   We constantly upgrade and indeed have our experts there to assure all  ports are fully functional and operating optimally. The last upgrade was the first week of December and internet could have been disruptive for  a few hours only. I hope you give us another chance to stay here,  you will be fully satisfied with the internet.

Summary: I love staying here because i know the staff and they take care of me when im here. So they are #1 for me ive never experienced bad service always quick to any solution thanks best western. I will always come back
Manager Response: Hello,  Thank you for your feedback, providing fast yet personable service is one of our top notch priority.  I am glad to know our front-desk was able to take care of all your needs.  We are looking forward to serve you again.  Regards, BW Management

Summary: The staff is amazing at this location from mamnagment to house keeping they all rock ...my daughter won't stay anywhere else ...thanks for making our stay to nice the pool is always clean and we feel safe here
Manager Response: Hello,  Thank you for your feedback, we are happy to know you enjoyed your stay with us and we are looking forward to serve you again .  Also, Westminster Inn loves you back.  Regards, BW Management

Summary: I‚Äôve been a loyal customer to this best western for a few years now. Recently had a family reunion in Orange County and I recommended this hotel to all my friends and family. Most of us decided to stay here because of the warm environment this hotel had to offer. Very family friendly and all staff display an image of hospitality. Shannon at the front desk was also very helpful and patient with my big family during our WHOLE STAY. We frequently had to ask for extra towels, pots and pans, etc, and she couldn‚Äôt have been anymore helpful and patient. Great people here.
Manager Response: Hello,  Thank you for your feedback and continues business with our brand, we are delighted to know you enjoyed your stay with us and our front desk was able to help you with all your needs.  We are looking forward to serve you again, on your next visit to long beach.  Regards, BW Management

Summary: I often travel to California due to work, used to stay at typically high end hotels, but since my first stay at this Best Western Inn, I've been pretty loyal to the franchise. Nice staff, clean rooms, accessible washer and dryer, ice machine, and pots and pans made available when asked. Overall a great affordable hotel.
Manager Response: Hello,  Thank you for your feedback, it's  such a treat for our eyes, when we get to know, we are delivering the kind of service, we wish to deliver, after reading feedback like yours .   You have been a great guest to us and we appreciate your business with our brand. We are looking forward to serve you again, when travel brings you back to Westminster.  Regards, BW Management

Summary: Came to SoCal for a business trip earlier this week, stayed at this hotel, was very impressed. Though this may be an older hotel, you will not be dissapointed by their many helpful services. Washer and dryer was a huge plus. Will be staying here again.

I come here reguarly to relax on my days off from the work place. Great staff, nice area, kid friendly, and affordable. They also offer ping pong, mini golf, and an accesible pool area at a appropriate times. Love Shannon at the front desk by the way.

All the perks of a great motel. Polite staff, safe environment, clean rooms, and for a bargain price. Last minute trip to California with husband and the kiddos, trip could‚Äôve definitely been a lot more stressful, but the best western staff was very helpful, quick, and relaxing. Definitely will be coming back here.

Summary Heading: Room is spotless and check in is EASY.
Summary: When I went to Best western Westminster INN I got greeted by the front desk who was very courteous, they informed me on the basic needs on checking in and got me in my room in under 10 minutes. After checking in for a few days they did inform me that our rooms would not be serviced daily due to COVID so we asked the cleaning ladies to bring some towels and other needs in which they did immediately and were so kind about what I wanted. The room was spotless and so cozy, they gave me everything I needed and went above and beyond! Will definitely return with my whole family next time Thank you!

For starters, I was given a different room then what I paid for. When I called to inform Concierge, I was informed that the hotel was sold out that evening even though I had booked my hotel stay three weeks in advance. I was informed by Shannon there was nothing she could do or would do. She informed me that she was the manager so I informed her that I would like to speak with the owner. She informed me that the owner Would be in in the morning she also informed me that the owner trusted his employees over the customers and that the owner would not care that I had a complaint with her or the room I was given. I definitely had a complaint with her belligerent and aggressive attitude! When I called In the morning to speak with the owner, different  staff member came on the phone
Manager Response: Its true that corvid has been difficult for everyone, We shut down for two months and opened safely for all. We do try to satisfy all our guests and I personally apologize that we were not able to satisfy you.  You were given an upstairs suite and not a downstairs suite. while we try to accommodate, we do not guarantee upstairs or downstairs.  As an owner and professor at the university I know that trusting employees to handle issue are important. On rare occasions, we cannot satisfy someone and since this was the case for you, we will be giving the discounted money received from you to the local Boys and Girls club. In addition we will be contributing the regular staff lunch money also to the same cause.  On behalf of everyone at Westminster inn we wish you the best. Sincerely Syed Shah owner

Summary: My stay at best western has been wonderful and peaceful the staff very friendly. Rooms are clean. Front desk is friendly. Tiara p. Provided exceptional customer service. She made checking in easy. I recommend this hotel for any future people who want to stay here. I will definitely stay again.

Summary Heading: Shannon is the BEST Best Western could EVER have!
Summary: Made the reservation thinking this location was going to suck... But needed a roof, so went for it..   Was completely blown away!! The location is cute, the people are friendly, the coffee is hot and Shannon is absolutely INCREDIBLE!!! Amazing customer service and a fantastic attitude!!!  Thank you Shannon for what you did!!! I cannot express my gratitude enough, Ma'am. ;)

My family and I said here for 1 night to get away. The staff was extremely friendly and efficient. The hotel was from the outside was more of a motel. We walked into a damp feel to the room immediately noticed the 2 queen size beds were sunken in the middle, the sheets smelled strongly of bleach which settled us a bit. The bathroom was clean there were 2 full sized towels, 2 hand towels and one wash cloth. We are a family of 4 so luckily I had packed extra just incase. The AC was great other then the damp feeling it created. The pool area was clean and we enjoyed that as well as the little putting golf area provided. After the pool there isn‚Äôt much else that I‚Äôd say we enjoyed, our neighbors stayed up right outside of our back door until 3am, at times waking our 2 year old. The
Manager Response: Thank you for the good comments.  We apologize on the Dirty carpet and the noise at night and are taking the extra steps as follows: Private Security hired in addition to 24 hours we have at the from desk.  The Security starting immediately comes by 4 times a night to assure no parties or extra noise. Out Large garden, putting green, pool and spa area is enjoyed by most but we will enforce better noise control. While our night person also looks for noise or any party at night, we encourage a call at the front desk for any guest needs Due to corvid 19, we are  spraying the room to be virus free after a checkout, this sometimes makes the carpet look bad. We will retrain all our housekeeping employees to look for any carper issues and shampoo the area before the spray fog. Very sincerely Richard and Syed General manager

Summary: We were very pleased with this place. From the check in to the check out the staff were extremely nice. There were always extra towels and we were able to use the pool using covid safety guidelines.(You were to take turns but it was almost always free.) They even had a BBQ and I cooked steaks and burgers. The price was the lowest in town and the beach was easy access down Bolsa Chica about 10 to 15 mins.

I love this hotel and we have stayed here before in the past.  I would give them an excellent as the staff is very friendly and plesant to deal with my only complaint was the sofa bed in our room was very worn out and not comfortable at all they really need to update these if they are going to advertise that the rooms have sofa beds.  The hotel has rooms with patios that lead out to the pool area which is very nice with chairs and tables to make your stay more like being at home.

Decent place to stay if you don't want anything fancy. Carpet need to be replaced It's caused odor and some bussiness worker work outside during our stay, It's was so noisy. We checked out the day before we suppose to and check in with others best western near by.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We did have a big construction group and apologize if the carped got dirty. We make all efforts to fumigate and assure sanitation, and will assure a cleaner carpet if you will give us another chance. Our 24 hour on  site guest services help is assuring noise control is in check.  We have just installed fresh technology in all rooms, These high end sensors pickup smoking and alerts staff immediately. we want to assure fresh rooms for all.

Summary: Shannon the absolute best!!! She got us a room as soon as possible and very sweet considering the request we had. If you have the chance to come here come solely because I‚Äôm of her she‚Äôs great!! And the hotel was nice
Manager Response: Thank you for the nice feedback.  Shannon has been with us for 11 years and we appreciate her good work in guest satisfaction.

Summary: Shannon the absolute best!! Very accommodating! The nicest receptionist, very sweet especially at the last minute. Thank you Shannon and best western!  Coming back for Shannon and Shannon only, deserves a raise! Thank you for being so nice! :))

Shannon is the best!! She is so sweet and very accommodating. 10/10!!!!! Needed a hotel room last minute and she helped us out, very quick and easy! If you need a last minute hotel room this is definitely the place, coming back for sure because of Shannon!

This is by far one of the best hotels I have ever been to. Great service and hospitality, clean spacious rooms, and for a bargain price. I guarantee that you will fall in love at this awesome hotel.  Shannon at the front desk is just a lovely lady.

Wonderful place to stay Richard helped me and he was wonderful. He was so accommodating and told me where to shop where to eat and told me parks to visit. I will definitely go stay there again I have friends in that area

I went here in November with my husband, Tom. We were here for our honeymoon, and it was fantastic. The room was very clean, and so is the pool. We loved the cleanliness and amazing service. We rate it 10/10 and would love to go again someday.

My friend Joseph and I recently stayed here, back in Feb. 2020, for my birthday. We wanted to go somewhere close to 2nd street, Long Beach, and my friend told me about this place. From the moment I walked in my room I  was amazed at the cleanliness of the whole thing, property included. I loved how fancy it appeared. Even the pool looked astonishing, although we did not use it. The whole experience was remarkable and had lots of fancy aesthetic vibes.  10/10 would definitely be down for staying here again.

Checked in with Richard he was so helpful. Very clean rooms and nice pool. It's always nice to come to a place you've never been and then meeting fantastic people that are so accommodating in every way.

Very clean property, large rooms, freeway convenient, affordable, friendly and helpful staff. Walkable amenities for snacks and groceries. Starbucks nearby! There is a lot parking. Safe neighborhood, I was able to take a nice walk in the mornings.

Super happy with our stay. Rooms were very clean and good size. My kids loved the pool and miniature golf. They have a nice courtyard with a bbq next to the pool. I would definitely stay here again and definitely recommend this hotel especially because of how affordable it was.

Very friendly & helpfully employees-rooms are large & very clean.  Enjoyed the breakfast bar & coffee, parking right next to room.  Nice outside area to sit @ have your morning coffee, enjoyed sitting by the pool

I only ever stay at Best Western Hotels but this for sure has been one of the nicest ones by far that I've been to. Was in Westminster for business but the staff made it feel like home very very clean and very very comfy and I will make sure that I will stay there again when I'm in town again for work or for any engagement. Thank you Best Western Westminster Inn

I was working out of town and had to come back for the weekend and my new apartment wasn‚Äôt ready yet to move in. There was something going on that weekend and all the hotels were booked but luckily at the last minute they had a vacancy and were very nice upon checkin and the room was very clean and updated with a modern look. I was hungry and there was a few places to eat and get alcohol within walking distance in a decent neighborhood. They even have a bowling alley right down the street. They even had a toothbrush with toothpaste for free since I left mine behind. All in all a good experience.

Overall experience was great. Staff is friendly, rooms are good size and in excellent condition and spotlessly clean. conveniently  located by seal beach, Huntington beach. Definitely will return this summer.

Really nice stay! The room was very big and comfortable. The staff was very nice and always happy to help. The price was fair. Bedding could be change a bit more frequently and also the window could be cleaner but nothing to really complain about. The position is also very cool to visit the coast, LA and Orange County.

Good location with easy access to the interstate. Friendly and efficient check in. Breakfast was ok but in a small room. Room was very large with fridge and cook top. Overall nice but in need of some updating.

Ok, so... This location was pretty far off the beaten path... The motel was quaint and cute on the outside, but the interior was NOT stellar.  The floors had not been vacuumed upon our arrival and the bathrooms weren't updated well... The water pressure was incredible, though. The beds we're not very comfortable, which was truly a bummer. Their pool is small, as is the hot tub, and the hot tub had only four jets, which is what was needed most after long Disney days... The rooms open up to a quaint courtyard that not only had the pool/hot tub, but also has table tennis and putting green.  The main floor rooms all have a back door that leads out to the courtyard.   The breakfast was not good... There was the waffle maker, that was good, but the eggs were from powdered eggs and

Have been staying at Best Western last 2 years. great place , Friendly staff , good breakfast,  Beds nice , clean room. never any issues.. This is a older smaller hotel but well run with great staff. took care of all our needs. Will be there next year

The staff here is extremely friendly and understanding. Parking was sufficient.The breakfast was good and the room was clean. Its not the most modern hotel but Its a great place for the price or if your using points. I would recommend staying here.

Summary Heading: The Best Value and Experience in the Area
Summary: I have stayed at the Best Western Inn for years, off and on. And they genuinely care about your experience. The consistency and quality of care for this price range is amazing. And I will continue to stay here when it is not sold out, and recommend to others. Thank you Westminster Inn for the pride and quality of guest experience that you provide each time.

Usually Stayed in this hotel when coming back to Anaheim for Thanksgiving weekend and had another wonderful stay. This hotel is in Westminster district closed to Little Saigon, Westminster mall and highway 5 to anywhere in LA. Good hot breakfast items,  clean room with fresh scent smelling so good bed sheets & comfortable beds, quiet, facing miniature golf in the back with door and chair outside, very good size HD TV with many channels including CNN, HBO and children, modern sink, bathroom, and shower, microwave, fridge, ironing and hair dryer, good wifi speed, good location, friendly staff, and speedy checkin and checkout process. Surely will stay here again when in town.

We usually stay at this property while visiting Southern LA / Westminster area, this was our 5th stay at this property and we haven't been disappointed. The rooms are clean, the back yard area is great, and the swimming pool is now heated. Thank you, we look forward to coming back :)

Title says it all.  We will not stay anywhere else.  A big part of the fun of coming to Westminster  is staying at this hotel with such great staff, cleanliness - and the very best included breakfast at any hotel!

Drove to Cali for some good enjoyment with my gorgeous love  Went sight seeing. Checked out the wax museum couple shows Some good dinner and drinks.  All in all was a nice and relaxing weekend. Looking to go back

It's our go to location for Southern California family care trips. Service and staff are great. Location is convenient. It's an older BW property and well kept up. AND as added fun they make a real effort with Christmas decorations.

Summary Heading: Good place for an overnight stop
Summary: Stopped here for one night after a long hall flight into LAX. It was a 30-minute drive from the airport and easy to find from the Interstate. The check-in staff were friendly, and the room was a good size. I had one located away from the road, so it was quiet. The breakfast was good and started at 6:00 which was appreciated as I had an early start.
Manager Response: We are glad that you chose our location for your stay. Our breakfast does start at 6am every morning and we are glad you were able to enjoy it. We hope that you keep us in mind for all your future stays.

Summary Heading: Sleeping desk attendant and dirty room.
Summary: Every year we travel to Cali to go to Disneyland. Last year and this year we stayed at this hotel. Last year the hotel was decent, not the best, but good location and okay price. This year though we had so many problems. The room was dirty, under the beds were not sealed off, so we found a nerf gun, tic-tacs, and a lot of dirt under both queen beds. The walls were dirty, but what really got us was how dirty the shower was. On top above the tile in the shower there was so much dirt and dust! There was dirt on the walls above the tile as well. And when we got there the shower floor was also dirty and had dirty footprints on it. The room is always extremely humid, if you turn on the AC its not as humid, but it gets super cold; same with the heater.  The day we came back from Disney
Manager Response: We apologize for not meeting you expectations we do thank you for letting us resolve this matter by contacting us directly. Our goal is to provide superior customer care however when our guests feel that was not met we strive to make it better. We hope that the resolution we provided will allow us to have another opportunity and still maintain your loyalty. We understand there are many options in the lodging industry and thank you for your business.  Thank you,  Mayte Plascencia General Manager 714-898-4043

Summary Heading: Good hotel but be careful in the shower.
Summary: Room was clean, staff were all friendly. Beds were not the best but we were so tired after long days at the parks it didn't really matter if you rolled to the middle. The only real issue we had was the shower temperature it would go from what you set it to to cold then hot to freezing to scalding, to the point your skin would burn and you would have to jump out quick then it would be very hard to try setting the correct temp again. It was a major pain when you just wanted a hot shower after a long day. We didn't complain to the front as it was always at midnight we remembered.  Lots of construction in the area but pretty good overall stay.

I would just like to say thank you for making this a good stay. There was a issue   But was quickly resolved so thank you for that.  All in all they go out of their way  for what ever you might need. Thank you for all your help

Summary Heading: Nice staff, was only here for about 2 days, but it was nice
Summary: The breakfast was good and hot.  The staff helped me get around.  The area around the property doesn't have too much going for it but its on a main road, so we easy to find and get to other destinations.

We had a very quiet down stairs room just steps from the office. Although it was on a very busy street, there was no traffic noise. Staff was very helpful. Over bed lights were out but promptly fixed by Bim? The usual breakfast fare was hot and tasty for a change. Room was very nice and the bathroom clean with NO sign of mold, unusual nowadays. Would gladly stay there again if it was someplace other than California.
Manager Response: thank you for your response. We love having customers like you and look forward in seeing you again

Summary: We booked this hotel for a recent California trip and we tremendously pleased with our entire stay.  The hotel itself is a little older and smaller but the rooms are clean and large (we stayed in a room with 2 queen beds, on the 1st floor so we had a small patio).  We found the breakfast to be more than ample and a great start to our day.  The staff was super friendly and they went out if their way to grant our request to surprise my daughter with balloons to celebrate her birthday! We found the location to be great as we had easy access to the freeways and a short drive to Disneyland. Overall I was super pleased with the value and service we got and would definitely stay again

Summary Heading: Dirty carpet, old on the inside and outside
Summary: Really  awful Best Western.  I chose it based in reviews. Carpet very stained, needed deep cleaning,  cannot open curtain if you want privacy as it faces a common green space.  Walls need painting.  I've stayed in much cleaner Motel 6s than this hotel.

Price was great, breakfast was fast and good. The decor is dated but the room was nice and clean. Has a lot of space and I love that so it doesn‚Äôt feel like a small room you are stuck in. Lots of parking so didn‚Äôt have to worry when coming in late.

Great hotel. Rooms are nicely done, great staff, well kept grounds. Very comfortable. Have stayed here a few times, and the location is perfect for amusement parks. Close to restaurants, shopping. Just an all around great hotel for a get away!!

The staff was very friendly. The hotel has two floors but does not have an elevator. The front desk staff helped us take the luggage to the second floor. There is an nice and small outdoor pool as well as a mini golf field.

Everyone here is always cheerful and helpful. The team are always willing to help you and make your stay the best! Hotel is in a very good location near Huntington Beach, and parking is great. Has a nice pool, and the rooms are big specially the suites.

Even though this hotel is not next to Knotts...the benefits are worth it.  This hotel was clean, friendly and safe.  My grands and I will stay here next visit.  The breakfast had something for everyone...waffles, eggs and cereals.

We found this to be a great hotel, close enough to the 405 to be convenient to the area, but far enough to be super quiet. The front desk staff checking in and during the day were very pleasant and friendly. Our room was large and clean, the beds comfy...it had a large flat screen TV, and the wifi worked great. The room had a small fridge and microwave also. The free breakfast is typical Best Western, and the hot foods were kept refilled and fresh. Overall a great stay here.

Everyone at the Best Western was friendly and accommodating!  They treated you as family!  The rooms were very clean, everything worked, and there was cable tv included!  There is an amazing ‚Äúbackyard‚Äù with a patio some chairs and a table, for each room, games, a pool and a jacuzzi!  My kids LOVED IT!  It felt like a very homey/relaxing vacation! The breakfast was surprisingly great! Hot food, pastries, waffles, yogurt, juice, milk, water, coffee.  Very good variety for picky eaters such as my kids.  Will definitely be staying here again!!

The hotel was a pleasant stay, it was clean and also a great location. The staff was great. I will recommend this property for lodging. It's definitely worth it. Thank you, Best Western Westminster Inn.

All in all, a good place to stay.  The staff was great.  They were probably the best part of the hotel.  Very nice, helpful and accommodating.  We had to call the front desk for a few things over our week stay and they were always quick to respond.    The breakfast was good and filling, although you can't really complain much when it's included in the price.  It was pretty standard fair and the food didn't change the whole time we were there.  Scrambled eggs, diced potatoes, sausage, waffles, cereal, bagels, toast, yogurt, oatmeal, coffee, milk... most of what you would want in a decent breakfast, except maybe bacon! ;-)  The ladies monitoring the breakfast were helpful and did a great job keeping it stocked.  Things that ran out were refilled quickly.  The room was good and

Summary Heading: I love stay here great customer service
Summary: I love stay here great customer service they always nice to me treat me right always help me out breakfast is great always pool good WiFi  the staff always help me out with everything love being here thank

While all.of the staff was really nice and everything was clean, the one who stood out the most was Luis. Amazing customer service, makes great recommendations, and great at keeping conversation. A great member of the best Western staff.

Set in quiet residential area with quick access to freeways, comfortable rooms, clean and felt safe, breakfast basic but good start to the day, economic base to explore the la area. Pool area small, didn‚Äôt get to use it as didn‚Äôt have time, close to Disney and short drive to supermarkets, fast food etc.

I came in with some friends and I must say I had AMAZING service. The guy at the front desk (I believe his name as Luis) was so friendly! And was so helpful. He made sure to make us feel welcome and if we had any questions he was more then willing to go above and beyond! Truly a great experience! I would go back just for the friendly service! But the rooms were nice, everything clean and well kept. Just all around a good experience!

Summary Heading: Use of points that have been earned.
Summary: I called this hotel, BW Westminster Inn to inquire about availability of quiet rooms.  I spoke with Richard I presume is the front desk employee who from the start spoke to me hesitantly; he sounded like he wasn't sure of what he's telling me.  So I "helped" him identify which available rooms would be the quietest.  We then discussed the rates.  I asked if the rates online @ the company website is the same as the spoken rates and he confirmed that they are. Thereafter I said to him that I need to give it some thought as the check-in date was already close.  After a few minutes I decided to go online and look at the hotel details.  After I logged in, I recalled that I may have points earned so I checked my profile and discovered that I did.  I called the hotel back, spoke again
Manager Response: We apologize for any misunderstanding there may have been, we do accept points and the point value for this property is 20,000. You can use them towards a standard one or two beds room or even for our deluxe suite. We will gladly help make a reservation for you if you decide to stay with us.  Thank you, Mayte Plascencia General Manager BW Westminster Inn 714-898-4043

Summary: This is our 4th time staying out here in Westminister  we love the hotel very clean and pleasant staff we will continue to come to California  and stay here. The staff are very attentive to our needs. The pool are is nice & always clean.
Manager Response: Thank you for being a loyal guest and staying with us frequently. We hope to keep exceeding your expectations and being your destination hotel.  Thank you, Mayte Plascencia General Manager BW Westminster Inn 714-898-4043

Summary: We were a little earlier than the check-in time but when we called to see if our room was available we were told it was. When we arrived at the front desk to check in we were surprised to be told that we were being given a free upgrade to a one-room suite. It was beautiful!   Because we were there for a family wedding, I asked if it was possible for another family member to use the pull-out sofa bed. I expected to  pay an additional fee. Nope. I was told that the sofa bed already had sheet on the bed, there was a blanket in the drawer, and we were good to go.  The entire staff was extremely friendly from check-in to check-out. And, for the money, this was a great deal (I purchased it through Groupon). I HIGHLY recommend this hottel.

We stayed for a night and it was good and clean.  It needs a little update but works.   Location is good close to restaurant and shops. Staff was helpful and friendly, they provided us with an early breakfast.

I recently stayed at the hotel it was a bit late when I checked in but i was greeted kindly and asked about my day! As small as it may seem the gesture was nice the front desk Louis was very kind and offered me water after my long drive and even a snack from behind the counter. He told me the local places to eat asked if I needed late check out to sleep in a bit more or an alarm to be up for an appointment he covered all bases greatly the next morning i left refreshed and wondering when I would be able to come back and visit! The breakfast was just great as Louis had recommended and i got late check out too thank you all of the employees you are happy to be around!!!!!
Manager Response: We are glad Louis provided you with great customer service and made you feel welcome. We also look forward to having you stay with us again.  Thank you, Mayte Plascencia BW Westminster Inn 714-898-4043

Summary: I wanted to extend my stay for one day and was told no because they were sold out so I decided to head home a day earlier than I wanted to.  Just to check I called the hotel while I was on my way home and they did not tell me that they were sold out.  I will not stay at a Best Western again as the staff should have worked to assist in house guests.
Manager Response: David,  You have been a great guest to us, we would have loved for you to stay another day. Summer is our busy season and we keep our rates relatively low to provide a good value to our customers.  Double checked and we were completely sold out. Our staff even checked in the morning for you as you were checking out. Sometimes we do a last minute cancellation that we allow with limited penalty if there is a solid reason so one room can open up. We were disappointed to see this one circle review from you as we enjoyed having you here, you are a great guest and we love catering to your needs, Very sincerely Mayte  General manager

Summary: We stayed for 6 nights and had a great experience. Nice pool and spa and great service. Highly recommend. Clean rooms and nice hot breakfast. Breakfast didn‚Äôt change but it was still good every morning.

Summary Heading: Still love it. 9th time in 2.5 years
Summary: It's our favorite  So Cal hotel for our monthly family business trips. It's an older property, but very well tacken care of. The staff is great and attentive with out being intrusive. I especially like that the rooms are laid so that the we can have the entrance door and patio doors open to allow the cool So Cal ocean breeze (even though the ocean is 5 miles away) through the room. The upstairs don't have a balcony but there is still a large window over the pool and courtyard.  I continue to hope that sometime in the future they will be able to reconfigurre the breakfast area so that it is not so easily crowded.  All said we will be bac for another 6 days stay in a month.
Manager Response: We are glad to have you stay with us and thank you for being a loyal guest to our property. I hope to meet you in a month when you stay with us again.  Sincerely, Mayte Plascencia General Manager BW Westminster Inn 714-898-4043

Summary: I stayed there for 23 days (23 march-14 april 2019), because my company chose this terrible place for my business trip unfortunately.  First, it is impossible to find a kind staff, so if you face a problem please prepare yourself to an argument with them. I experienced this at least 5 times during my  accommodation there. Even, one of the staff (cuban boy is very dangerous) shouted at me and refused to shake my hand while i tried to reduce tension...  second, the rooms are old fashion, so devices work hardly. and If you reach water you are lucky, if you can reach hot water, you are luckier. If you don't, no need to call reception, because they get angry and show a man (in front of entrance) who is always working for providing hot water for hotel :) but i have to accept, he
Manager Response: Mr Ozan,  We are surprised to receive this review two months after the stay, We did have a water issue with the city that the pipe broke, it was out of our control but we do apologize. You had a very aggressive approach to our staff, I know you were visiting from Turkey. We tried to satisfy your needs and hope you will be kinder to other places you stay, I have a masters in engineering also and your style makes me sad. We wish you the best, Sincerely Syed Shah

Summary: Friendly staff. Excellent cleaning crew helped organize and keep our room spotless during our stay. Good breakfast. Only thing I would say that needs improvement is hotter water for a longer period of time but even that wasn't anything serious. Will be back if I'm ever in the area again.

Very friendly and accommodating staff, great pool and hot tub, clean rooms and efficient service. Breakfast was delicious and hot, waffle maker was a huge plus with my family. We will definitely be returning from Texas to visit.

Best hotel love the customer service they are so good to me very helpful great breakfast good food nice rooms pool spa good WiFi everything is great about this hotel I love stay here and how quiet it is

Nice clean comfortable place not far from freeways. Refrigerator and microwave. Outdoor grills. Friendly service, fast check in and check out. Good morning complimentary breakfast and refreshments. One of my favorite spots.

We stayed in this hotel for 5 nights.  The hotel needs renovation for sure it is pretty run down but it was clean.  The hot tub was hit and miss if the jets work.  We chose to stay here because the rooms had kitchenettes.  The problem was the fridge did not get that cold and the freezer did not freeze anything.  There was only a stop top no oven.  We came from Canada so we were trying to save costs and wanted to cook our meals in the hotel.  The breakfast was just okay - disappointing it was the exact same thing every day no variety.  Eggs were always dry.  Not much seating area for breakfast.  It was not a bad stay, it was clean and it was okay for us.

This is my 1st time here and loved it...good hot bfast.. 95% of staff was friendly nice n helpful ... cleanliness and peaceful was definitely on my list .. I will stay here again on my future visits...btw way mom is super picky but both parents were super happy and totally approved and appreciate this location LOL I passed with an A+ So definitely recommend this place

The hotel can use a little update but putting that aside we had a very pleasant stay. Our room was spacious and very clean. The king size bed was very comfortable. We found the room to be quiet and we were able to get a restful sleep. We had a ground floor room and outside of the patio sliding door was a small tiled area with two chairs that faced the pool and the little putting green that is in the rear of the property. It was like being in a garden. We did not use the pool because the weather was a little cool, but the pool was immaculate. As for the breakfast, there is a small breakfast area but we were always able to sit and enjoy the breakfast. There was a staff member in attendance and she was very much on top of things keeping the area clean and refurbished when things

Everything is excellent except the interior is now dated.  The front desk were extremely helpful and the breakfast is very good.  We have stayed here a number of times, and would have no problem staying again as we know what to expect.

Everything about this hotel was awesome! The property was well maintained and I loved the putting green and ping pong tables outside by the pool. The rooms were clean and comfy. The staff were all very helpful and did everything with a smile.

Small, but very nice stay.  Had all we come to expect in a larger Hotel.  Staff is nice and willing to help.  The Pool courtyard is away from the public street, a plus.  Guest room window face the pool, not the busy ugly street, another plus.

This hotel is a little gem. Clean and comfortable . Has a lot of family friendly items. Table tennis,putting grean and a very clean pool. We stayed 2 nights and didn‚Äôt have any issues. Stay here with confidence.

Summary Heading: Great hotel close to Knotts Berry Farm and Disney
Summary: We have stayed here before and the hotel is still well maintained.  It is a little bit further out from Disneyland, but if you have a car it is doable.  The staff is very friendly and the check in and out was quick. There is a nice pool and amenities like a BBQ, a ping pong table and a putting green.  The rooms are nice with comfortable beds and are very clean.  We will stay here again.

We have always like the small atmosphere of this property.  We have never had any problems.  The only thing I would suggest is that they change their breakfast choices.  Everytime we have stayed it is the same food.  They need to have more hot food choices.

Cute hotel with a nice court yard and pool.  Affordable with a hot continental breakfast so we could spend more in Disneyland, like the Bibbidi Bobbidi boutique.  20 minutes to Disneyland and 20 minutes to Huntington Beach.

My go to stay whenever I'm in Westminster area, close proximity to Vietnam town shops and restaurants and also the beaches. Spacious and good pricing, continental breakfast is not bad. Includes a heated pool.

For the affordable price, the hotel was amazing! Clean, huge tv, great hot breakfast, clean pool and hot tub, ping pong table, putt putt, and a grill. All the amenities were as described. AND is sooo close to everything. 20 minutes to Disney, the beach, 5 minutes or less to shopping, food, it was great. Thanks Best Western, we would definitely stay again!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review we are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay. We look forward to having you in the near future or when you are in the area.   Mayte Plascencia General Manager BW Westminster Inn

Summary: I was greatly surprised that even though the outside of the building looks a little older the inside is well taken care of. The hotel is right on a busy street and our room faced the street so at first I was worried we'd be hearing cars all night, but once we were in bed we didn't hear a thing. The staff were friendly and I saw them taking good care of their property.
Manager Response: We thank you for your review, Westminster Blvd is a busy street during the day however by the evening traffic does die down. Also all of our rooms that face the street have windows facing the back courtyard to help minimize sound even more. We hope to see you again in the near future.  Thank you,  Mayte Plascencia General Manager BW Westminster Inn

Summary: I think it was okay for the cost. I would not recommend a single woman stay here unless she has a room on the first level. The second floor stairs are remote and offer opportunity for ambush. Even as a single man it felt creepy going up them in the dark evening hours. Pot smoke was present which is not uncommon in California hotels. It was quieter than I expected.
Manager Response: We are a small property that is surrounded by residential homes. We have someone at the front desk 24 hours a day. We have also enhanced our lighting to make sure everything is well lit at night. We hope that everyone that stays with us has the same feeling of security and comfort as most guests do, And , we do encourage anyone to call the front desk to address any concerns during a stay or questions we are always eager and alert to make everyone feel welcome.. We hope that you will consider staying with us again and give us the opportunity to meet your expectations.

Summary: We chose this hotel because of how close it was to a wedding.  The room was nice and spacious.  There were a lot of things nearby. The staff were friendly.  We had an issue with using points for our room but that was remedied. We were sorry we didn't have a chance to have the pool or hot tub.
Manager Response: We thank you for your review and appreciate your business. It is great to hear that your points were resolved in a timely matter. We look forward to having you in the near future.  Thank you, Mayte Plascencia General Manager 714-898-4043

Summary: A basic motel. Nicely refurbished. Breakfast was just ok. Not much of a selection.the employees were very accommodating.  Because of the location, this was perfect for us.  I can‚Äôt say enough about the staff.  Especially the front desk clerk.  She was very helpful
Manager Response: We are glad that our team offered great customer service. We strive to provide superior care. Thank you for your stay.  Mayte Plascencia General Manage 714-898-4043

Summary: Great location with easy access to 405. Slightly older motel, but it was clean and the staff was friendly! I would definitely stay here again. It was neat to see a small putting green and pingpong table to help entertain the kids ( and myself!)
Manager Response: We are glad you enjoyed the amenities the courtyard has to offer.  We want the families to enjoy some of the time they spend on site while relaxing by the pool or patios.  Thank you, Mayte Plascencia General Manager 714-898-4043

Summary: I arrived late on check in day at 1:30 AM.  Staff was helpful and friendly even at late check in time.   Housekeeping and other staff were all very helpful and willing to help.   I have no complaints about this location.   Is a good value for me and is easy for me to get to Long Beach for business from this hotel.  Keep up the good work.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing us as a place to stay. Please keep us in mind for all your future lodging needs.  Thank you, Mayte Plascencia General Manager 714-898-4043

Summary: Staff is very attentive. my room is in excellent condition. Breakfast was awesome. The location is on point to anywhere you need to go. Hote/room is very clean inside and outside as well. everything was great. everything is great.the staff is friendly.

Stayed 3 nights while visiting family in the area and would definitely stay again.  The room was very clean, breakfast was good and it was quiet sleeping at night.  Great, friendly hotel staff and the location is convenient to shopping and freeway close.  It is an older building but well maintained and clean.  Great stay.

We stayed for one night.  This is a older property but very well maintained and clean.  We did not use the pool or hot tub but they looked functional.  The breakfast area is compact but had all of the Best Western elements.  Recommended.

This is an older motel on a major street, though the traffic noise wan't too bad.  We had a fast and friendly check in.  Our room was a decent size, including a large mini-fridge with freezer and a microwave.  There were few places to plug in electronics.  We could hear people walking in the room above us and talking in adjacent rooms.  The sink area was separate from the toilet/shower room.  The low-flow shower head made it take extra time for me to rinse the shampoo out of my hair.  The breakfast was so-so, with processed hot items.

Hotel online display of queen double room was deceiving for me.  The room we were given was dated although it was clean.  I chose to stay at BW because of the room I saw online, I'm a bit disappointed.  Location to LGB airport was 15-20 minutes from hotel.  Many restaurants nearby and walkable.

This hotel works well if one has to go Long Beach for business. It is a 20-minute drive without significant traffic jam.The garden is small but contains the pool, a grill, and some place for sports. The trees there are lovely.Breakfast is ok.The room offered enough space and was well equipped. The service was excellent.

Searched all over for a hotel for our visit that had respectable reviews and a fair rate and this was my choice and what a great choice. Firstly every staff member was professional, helpful, and friendly. The rooms were clean and comfortable, great bathroom, television and WiFi were top notch. Loved the back area with the pool, ping pong and putting area. Breakfast area was impeccable and great variety. The price was completely fair. Nice area and it was quiet. Highly recommend!

I've been to this hotel 4 times already. Great place to stay and great service. Clean rooms, good breakfast, fast wifi and good cable. Clean pool and jacuzzi. 100% of the time will choose this hotel everytime I visit SoCal.

Great room. Smelled amazing as you walk in..the staff was great.  They were all so friendly.  They even helped my family make the waffles for breakfast. Breakfast was great too! All around I would recommend this room and stay here again!

This Best Western has a clean dining area and a nicely prepared breakfast.   The location of the hotel gives easy access to the freeway.  Overall, I recommend this hotel to people needing to stay in this area.

Hotel is great the staff is very friendly and professional they go out of your way to take care of the guests. Above and beyond any hotel I‚Äôve ever been in.Hotel is very clean and immaculate. The maids very hard working ladies they clean the rooms really well and go out of their way to make u feel at home.The lobby is really clean all the time. Breakfast area is really clean and very good assortment at breakfast. The receptionists are very professional and friendly Richard Dana and Jesus go above and beyond to ensure your stay is pleasant. I recommend this hotel to all my family and friends.

Summary Heading: " We Did Not Have A Good Time "
Summary: We stayed at the Best Western Westminster Inn and did not have a good time. We picked this hotel because it had some of the better reviews in the area. I ordered a Handicap accessible room and when I tried to enter the bathroom the sliding door was broken and it was almost impossible to close and open the bathroom door. I also saw that the tub area was very slippery and it had no rubber mats to make sure handicap people don't fall. When I called the front desk they told me they don't have those mats. Wow ! Then after I spoke with a lady washing the laundry about the mats, about an hour later she showed up with a rubber mat. The front office still did not know about it. The hotel is very noisy and it is very hard to get any sleep. The cars, motorcycles and trucks are racing down
Manager Response: We apologize that your stay wasn't pleasant, we strive for superior customer care and are saddened we didn't fulfill your expectations. We are firm believers that all reviews help us improve and make us better. It is through your comments that we can look for alternatives to better service our guests. Although front office were unable to provide you with a mat we are happy housekeeping was able to provide you with one. We will enhance our communication with each department and only look for improvement. The water issue was looked by a plumber and we should no longer have that issue. We thank you for your comments and hope you will still continue to be a loyal Best Western guest.

Summary: Convenient location, great value for the price! 20 minutes from Disneyland. About an hour(with traffic) from Universal Studios, LAX, and Staples Center. Seal Beach only a few miles away. Property is obviously an older one, but BW has updated the rooms, and maintains the inside and outside of the property to make it feel very modern and fresh. Very well done!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, we are glad you enjoyed your stay.We hope that you continue to be a loyal guest with us.  Mayte Plascencia General Manager BW Westminster Inn

Summary Heading: Four Nite Stay was Clean & Convenient
Summary: Our first floor room, with parking right at the room was super convenient.  The staff, from the desk, to the complimentary breakfast buffet folks, to the housekeeping group were courteous and professional.  Price was very reasonable.

Great location. Easy access to 405 and 22 freeway. Quiet area. Great for families. Refrigerator and microwave are great to have with kids. Breakfast was good - eggs, potatoes, sausage, waffles with a variety of topping options, cereals, yogurts, breads, rolls, and bagels.Only complaint is that the beds were a bit worn down and sunk in the center. This caused a few arguments between the kids. Otherwise I much prefer this property to the other options in this area (North Huntington/ Westminster)

Amazing staff at the hotel. Any problems or requests that we had we asked the front desk and they sent someone up very quickly and got the problem fixed. Very clean and comfortable rooms. Convenient location: close to Huntington Beach, Anaheim, and the other parts of Westminster. Pool and hot tub are also very nice features too.

Summary Heading: Nice place to stay in Westminster
Summary: This hotel was clean, close to freeways (but not too close), comfortable, and quiet. It's on a busy street, but set back enough that I never heard traffic noise. Plenty of free parking around the hotel. Pool, hot tub, play area in back - good for kids. Free breakfast. Very nice staff. Lots of good restaurants nearby.

The pool was very cool the hot tub was very relaxing. The bed was also very relaxing the pillows was very soft. The TV had varieties of channels that you could pick and Signal came in very good with out messing up.

Summary Heading: The best hotel i have been to
Summary: The bed was comfortable as so as the pillows the room is also nice and cold. When I went into the pool it was very fun to hang out with friends but when I got into the hot tub of started to relax even more this was the best I ever had in this hotel.

The bed was comfortable the pool was comfortable and relaxing it was heated in the jacuzzi the pillows were memory foam and the chairs were comfortable the ice is cubed and there were a lot of blankets

I want to start off by saying that this is the 3rd year in a row we have chosen this Westminster location for our family beach party after stay. We choose it because of the family atmosphere and the outside patios to relax. The pool and spa and other activities are always kept up a d add to the value of the hotel stay. This stay we had some difficulties such as a reserved room not here upon arrival, however the front desk staff was able to correct the situation. He was courteous and friendly. The room was usual, comfortable beds and clean. Breakfast ok, the staff was courteous but unable to keep up with the am demand of hungry patrons.

I have been staying in this hotel for work during the week for the past couple of months. Rooms are always clean and the staff is real friendly. The only real complaint I have is that the tubs do not come with a shower mat as other Best Western hotels in the area do. I have almost slipped several times. I recommend investing in some slip resistant shower mats, especially from a liability purpose. But overall it's a great quality hotel with a fair price.

We did a one day trip to California (on a budget) to celebrate a birthday and I found this hotel conveniently located close to several beaches.  This hotel was an excellent choice for sure.  We arrived and our check-in process was quick and staff were attentive and friendly.  Our room was very clean.  We took advantage of the breakfast offered at this place and it was wonderful!  This added to our ‚Äúbudget‚Äù get away.  The food was fresh and pretty well stocked at all times.  Thank you for an awesome stay.  We will definitely go to this location again in the future!

I have never written a review but felt I had to tell about this place. This place is old, not in a great part of town and right next to a very busy road.  I discovered the day we checked out, after staying four nights, that the bites all over my arms and legs were bedbug bites.  Room 106. The floor was so dirty that our feet were black every night when we crawled into the most lumpy uncomfortable bed I‚Äôve ever slept in. One wall in the bathroom had urine and other unknown stains running down. The refrigerator barely kept things cold even on the highest setting. The parking is minimal. There were only two bananas set out for breakfast each day so you had to get there early if you want one. I let the hotel know via email but did not receive a response. We won‚Äôt stay here again.
Manager Response: We apologize for not meeting your expectations. We hope that you would have brought these concerns to our attention to gladly help and make it better unfortunately an email sometimes isn't delivered or lost in spam. We check it everyday and hope that we would have seen it. In regards to bed bugs we thoroughly checked the room and have not found any. As a matter of fact we have our company that service our rooms monthly to prevent any of these issues. We are conveniently located near residential homes and about 2-3 minutes from the 405 freeway. We also provide 24 hour front desk attendant, we want to make sure some one is always available. You can always reach out to me on property at 714-898-4043. We wanted to speak with you directly but I am unable to find any record of a guest under Jeni.  Thank you, Mayte Plascencia General Manager

Summary: The kids had gotten out of school and I thought why not take a summer vacation instead of staying all week at home, my mom would make us stay but not me. So I went to the one hotel that has never let me down. As soon as we got there we wanted to relax and that‚Äôs exactly what we got! We checked into room 109, and Vale helped take our bags! Me and my husband could unpack while the kids went for a swim, and still keep an eye on them. The view, room, and breakfast was all amazing. Finally, it was time to check out, Monica at the front desk was very helpful and friendly. I despise leaving the hotel but I know I will be back!
Manager Response: Thank you for keeping us in mind for your vacation needs.   Dana Le Guest Services

Summary: i have spent 2 weeks in the best western westminster and i have got to say its a very nice stay. all the hotel staff cant do enough for you and always with a smile the rooms are cleaned every day and done very well it has a small pool but as we was out every day to different places every day that did not worry us, plus there is nobody at the pool or very few people there so after our days out you could chill there. you get a nice breakfast every day which is included in your stay. as for the area it is more residential round and about so will need a car to get about but if you want a base and go to places that California as got to offer  on a budget you wont go much wrong here.
Manager Response: We thank you for your review and are delighted to hear that your stay was great. We are conveniently located whether you want to do Disneyland or the Beaches its all very close and we are glad you enjoyed it as well.  Thank you, Mayte Plascencia General Manager

Summary: I love the friendly receptionist.  He is very helpful and professional. The hotel is very nice and clean. I‚Äôm very happy and enjoy our time with my family during our vacation.  We will definitely will come  back to this hotel again

This is our first time here and we really enjoyed it. The room is clean and the receptionist is very friendly and helpful.  Definitely will be back again. It makes our vacation more fun and enjoyable in Southern California.

My stay at best western was a good stay i would recommend this hotel to my friends the staff was amazing they were so nice Mayte is so nice and the cleaning ladies were so nice Olga and gale were help full and nice

This place is horrible....the manager should not be blamed...she is the only good thing about this place.....horrible.....it should not be allowed to be a best western. Shady area... no parking no hot water drug deals in the parking lot... rooms under power lines buzzing should be reported... beds horrible... scary!!
Manager Response: We strive for superior customer care and welcome all reviews that have room for improvement. We understand that in your case we were unable to meet your expectations. However, accusing a property of drug deals without merit is a malicious threat. We have surveillance cameras as well as someone at the front desk 24 hours. We have reviewed our footage from this weekend and find no drug related activity on property. The majority of our clientele during this time of year are families and vacationers to the area who are usually enjoying our amenities with their kids on property, like the ping pong table as well as the mini golf area.  We hope that you will continue to be a Best Western loyal member and enjoy the amenities we and our partner hotels have to offer.

Summary: This hotel is small but very nice. Cute patios on the 1st floor pool side. The rooms are nicely kept and the breakfast was wonderful. We would definitely stay here again. The staff is very friendly and directed us towards the beautiful beach. The parking lot is a bit small but it wasn't terribly bad. I do wish there were more towels in the room for the guests. Over all a nice experience staying at this hotel.
Manager Response: We thank you for your reviews and are glad that you enjoyed your stay. Please don't hesitate to requests more towels if you need additional. We will be happy to assist you with that. We hope that you keep us in mind for your future stays.  Mayte Plascencia General Manager

Summary: Really nice room. Very clean nice and quite and the. Staff. Very. Friendly i love. The. Patio. And. The pool i do recommend this. Hotel. I will. Come. Back on my next. Trip oh and. The. Price. Its. No bad. Ans. Breakfast its. Really delicious

Don't stay here on a busy weekend unless you like cold showers!  Or broken refrigerators!  Or noisy air conditioning!  This place deserves a minus score!  While the location was good and the room was comfortable, there is no excuse for running out of hot water and non functioning refrigerator!
Manager Response: We apologize for not exceeding your expectations during your stay. We take all of our reviews positively we want to hear what are guests feel and experience. In your case we wished you would have allowed maintenance to check your room during your stay to better assist and fix the problem. The fridge like we mentioned are operated by a switch as this allows us to be more energy efficient. We spoke on the phone with you, as well as Best Western corporate, we were interested in making your stay pleasant. However we failed to please you even after the discounts the property and best western corporate gave you and unfortunately you hung up the phone on us. We wish you well and hope you have a nice day.  Thank you, Mayte Plascencia General Manager BW Westminster Inn

Summary: Hotel was ok...a few cleanliness issues like dirty floors and lipstick stained bedspreads but overall hotel was good...got upgraded to king suites due to 2 queen room not being available next door...one room had a broken window which i notified the staff of upon arrival...internet was good...breakfast could have had more options, but for the price this was a generally good hotel/motel
Manager Response: We thank you for your review and glad you enjoyed the king suites, we wanted to keep you and your family next door to each other. Also thank you for informing us of the window we were able to replace it and eliminated that issue. We have notified our housekeeping staff and they have assured a better inspection of the room in order to exceed our customer satisfaction.  Thank you, Mayte Plascencia General Manager

Summary: We had an amazing time here. Room clean and comfortable (we brought our own pillows though)...staff courteous and went over and above to make the stay nice. Stayed 7 nights...tv down for one but hey we just went to bed earlier and they took care of it quickly. Would stay again in a heart beat.

This is my 3rd time reviewing. We like it. It's an older Best Western, but well keep up with modern furnishings. Clean, always smells fresh without any freshener fragrance. Nice size pool. Little putting green and outdoor ping pong along with a bar b que grill and picnic area add to its feeling of friendliness.   This is our 5th stay in the last 16 months and they have ranged from 3 to 7 nights each. They have been a combination of family duties and holiday. They have all been 5 STAR experiences.  They provided a good free complete breakfast and the attendants do a great job; especially considering the area devoted to breakfast is oftentimes very crowded. Because we always stay 3+ days it would be nice if they rotated bacon with the sausage and occasionally had biscuits with

excellent locaci√≥n ver y clean rooms And amenities very  nice  sitting outsider anda relaxing with golf was fun breakfast is great  staft  was very helful always full very clean lobby workers very atenders  wet

Summary Heading: Convenient & comfortable business trio to Orange County
Summary: Second time I've stayed here, and just as satisfied. Convenient for business meeting in Huntington Beach, and no freeway in the morning. Meets all my criteria for a quick business trip. Clean, quiet, comfortable room; working Internet, A/C, & TV; simple breakfast to get out quickly.

Excellent location    very clean rooms  and amenities very nice     sitting outside and relaxing with golf was fun       breakfast is great    Staff at breakfast was very helpful  everything always full .   Stores were close to walk      close to go to la or San Diego   very wonderful vacation
Manager Response: We are glad you enjoyed your stay. We look forward to having you stay with us again in the near future!!  Thank you, Mayte Plascencia General Manager

Summary: Tell your family, friends and co-workers, this is the place to stay!!! The rooms are affordable, the customer service is superb and the food tastes great! The hospitality is phenomenal and I'm definitely staying here again! Of all the hotels I've ever stayed in, this is by far the best. I literally have 0 complaints!!

This will be the 4th stay at this property for business.  Yes it looks a bit worn under the fresh coat of paint, and the architecture is a bit shabby. But the rooms are clean, the Free WiFi is much improved to where I had no speed or connection issues.  Breakfast was simple, good and included.  Staff was always friendly, professional and available.  This was is property is a real good value, and worth squinting a bit to get by the outward appearances.

Summary Heading: Lovely rooms, quiet and near to attractions
Summary: Stayed for three nights and had king room with sofa and kitchenette.  This was a large room with a well equipped kitchenette - even down to the washing up dispenser.   Bed was comfortable and room was quiet.  Hotel has lots of eating options either within walking distance or a short drive. As Brits the H Salt traditional fish and chips restaurant a short walk away was welcoming. Food is as it claims - traditional British fish and chips.   Hotel is ideal if you need to get to Disneyland or Knott's Berry Farm with both being about a 20 minute drive away.

I booked this hotel for a business trip, to audition in LA. I found the hotel to be decently affordable for the area, check in and out was very efficient and easy. They were very professional, I enjoyed the breakfast. I have no complaints.
Manager Response: We are glad that your stay was pleasant. We hope that you will keep us in mind for any of your future lodging needs.  Thank you, Dana Le Guest Services

Summary: It was a nice hotel with free parking and a nice hot tub in the pool area. The breakfast was very good and the staff was friendly. The hotel was clean and the room was big. It had a refrigerator also which was nice.
Manager Response: Thank you for reviewing our property, we are happy your stay was great. We look forward to having you as our guest in the future,  Thank you, Monica Alanis Guest Services

Summary: This place is amazing. They have really great food for breakfast. The beds are really comfy and the shower is separate from the sink. The workers are very kind and want to help you. Again this place is amazing!
Manager Response: Thank you for enjoying your experience with us and glad we could help in any way possible. Please keep us in mind for your next trip.  Thank you, Richard Channa Guest Services

Summary Heading: Best Western Westminster, still a quality motel
Summary: We have been going to this motel for the Long Beach Gran Prix.  They still have quality service.  The beds are great and I really like the shower.  Lots of hot water. They have a good breakfast service. We will be back next year.
Manager Response: We are always delighted to have you every year for the Grand Prix. Thank you for your business!!  Best Western Westminster Inn Staff

Summary: I once again stayed at Best Western, but alone. I was off on a business trip and back in the Westminster area and of course I had to stay here, otherwise I would regret it. When I arrived maintenance helped me with my bags, and he didn‚Äôt have to but he did it very generously. I only stayed one day but the whole day was absolutely perfect as well as breakfast, the pool, rooms, and of course the hardworking staff! I can‚Äôt wait to return with my family! I recommend you stay at Best Western Westminster if you are ever in the area!
Manager Response: Its always reassuring to know that you felt comfortable at our property while travelling alone. We all are eager to help our guests with luggage or any request. Hope to meet your family and yourself on your next stay.  Thank you, Owner and CEO Syed Shah

Summary: Excellent in every way group of us crazies volunteer at the Long Beach Grand Prix every year. Our track side mornings are at 5;.30 each morning.  They open their breakfast bar at 4:00 A M to serve us. The beds are comfortable, the rooms are clean. We will be back next year
Manager Response: We thank you for keeping us in mind every year during the Grand Prix. We are glad to have breakfast earlier for you, you all are the real MVPs at the Grand Prix.  Best Western Westminster Inn Staff

Summary: We stayed one Saturday night. The staff was great. Very nice people at check in and checkout.  The room was clean. The rate was affordable.  I  travel to California all the time. This is a good place to stay.

Honestly, I have no idea why people think this place is good. The room (103) smelled, it had bugs, and the matress was like you were falling into a canyon when you layed down. I was supposed to stay 3 nights, checked out after the first and went to a new hotel.
Manager Response: Good day Sir,   We strive to provide every guest with a great experience.  To assure that the room you occupied was in great condition Dewey a company specialist in pest prevention came out and inspected the room and found no trace in room. We apologize we could not refund 100 percent as nothing was found in the room and we were unable to verify the complaint.  All of our rooms get thoroughly inspected daily to assure cleanliness. Our many reviews show our care and thought towards our guests and the service we provide.   Thank you, Mayte Plascencia General Manager 714-898-4043

Summary: The golf and table tennis was fantastic. I hope to come back in the future to enjoy the relaxing pool and hot tub. The nature quality was great with butterflies and birds flying all over the beautiful flowers it was picture perfect.

I have a huge family and this hotel was great! Very accommodating, the kids enjoyed the pool and ping pong table. The staff was very friendly, helpful, and happy! Very relaxed and easy going! I highly recommend this location for anyone visiting especially with kids!

Not a single complaint! So helpful and clean and comfy. Very kid friendly, enjoyed the pool, hot tub, ping pong table, laundry facilities were available. Breakfast was great my kids really enjoyed waffles every morning! Would completely recommend this hotel to any family traveling thru LA.

Angel at the front desk went above and beyond to make our stay perfect.  In fact, every single employee we encountered was friendly and accommodating.  This is a very family friendly hotel, and we loved our stay here!

My family of 12 stayed at this hotel for 7 nights, and it has been probably the best hotel stay we have had.  The staff is absolutely amazing- they were always smiling and friendly.  Specifically, Monica and Margarita were very friendly and helpful. The layout of the hotel is beautiful, and the pool, hot tub, and ping pong table made it perfect.  Will definitely stay again!

This hotel is not much to look at from the outside but the rooms are very nice and clean and smell nice so very pleasantly surprised. The staff (front desk & housekeeping) was excellent. My only complaints are that the beds are too stiff for my liking. We all woke up with stiff backs. And also this hotel is a 2 story walk-up so we had to lug our bags up the stairs. It would have been nice if they had Bell Service to carry our bags up for us. But overall very pleased with our stay and would stay here again if they had softer beds. If your top priority in a hotel is to have a nice clean room at a bargain price in a convenient location and you don't really care about all sorts of hotel amenities that you will never use, this hotel is for you!
