I previously stayed at a Best Western in Indiana which was very nice.  Thought I'd try again for my trip to California.  I was not disappointed.  Very nice hotel, staff, breakfast, etc.  Was impressed all the way around.  Will definitely stay again when I'm in the area.

This BW is not very noticeable as you approach it, but it's a delightful little place.  The manager greeted us with a huge smile and, before he left,  introduced me to the front desk clerk.  All employees seemed to be happy and led us to believe they enjoy their jobs.

Very nice location.  Clean hotel and very friendly staff as well.  The breakfast was better than I could have hoped for and I would definitaly stay here again.  The poolside area was really nice as well.

Really clean rooms, bathroom, and lobby. The staff were very friendly. The morning breakfast was very good. They had lots of choice. The tv has lots of channels. The rooms have a microwave and a refrigerator.

It‚Äôs a small hotel, but the room was clean. They offer a simple, but very good complementary breakfast. Hotel staff is nice and friendly. The hotel location is also good, not far from Huntington Beach and Newport Beach.

Although this is a smaller inn. The rooms were clean comfortable and it was in a great location. There were food options all around. The beds were very comfortable, they served a great breakfast and it had a pool and hot tub.

Stayed here for the surf City half. Not a bad place to stay for the price. Convenient and right off the interstate. It looked a bit old and outdated and the walls were a little thin- could hear people walking around upstairs and could hear doors closing next door. But the bed was comfy and they offered enough to channels. They have a nice courtyard for hanging out with friends. Def not bad for the price

If you plan on staying close to the beach this is the place . You can drive a short distance to several beaches . Hotel room was spacious and clean great water pressure.Hotel staff was great especially Monica at the front desk . Breakfast was just ok .

Summary Heading: Good Value and convenient location for Orange County
Summary: This motel was good value, Good rooms with seating outside room in garden.  Breakfast was adequate, but not exceptional. The standard for room, beds and cleanliness was very high.  Housekeeping does a good job. There is a donuts shop, Starbucks and liquor store  across the street if interested.  It has good access to two freeways. 20 minutes drive on surface road to Huntington beach; 20 minute drive to Disneyland.   Staff were exceptional in assisting us and offering information about the area.  Would stay there again.

Hotel was super clean, amazing breakfast and very comfortable beds!! Love the patio view from the hotel!! Nice area! Will definitely be back!! The breakfast was the best I‚Äôve had at a hotel!!  And I love the different dispensers they have of soap/shampoo and all!

We were on a family trip to Disneyland and wanted to stay away from the park this time. We are very pleased with this stay. They have a decent breakfast and clean rooms. The staff was very kind as well. What more can you ask for!

Nice and quiet night stay at Best Western inn. Staff was quick to check us in. Room was comfortable and clean. And the heater works well! Shower pressure was powerful, and I would stay here again next time.

We stayed here for 2 weeks. The location is great really close to the 405 HWY, the are clean and newly renovated.  The staff is very friendly and helpful, they helped us many times.  The internet is great and covers the whole hotel.

Good hotel loved the play area for the kids with the gold ping pong and pool. Kids loved the hot tub. Very convenient for our hockey tournament. Kids liked the breakfast and staff were great and nice thank you for the stay
Manager Response: We are glad you enjoyed your stay and glad the kids had a chance to enjoy the outdoor amenities that we offer like the putty green and the ping pong table. We hope to see you in the near future for all your hospitality needs.  Thank you, Mayte Plascencia General Manager 714-898-4043

Summary: My family stayed here during a hockey tournament for 4 nights. We had a great time, the staff was very friendly and the rooms were clean and comfortable. We enjoyed the ping pong table and the pool. Location was also close to things we wanted to do.
Manager Response: We are happy your hockey team enjoyed the stay with us. Please keep us in mind when you are in the area.  Thank you, Dana Le Guest Services

Summary: The personnel are great and the price is really fair. Rooms and pool are always clean and the free breakfast is an awesome addition. Plus, it's located in a great spot if you like to walk around to get to know Westminster
Manager Response: We love that you have described us as the Best Hotel in town, we feel more engaged to provide superior customer care for every guest every time.   Thank you, Richard Channa Guest Services

Summary Heading: Back Again  -  We Really Like It
Summary: It's nice, the people are great, and perfect for our needs. It is an older Best Western with the rooms nicely upgraded and signed under Best Westen's new blue and white "B W" signage. It is very well maintained. Prices vary with local demand and they are often full with tourists on weekends and local longterm visiting professionals on week nights. We have already made our reservations for early March. Breastfast is good with the usual continental  items plus scrampled eggs, sausage, and potatoes. The breakfast host was amazing in keeping the tables clean, the food ready and hot, and everything fully stocked.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and being a valued guest. We will see you in March and appreciate you for making this property your preferred one.  Dana Le Guest Services

Summary: Our stay was short lived. We came in at around 2:30 am. The hotel person who checked is said don‚Äôt worry about checking out until 12:30 pm. Which was perfect considering mostly I think 11:00am is normal check out to time. It relieved a lot of stress not having to ask. I have two young children and it was a Hugh help. And my kids loved the waffles!!!!
Manager Response: We are glad the late check out was accommodating and hope you stay with us in the near future.  Thank you, Olga Plascencia Guest Services 714-898-4043

Summary Heading: Very nice hotel and great staff
Summary: We always prefer to stay in Best Western Hotels.  They seem to be very clean, have a good breakfast and their staff are excellent. This hotel is close to everything that we were hoping for. We found great restaurants, beaches and even went to a movie.

Customer service is great here. We had a little trouble at 3am and they were able to switch our room that same morning. The location is in the middle of everything we had planned, Disneyland about 15min drive and staple center 30min. So overall it's a great place.
Manager Response: We thank you for choosing us as your place to stay and we are glad the issue was handled accordingly. We hope to see you in the near future.  Mayte Plascencia General Manager 714-898-4043

Summary Heading: My go to hotel for sure
Summary: This is my second time staying at this hotel. First time with renovation. It's perfect. Hotel staff is accommodating, hot breakfast buffet, and with the three day holiday stay the price was awesome! 10 to 15 minute drive to Disneyland and 30 minute drive to staple center. That was our purpose coming here. Disneyland, California Adventure, Lakers game and lots of grub! They even have a cute putt putt in the back with nice landscaping if you want to eat outside. One downfall is the stairs, it can be a little scary to go up and down, so please be careful. We had to exchange rooms because our toilet wasn't working properly and at 3am in the morning, the front attendant was more than accommodating. No questions asked! You will not find a cleaner place near DTLA for the price and
Manager Response: We thank you for your business and are happy to hear our front desk attendant was more than happy to move you rooms. Please consider us for your future stays.  Thank you, Olga Plascencia Guest Services

Summary Heading: Check everything before you decide to stay here!
Summary: Check everything before you decide to stay here!    The bed was broken and there is no hot water. Be aware when a place offers a full 100%  refund in only the first 5 minutes of being there.   I would not go back to that Best Western. Hopefully not all of them are like that.
Manager Response: We apologize that you encountered issues with our room on your two night stay. We are always eager and glad to move you rooms or have the opportunity to make it better for you. We have a Service Promise to all of our guests that reads "if something is not meeting your expectations please let us know, We want to make it right". Our guests satisfaction is our number one priority and we will make our best effort to make your stay pleasant or if you choose to leave within a considerable time you are offered to do so free of charge as we are confident we can make it right. We are pleased to see that this practice has made us better and genuinely friendly. We hope you consider and stay with us in the future!  Thank you, Mayte Plascencia General Manager

Summary: I stayed in a double queen room with my three children. The room was clean, comfortable and quiet. The area seems safe, breakfast was included and we have no complaints. I just wish they offered bacon for breakfast too because I don't like sausage. There is a heated pool and the kids enjoyed playing ping pong and golf outside when they had a few minutes to kill. We came here to visit Disneyland and the hotel was only a 20 minute drive from there so not too bad. Thank you for a nice stay.

The hotel was very clean and well-maintained.  I found the staff to be very welcoming and friendly.  Our room was clean and the bed was comfortable.  In-room WI-Fi worked well as well as the TV.  I will use this hotel again when in the area.

Wife had a tax seminar in Long Beach, I ended up staying at the hotel.  Spent an hour at the breakfast watching the LA fire, then played on one of the two computers in the lobby. Was ready for a nap, when the owner brought in lunch for the employees and invited me to partake. Very nice room, bed was extremely comfortable, a nice breakfast and very friendly employees.  Highly recommended if in the area.

I absolutely love this hotel it is my favorite hotel to stay at hands down bottom line I recommend this hotel to everyone. If you're ever in Westminster you need to come and check out this photo it is the best ever I love it I love it I love it I'm seeing me here I'll be hanging out next week.

I love the staff here they're always very welcoming and accommodating I'm a busy guy with a lot going on and they always are understanding when I need to make adjustments and special request for the room and or late check-outs and I really appreciate it thank you to the Westminster Best Western Westminster Inn for always being there for me

We had a very pleasant stay in Westminster.   The motel exceeded my expectations for the price. Room was clean, except slight lingering cigarette smoke - - not the fault of the hotel that people can't follow the rules.  Comfortable, some street noise on the weekend. Great for an overnight or short southern CA trip on a budget.

This Best Western is a good location to getting around to the beach, Disneyland, freeway, Walmart, Albertson mall, 711, Restaurants, Westminster Mall, Vietnamese town and Korean town are close by the hotel. The staff is great and helpful.  Great pool and spa view just outside of the patio glass door with Patio with chairs in the patio area! The bed is very comfortable. The room is clean and has a microwave and good size fridge and lots of TV channels including ESPN, CNN, HBO, etc. Good water pressure and shower head ‚Äì love the shampoo and shower soap dispensers. Great breakfast with good hot items like scrambled eggs (also boiled eggs with shell available), sausages, potatoes, and waffle plus other standard pastries, cereals, milk, and coffee. Free parking. I would definitely

I love the extras like putting green and ping pong table. Room was large with 2 big chairs. Good tv channels with a working guide. Really good breakfast. I will stay here again. It is decorated very nice for the holidays

Pretty descent place to stay for the price. Restaurants and malls are close by the hotel. The staff are great and helpful. The only problem was my room needed repainting and the bathroom needed to be remodeled.

This is our 9th time staying at this wonderful establishment.  Being it was Thanksgiving, we didn't want to leave our belonging in the trunk too long.  Jessica and Teila were very caring and efficient in working with our needs.  Awesome stay!

This property has been upgraded since I stayed here the last time. The rooms include a full kitchen and sitting area. The bed is new and very comfortable. I would definitely recommend this property and I will stay here again.

I‚Äôve stayed at Best Westerns all over the US. This one is affordable, quiet, and has a good breakfast offering. Free parking. Very friendly staff and room was comfortable. I will come and stay here again. Thank you Best Western Westminster!!

The motel is nice . I liked the pool ate and spa . The room was clean except the hot water didn't work and writing on the wall . I breakfast was good. I would stay at this property again next time I pass thru

room was next to busy road and very loud in room. neighbors above were running around and making lots of noise too. was very difficult to sleep for the whole family. called front desk and complained but still continued for another hour until the noisy neighbors went to bed on their own.
Manager Response: We thank you for staying with us and apologize that the neighbors upstairs were noisy. We understand how important it is to have a good night rest. We will implement follow up calls to make sure noise issues are handled in a timely matter. We hope that you will consider staying with us again in the near future.  Thank you, Mayte  General Manager 714-898-4043

Summary: we were on family trip, the accommodated we were close together, food was great front desk agents were very patient but we got everything done, the housekeepers were great...love this hotel and first visit there

Summary Heading: You get what you pay for
Summary: Travelled all week and was hoping for a good night rest before my business meeting next day. Check in and out staff were very pleasant. Room was super outdated, had a lingering cigarette odor, a/c and heating was super loud, the worst part was the bed. Super used, squeaky, loud, and could feel all the springs. Extremely uncomfortable. If you have business meetings the next day, probably should stay here. Barely got any rest because the bed was so uncomfortable.

This Best Western is a good location to getting around Orange county. Close to the beach, Disneyland, freeway and is easy to get to. The Inn is clean and friendly with a good nights sleep. It is close to Boeing and other business.

Was at this property 1 year ago and decided to stay here again on our family trip and once again had a great stay. Everyone is courteous and welcoming. All the staff go above and beyond they made sure our room was clean and ready after our long days out in Disneyland. Breakfast was great cant complain. Once again i had an enjoyable stay and will return soon!!!!

Nice spot ! Rooms clean , some rooms have patios awesome .. jacuzzi hot and clean breakfast simple but good .. nice size rooms . Overall enjoyed ourselves. Ping pong table . Ice machine works lol .. we will come back

Not a luxury accommodation, but a perfect fit for the budget minded who wants to get out on vacation. Loved 10 minutes to the beaches. Neighborhood isn't  inviting, but the hotel itself is private enough you don't notice. Also close to Walmart and other stores. Breakfast is adequate to start your day with. Staff is personable and very accommodating of any requests.

Summary Heading: Great stay. I also choose this motel when doing business in the area.
Summary: The pool area is especially nice, but It could benefit by a bathroom adjacent to the kitchen area.  We always select this motel when in the area because it is comfortable and convenient. The check in and checkout were a breeze.

This was our third stay at this hotel. Like always - no disappointments ! The rooms were clean, the service was great. The pool and jacuzzi are well maintained. Plenty of parking outside. Close to shopping and Disney. We would pick this place again !

Summary Heading: Not a bad little hotel, just DON'T eat the hot free breakfast!
Summary: My stay was fine, the staff was pleasant and the room was clean and presentable.  The big complaint I have was with the free complimentary breakfast.  The cereal, yogurt, waffle maker, etc, was all fine (hard to screw that up), but the sausage and powdered scrambled eggs were SO DISGUSTING!!!  dont even dare eat it.  the sausage was something I wouldn't feed a stray dog.  there was a long peice of pig artery sticking out of the link I bit into, almost made me throw up.  Come on, how much more would it be to get some half decent breakfast sausage on the table?  The OJ was super sour tasting also, couldn't even drink that as well.  The last thing I did before I left the room in the morning was throw a whole plate of breakfast and full cup of OJ in the trash can, which is right

I do not have 1 complaint! Service was excellent! Rooms clean and comfortable! Staff wonderful and friendly, and breakfast was great everyday! I stayed for several days and the service was consistent no matter who was working! Will definitely be back to stay again!

The hotel was clean and surprisingly quiet for being on a busy street.  It was convenient to local attractions and places to eat.  The staff was very friendly. The beds in our room could use replacing, big dips on both sides.

Very clean and cheery, room was comfortable well prepared. Check in staff was friendly knowledgeable and capable. Had no idea this  property was here and will definitely stay again,. Good Family environment and well groomed and maintained grounds. Based on the surrounding Hotels and prices this is a deal of the century.

Stayed 2nights just to visit friends & Vietnamese Community area (Phuoc-Loc-Tho Plaza). About 12-15mins drive to Bolsa Avenue where all the good foods are. Nice, well maintained Inn. Great for family with kids like us: BW Inn has a small swimming pool, a ping-pong table, a mini golf area. Check-in, check-out was fast. Staffs were helpful and caring, went all the way to assist our requests.  The only thing need to mention is they have limited breakfast options for whomever concerned. We only went to breakfast for milk/juice & fruits for the kids.  Would definitely stay here again.

The best very Western hotel was the best it was fun to be here and I would recommend anyone to stay here. Also they had great staff and the room beds were so comfortable to sleep on I had a great time at the best Western Hotel.

Summary Heading: Family trip had fun went to sleep
Summary: The hotel was very comfortable the blankets were clean that shower felt so good and it was very good maintenance the towels are clean soft comfy the pillows are so comfortable the floor so nice nicely vacuumed the refrigerator has so much room we put some of our drinks in there and they got cold real fast I enjoyed my stay at Best Western Westminster Inn

Good clean quiet location. Great breakfast options. Very friendly polite employees. There's a pool, hot tub and mini golf course. Great amenities and wonderful weather. Would definitely stay here again.

We stayed for two nights in August, the rooms were clean and air conditioned. The only issue was the shower was a bit loose. We will probably stay again next time we are in Los Angeles. The hotel is situated near to Disney and Universal. Also close to Huntington Beach, so it's quite good if you are going to these attractions.

Small hotel. The room was comfortable, close to the pool. It was clean. Housekeeping and breakfast staff were really nice and helpful. Hotel was close to the beach and restaurants. Not too far from Disneyland.

Summary Heading: Very good, helpful staff, clean rooms
Summary: The service was really nice. The food was good too. Monica was really nice and helpful. I reccomend it to other people.  The rooms were clean.  The pool was very nice and clean. The rooms were big. The location is very good.

Summary Heading: Our new favorite hotel for our regular So Cal Trips
Summary: We have recently started using Best Western hotels for our monthly Southern California family business and pleasure trips. This is our first time in the BW Westminster Inn and we will be staying here again on our monthly trips.  The hotel and staff are a friendly combination at an affordable price.   We especially appreciate the included full breakfast even though seating is a bit limited and crowded when the hotel is fully booked. To make up for it the attendents were quick to wipe tables as guests finished.  Additionally we like that the guestroom widows (on the 2nd floor and first floor patio doors) are fully openable to enjoy the coastal breezes.  The room was clean and smelled fresh. It had more than amble seating with 2 table chairs and 2 overstuffed chairs which we find

This hotel was a one night stay before heading to Del Mar, CA.  The location right off the freeway was very convenient. Due to another review knew to ask for a room away from the freeway.   We were gone from our room for most of the afternoon/evening. When we returned and headed to bed there were guests using the hot tub which happened to be just below or room and the normal speaking conversations could be heard. We watched TV for a bit and then at midnight when we turned it off, they were still talking. One quick call to the the front desk and they took care of it.   Beds were comfortable and room was clean.  Morning breakfast was ok, though very crowded. Definitely not enough seating for all who want to dine.

We went to hotel to stay they night. We were tired. Imagine our distress when the  people in the next room were loud, slamming the doors many times and speaking in very loud tones .So we requested another room. and 20 minutes we got there 2 roaches were in the bathroom. We left and got a refund and slept in our car.
Manager Response: We apologize that your stay was not pleasant and that you were not able to sleep in either of the two rooms that we tried to accommodate you in . That is why we fully refunded you and we had our supplier Dewey Pest Control completely review our rooms and while we did not find any roaches we wanted you to be happy. We strive for superior customer care and want all of our guest to enjoy there stay with us.   Thank you, Mayte Plascencia General Manager

Summary: Loved the outdoor patio space and kitchenette ...staff was so kind and accomodating and room was clean and .comfortable.  This was not my first stay at this hotel. I loved it so much that I chose to stay here again.  Best Western seems the best fit for me...from the continental breakfast to the kind and caring staff.  Rooms seem quiet and you can enjoy a great night's sleep.  Pool and hottub are great additions.
Manager Response: Thank you for being a returning customer we are always delighted to see familiar faces. Its great that you were able to enjoy the outdoor space. We look forward to seeing you again.  Thank you, Mayte Plascencia General Manager

Summary: This hotel is always clean with a very helpful staff.  The rooms are very pleasant.  Whish all Best Westerns were like this, Great location for me. Room amenities are always fresh.  Parking is easy and breakfast is fry complete, eggs meat, waffles, oatmeal all you could ak for.
Manager Response: Its always a pleasure to have you staying with us. We are happy to hear the location as well as the amenities provided were to your satisfaction.  Thank you, Mayte Plascencia General Manager  714-898-4043

Summary: Staff was very friendly helpful our group was large and they helped with all I mean all our requests housekeeping you rock !! Front desk üëçüèº Breakfast you kept up with the crazy full house ! I will recommend this property to whom ever is in town !

Customer service is fantastic. They went out of their way to help me out with the air conditioning and directions. They have a pool, hot breakfast, and computer center.  I would definitely stay here again. Thank you!

I like the great access to the freeway, surface street traffic is minimal. I liked that the hotel was smaller size. The kids thought the miniature golf access was great since it was right outside our door on the lower level.  The free breakfast was decent enough.

Only our first day and the kids are loving that there is a pool ping pong and putting.     Adorable rooms and nice staff.  Can't wait till tomorrow to use everything.  The view isn't bad either   I have my two daughters and we will definitely be back.

Summary Heading: They have a little golf course!
Summary: This Best Western is definitely one of the better ones I have been to - clean rooms, good pool, nice hot tub and good service overall. The continental breakfast also has a lot of different things to choose from. The people who have helped us here have been very nice!

After a long day at the beach my family and I stayed at the Best Western in Westminister, CA. Tired and exhausted and boy did we get a great nights sleep. The bed was comfortable and the room was very clean. The pool and hot tub really topped everything off along with the continental breakfast.  Great vale for our stay!!

rooms are clean! we loved the pool and the hot tub was very big. i really enjoyed my time staying here. the breakfast was really good and the staff helped me kind anything that i needed if i was looking for anything.

It is a nice place, clean and comfortable. Staff is friendly and eager to help. Location of this hotel was perfect for our needs. The pool is clean and count with mini mini golf and ping pong. WIFI is great too.

Clean room and pool, we made a BBQ and it was nice a quiet, also the pool was really nice and clean, I recommend this hotel to anyone who wants to be in a nice place, quiet environment for everyone in here

A nice stay in Westminster. Close to Huntington and Sunset (with car). Pleasant front desk and plenty of parking.. Felt secure at the inn and the pool was a great bonus.Only negative was the AC which turned itself on and off during the night which was noisy. Coffee, orange juice and ice available throughout the day at reception ans was use of computer and printer if needed.

Always enjoy Best Western and the value is always good. Clean rooms, no hassles, great for a business trip. The breakfast makes it easier for me as I can get right to work and not have to find a place to eat. The staff is always courteous and helpful.

Nice hotel. They have golf, pool, ping pong, continental breakfast. They do take a $100 deposit that they will return to you upon check out. Good hotel, yummy breakfast. Would recommend for anyone visiting LA
Manager Response: We are glad you stay was pleasant as well as recommending us. word of mouth is very much appreciated. Thank you for mentioning the security deposit that we asked from our guests like you mentioned it gets returned upon check out.   Thank you, Olga Plascencia Guest Services

Summary: Very comfy hotel, there is a mini golf course, a pool and a jacuzzi! Their breakfast is pretty good as well. Would recommend to my friends and family! Really good breakfast, they have apples omelette and waffles!
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest and for recommending us to your family and friends. Even now with so much technology word of mouth is inevitably the best reference a business could ask for.   Thank you, Monica Alanis Guest Services

Summary: The hotel really has a great breakfast, has wi-fi but it has problema when the hotel has a Lot of people, has nice bed, but for me the room is a bit small with no kitchen. You can use the printer if you need print something
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and we want to let you know we do have rooms that are larger with a kitchenette. It has a king size bed as well as a sofa bed and larger than our standard rooms. We can always accommodate you in one of those rooms when you are in the area.   Mayte Plascencia General Manager

Summary: This place is great! The back yard is very pretty, and the pool is nice! The beds are spacious, with good quality pillows. The mini golf in our backyard is super fun! TV has many shows and it has nice quality.
Manager Response: Thank you for enjoying your stay and for having the time to enjoy our amenities at the mini golf area as well as the On Demand options our Tv's have to offer. We would love to have you as a guest when you are in the area.  Richard Chana Guest Services

Summary Heading: Great value for money; enjoyable stay
Summary: We stayed here for two nights. Nice quiet room, 2 queen beds, terrace overlooking the pool area. Breakfast ok. Parking in front of your room. Location is fine, I405 just half a mile away. The only thing I found less relaxing were the electricitywires near the hotel, you can constantly hear them buzzing when you're outside (inside you don't hear them). But the hotel can't help that. Friendly helpful staff.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and choosing us over the many options you may have. We hope those electricity wires won't prevent you from staying again with us. They are thank fully high enough but understand the noise may have caused a little inconvenience. We can always offer to accommodate away from the street or provide different location of a room to make it more relaxing.  Thank you, Dana Le Guest Services

Summary: My family stayed for two nights and really enjoyed all the hospitality. Stayed in a room with a patio overlooking the pool area which made it easy to keep an eye on the kids. Breakfast area is a little small but still had a variety of items to chose from. We would definitely stay again.
Manager Response: Its great to hear you enjoyed your stay and were able to spend some time on our inviting patios. We must agree that for parents it makes it easier to watch kids from a comfortable space.We look forward to having you stay with us in the near future.  Thank you, Mayte Plascencia General Manager

Summary: Great place to stay. Good breakfast. Like this place a lot. Would come back. I like this area close to everything I was looking for. The beach was really nice around the area. Should come here the next time
Manager Response: We are glad you liked the breakfast and found everything you were looking for. Thanks for choosing us for your next time stay!  Olga Plascencia Guest Services

Summary: Wonderful stay. Very clean, great staff.  Pool area is nice, and has a grill for cooking out. Right off the 405 so easy access to anywhere we wanted to go. Will book here again when we are back in town.
Manager Response: We  thank you and look forward to seeing you in the near future!  Thank you, Richard Chana Guest Services

Summary Heading: The best customer service in town
Summary: The place is really nice and clean, the personnel is really helpful and the beds are comfortable. The wifi is better than other hotels and they have a pool and a working grill for the awesome weather.
Manager Response: We are glad to hear that you had a pleasant stay and were able to use the grill.  We hope to be your place of stay when you are in the area.  Thank you, Mayte Plascencia General Manager 714-898-4043

Summary: When I first arrived at the hotel, I was disappointed because it turned out to be a small inn with no elevator but the room is adequate, a little noisy because it is near the swimming pool. The quality of the breakfast is good, better than I expect.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and for giving us an opportunity to be your place of stay. Please let us know if you stay with us in the future and we can do our best to accommodate you away from the pool to offer you a more quieter room.  Thank you, Dana Le Guest Services

Summary: Overall room was clean. Bathroom could use some updating. Kitchen faucet leaked. Pool closes too early at 8pm. Not enough guest parking. I always stay with best western but wasn't excited this time. Didn't get what I paid for.

Fast WiFi, good breakfast, small breakfast area, good air conditioner, price too high, friendly workers Quiet at night, bed was comfortable, right off the freeway I would give the overall stay a 9 out of 10.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us we are glad that your stay was pleasant. Our current rates are higher do to summer season however we welcome any input  from our guest and make changes accordingly. We look forward to you staying with us again in the near future.   Thank you, Mayte Plascencia General Manager 714-898-4043

Summary: I am a CA native but have lived in New England for over a decade. I come once a year to visit family and found this hotel a few years ago. I needed something affordable and close to my family but also something that I felt safe in with my husband and son. We were so happy when we checked in here. All of the staff was so nice and the pool, hot tub, mini golf green, and ping pong made my son's day and the cleanliness, price, and comfortable rooms made us know we found the perfect hotel for our needs. We've returned and we're always met with smiles and the comforts of home... this year we had to come back for my grandfather's funeral. It has been a devastatingly heartbreaking trip. Upon checking in, I was met with the same happy faces, lightening my burden. When the staff found my
Manager Response: We thank you for your kind words,  we are happy  to have put a smile on your face through your hard moments. We look forward to having you as a guest every time you are in the area.   Thank you, Mayte Plascencia General Manager

Summary: Check in was easy, staff was great. We were checked in and in our room in 10 minutes. The room was close to tons of parking spaces. Nice and clean, beds were super comfortable! Water pressure wasn't great but the overall stay was good. Will stop here again!

Great room, very clean.  Nice staff. Great experience. We stayed over night, check in was easy and quick. Our room was handicap accessible, clean and spacious. The patio was pretty private also and well maintained.

Summary Heading: Best hotel in a last minute booking
Summary: The room was prefect, service, kids loved the pool and breakfast was delicious, huge waffles with chocolate chip toppings, yummy!!!  We stay here again next year!! Great and safe place we came from camping and left our items tied on your vehicle and all items were untouched!!

We were very pleased with the hotel.  Have stayed here before and like all the remodel that has been going on.  The front desk staff was very helpful during our stay.  The location is great because  of where we are visiting family.  We will likely be staying here again on our next trip in the area.

My family just stayed a few days on vacation. The motel is a good location for Disney and OC beaches. They have a cool little putting green, ping pong table and pool area for the kids. The staff was great giving extra care for my family. Nice and clean.

Summary Heading: Well kept, friendly, and convenient.  Quick drive to Disneyland and Huntington Beach.
Summary: We had a nice stay in this comfortable, pleasantly staffed hotel. The room was fairly large with two queen beds that were firm and supportive. Parking is handy and the pool area is cute. Definitely a good deal.

Overall, this was a great stay. The beds were comfy, and the customer service was excellent. Monica did a great job in handling the reservation, and made things very easy for the stay. I would definitely stay here again if I was in the area.

Summary Heading: Very customer friendly and comfortable stay
Summary: We were visiting California for our summer vacation and found this nice little spot that was in middle of everything that we wanted to do so we made it our operating base. It is close to Seal Beach, Anaheim and Huntington Beach and not too terribly far from LA. The most important part of any business especially hospitality is customer service. This place was had very friendly people from the moment you check-in to any service you need.   The breakfast was usual fare of eggs, potatoes, sausages, bagels, toast (wheat or white), cereal with choice of whole, skim, and almond milk. Coffee was made fresh so was everything that needs cooked. What made it good was how friendly the staff was and ready to cater to your needs. When people are kind and nice in the morning it sets tone for

This was a wonderful Hotel!! The staff was incredibly professional and helpful and the hotel was very clean and in very close to many attractions!! I would definitely stay here again!! We may be back next month!!

Rooms was comfortable, included breakfast.  If you stay at this place and want transport to Universal Studios don't stay at this Inn it is outside Transport area of Aneheim caters for transport to Universal Studios if you don't want to drive there.

this hotel is very convenient for me and the kids located close to disney land and beaches.  very well run. breakfast in the morning.  clean rooms. parking lot is small. close to freeways. restaurants nearby

Summary Heading: Very nice hotel with friendly accommodating staff
Summary: We are staying here now and are enjoying this hotel. First of all the beds are very comfortable.  We have a 2 queen bed room and it works fine for 3 of us. It appears that this has been remodeled but retained some of the nice little things from an older property. There's nice shelves in the sink area to put your toiletries. The shower has good water pressure. Right now I'm sitting out on a nice patio with green grass and trees right by the pool. There's a putting green and badminton table in the yard. Nice place for your morning cup of coffee.  This is a two story so I recommend the ground floor as there are no elevators. The staff are very friendly and have accommodated every little request. There's very little road noise as it is not right on a freeway

I enjoyed my stay at best western because my kids enjoyed it.It was also very clean an the staff are very respectful an courteous. I stayed at that location a couple times already and I have enjoyed the stays because there rooms are clean and there beds are actually comfortable not like other hotels where there bed is hard so I would definitely recommend the best western to others.

Conveniently located with a nice pool, ping pong table and a little mini golf spot to keep the kiddos busy and everyone busy! Our family of four are very comfortable and we had our kids move here instead of the seedy motel they had booked!

The hotel is in a great location. It is a great price for what I am doing in LA. It has great amenities like mini golf/swimming pool/ping pong table/ and propane grill so you can do everything you need.

Very good customer service. The room was very nice and clean. Plenty of room space. They even have a grill for grilling. For some fun they also have a ping pong table and a small golf course too. So cool!

Pros-Close to the 405 freeway, local attractions. Clean Room. Quite.  Cons-Not in the best area, breakfast was subpar, furniture in room was worn and outdated, no USB ports or charging stations, small work desk with uncomfortable chairs. Small TV. Poor Wi-Fi connection. Parking Lot was dirty-trash cigarette butts everywhere.

Very clean rooms, decent breakfast including potatoes, sausage, scrambled eggs, cereal options, bagels;great price for the area, fridge and hair dryers in room, staff at front desk was very helpful once he appeared (it took us a while to find him as he was helping a guest, but no sign was left)express check-out made leaving a breeze

The check-in process was very fast. The room was very clean and ready for us to use when we got there. It also came with a full kitchen inside for us to use. Breakfast was a nice bonus while staying there.

Summary Heading: Amazing room for the money great value
Summary: Easy check in. Huge room. Amazing value. Stay here you will thank me. Bed is super comfy too. The kitchen was ready to go for my dinner and the staff was prompt and courteous even when I forgot my key in the room. For the money I have stayed at similar properties for twice the money

The room was awesome! Comfortable beds, clean room, nice TV, and excellent amenities including ping pong and a nice pool! The breakfast in the morning was also very nice and yummy! Definitely recommend and would definitely stay again!!!

Nice clean hotel. Great price. Pool is clean and a good size. Love how the hotel has shampoo and body soap dispensers in the shower. Beds are comfy and rooms are a good size for a family. Golf area is a bonus
Manager Response: We are glad you enjoyed your stay and the golf area. We hope you come back soon.  Thank you, Richard Chana Guest Services

Summary: The environment is very clean and beautiful. Breakfast in the morning if calm and relaxing mostly the food is good and fresh! Outside pool is really enjoyable so is the hot tub. The staff are kind and helpful!!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and choosing this place over the many options you may have had.  Thank you, Richard Sanchez Guest Services

Summary: The hotel was super friendly the second we got here we were helped with excellent service. The breakfast in the morning was great and we looked forward to it every morning. The hotel has a pool and hot tub which are kept very clean. I have had a few bad experiences with hotels but this is not one to them. It was an excellent stay!
Manager Response: We are delighted that you were welcomed and enjoyed the amenities that we offer. We look forward to having you stay with us in the near future.  Thank you, Mayte Plascencia General Manager

Summary: This hotel was awesome. Their food was great and we had no problem with any staff or hotel room problems. The front desk was especially nice! The pool was very clean and the putting green was also an awesome edition to the hotel experience
Manager Response: Thank you, we hope you visit us soon.  Mayte Plascenica General Manager

Summary: The motel isn't much to look at from the outside but the room was very nice and clean.  There was a refrigerator, microwave and coffee maker if you wished to use them.  The breakfast was good and quite adequate to get you started for the day.

I had a wonderful experience. I continue to stay here and other Best Westerns. I look forward to coming back many times in the future. The staff at this hotel in Westminster is so pleasant. I would recommend this place to anyone who is looking for a great hotel experience.

This hotel has a good breakfast with a good variety. It is close to Starbucks for all the people who desire that. Also is close to a great fresh doughnut store that sells delicious pastries. It was perfect for what I needed and priced right.

great pool, hot tub. cleaning staff is so friendly. bed is comfy. walls are a little thin. breakfast is eggs, potatoes, sausage, and cereal, and bagels. they also have yogurt and coffee and orange juice!

The hotel was located right by the freeway and it was easy to get to where we needed to go. The hotel is an older one but room was clean and spacious. It had enough room for a family of 4. It has a giant TV which was a plus and sliding glass doors to the pool area. Had some issues with the min-fridge keeping cold (it was just an old unit). Overall for the value we would stay here again!

Out of no where needed somewhere to stay, and this place was  AWESOME! It was so clean and so spacious. They had breakfast in the morning which was great!   We had double beds, they're was tv and cable . And we where right next to a beautiful view .

Good breakfast. Nice roooms. Free water wth the rooms. Only thing I wish they had would be a gym. But other then that, good location and close to everything that we needed. I would recommend this hotel.

Definitely would stay again. Staff very nice and helpful. Room was clean and bed was comfortable! Breakfast was simple but good enough to have a quick breakfast. The parking lot was well lit and we were able to park close to the room!

Summary Heading: dont make any suggestions or  requests  you  will  be  accused  of  yelling  at  the  kitchen helpers
Summary: I checked  into  this  hotel  with  a very  warm  welcome  by  a  young  hotel clerk  ..later  we  asked  to have  the  beds  turned    they  looked  at  me  like  I  was  from  mars  and  told me  cant  be  done  till  later..  definitely  wear  holes  in  the  2 queen  beds  we  stayed  in .. I  made  a  suggestion  to  use  a  small  temp  trash  container  in  the  breakfast  room  to speed up  the  coffee  line  [it  was  immediately  used  by  all  the  other  customers  ]  but  I  got  a  ''mind  your  own business stare '' from  the  hired  help .. the  same  ones  that  are became  noisy cleaning  chairs  and   laughing and   kakling  with  each  other  in    Spanish  ..thinking  that  I  don't  understand  ..never mind  that  its  just  plain  rude  to  be  so  loud in
Manager Response: Good morning Sir,  We welcome all reviews and or suggestions its the only way we can improve. We strive for superior customer care with all of our guests. Unfortunately we could not please you even after multiple attempts. All of the suggestions are taken seriously however in your case the suggestions were screamed at and yelled at to our attendants making the guest having breakfast uncomfortable as well.  We value our guests as well striving for employee satisfaction.  As a past professor of business and hotel management that is very important in any business   sincerely Syed s

Summary: Booked hotel for the low price... extended our stay for the room, grounds, and staff! Dana and Monica are very sweet and efficient, most welcoming at the front desk. Had a couple issues, but they addressed them immediately! Huge room, comfy bed, humongous TV... the biggest I've ever seen in a hotel room! King suite with Kitchenette also includes a stovetop so we cooked four meals and saved money in eating out which is a great benefit to us. Would def recommend to anyone and stay here again!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review we are delighted to hear that your stay was great and that the staff greeted you with warm welcome. We look forward to seeing you in the near future.  Thank you, Mayte Plascencia General Manager

Summary: Service from Dana and Monica at the front desk and Lorenza of the housekeeping team was awesome! The room, a king suite with kitchenette had more than we expected, it had a stovetop as well! I love to cook due to health issues, so that was a big plus. The view of the pool and grassy area was wonderful and my daughters enjoyed playing outside. Extended our stay an extra night!
Manager Response: We are glad your stay was pleasant and more that you extended an extra night with us.  Thank you, Mayte Plascencia General Manager

Summary: This is my "go to" hotel for any activities in the Long Beach, Orange County area. Freeway close! Although it is not a five star hotel it meets my needs for a clean room with a comfortable bed and friendly staff. I have always found their prices to be lower than equal hotels in the area. Close to beaches and good food is a plus. They have a BBQ, pool, ping pong and putting green! Definitely family friendly!
Manager Response: We are glad your stay was pleasant we hope that you come back and stay with us again in the near future.  Thank you, Mayte Plascencia General Manager

Summary: Clean, affordable, motel with free hot breakfast included with stay. We stayed a total of 4 nights. We were gone exploring during the day and each night when we returned the ac had been turned off in our room making it very hot and uncomfortable until the room cooled off. The hot tub was a nice feature. Most of the staff didn't seem too interested in the service they provided with the exception of Margarita who stocked and ensured the breakfast area was well stocked and clean. Each morning she greeted us with a smile and a good morning. I would stay here again as it was affordable and clean.
Manager Response: We appreciate your feedback it's through reviews that we can improve each day. Our goal is that every guests feels welcome and joyful to stay with us. We are happy Margarita achieved that with you and will make sure all of our staff is engaged in providing superior customer care.  Thank you, Mayte Plascencia General Manager

Summary: This place is an excellent stay for the price. You can search and find more expensive places to stay if you want, but you'll be throwing your money out the window. The staff is very friendly and helpful. Beds and rooms are comfortable. You can control the climate in your room to your hearts content. Nice, free breakfast in the morning. Great freeway access. We'll definitely be back on our next So Cal visit. Thank you staff!
Manager Response: We are excited to read that you will be staying with us again. We look forward to seeing you again. We thank you for your business.  Thank you, Richard Chana Guest Services

Summary: This Best Western is a cozy and economical place to stay. The room was clean and comfortable. Hot breakfast was free each morning consisting of the essentials like eggs, sausage, yogurt, potatoes, coffee and waffles. Hot tub and pool were a nice feature. And there's a little putting green to practice your golf skills or for the kids to have fun.
Manager Response: It is always a pleasure to hear that our amenities such as the putting green were enjoyable and kid friendly. We also have a ping pong table that hopefully you enjoyed as well or on your next stay can also enjoy.  Thank you, Dana Le Guest Services

Summary: Decent breakfast, good outdoor area. Good location. I stayed here for business and I quite enjoyed my stay. They have a kind staff. The rooms are nice and spacey, with good amenities. No complaints from me! Solid stay for the amount paid.

Stayed two nights with the family...overall the hotel has what is needed for the family.  Breakfast can be busy but great services by the staff.  The quality of the bed can be improved...parking was hard to find at night.
Manager Response: We are glad you picked our facility for your two night stay with your family. We are undergoing many improvements to provide a better experience each time for our guests. We thank you for your business and look forward to having you as our guest many more times.  Thank you, Olga Plascencia Guest Services

Summary Heading: Not perfect,but it was a good price for the room
Summary: It was just an average hotel room. I expected the beds to be more comfortable,but they weren't which was a bummer when you are traveling and need a good night's sleep. The breakfast could have been better. Don't know what the scrambled eggs were but they weren't like you'd expect. It was quiet didn't hear any traffic noise. The shower  had a poorly designed shower head. The height was too high. I wish I could give this hotel a higher rating but I can't. Next time when I am in the area, will stay elsewhere.

Nice place to stay.  No elevator and somewhat dated interior and exterior.  However, it was much better than my February stay at the Hilton at LAX.  Had a very powerful mini fridge in the room that kept items cold.  Despite being close to the freeway and major street I did not hear traffic.  Very large bed in the room which was real nice compared to some hotels that give you a mini queen which is like a twin bed.

I would recommend this hotel to anyone in my company  it's a very clean environment  I enjoy the stay. I checked in the whole area of Long Beach and I wasn't satisfied with the facility's so I found this place on yelp and had very good reviews on this facility
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing us over the many options you as a guest had. We enjoy to hearing your comments. We hope you can stay with us again in the near future.  Thank you, Mayte Plascencia General Manager

Summary: Good clean room and great friendly staff! Could use a little updating or renovating. Cute mini golf and pool area. Would recommend and stay again as it's not too far from the 405 on and off ramps as well.

Room was clean and well kept Pool was small but nice Breakfast had a good variety. cereal, scrambled eggs, sausage and potato etc  Plenty of parking  15min drive to beaches  Area was safe Supermarket couple of mins away

This hotel is really great for its price, and what is included in the stay. The rooms were very clean upon arrival and all the beds were very comfy and I wasn't actually able to fall asleep fast! This place really is a hidden gem whether your from out of town or just need somewhere to stay, I wouldn't definetly recommend this place!
Manager Response: Great to hear you had a pleasant stay. I hope there was a typo at the end of your review and hope you would recommend this place.  Thank you, and we look forward to seeing you!  Mayte

Summary: The location and staff was great. It was very quiet and parking was efficient. The only complaint was the breakfast area and those awful eggs. But the staff was friendly and assisted in a timely manner. Renovations were under way, as this hotel is a bit older.

Stayed here for 6 nights again this year to volunteer for the Long Beach Grand Prix. This hotel always takes great care of us, and there are quite a few of us that stay here. They open breakfast early for us so we can be fed before our 545:am morning meetings at the track. Olga, Dana & Richard took extra special care of us during our stay with room changes, maintenance and overall fantastic customer service.  Thank you for always making us feel welcome!!!!!
Manager Response: It is always a pleasure to have you all stay with us and to be able to make you feel welcomed. We look forward to seeing you next year!  Thank you, Mayte Plascencia General Manager BW Westminster Inn 714-898-4043

Summary Heading: Convenient choice for visiting LA and great value!
Summary: We decided to stay at this hotel on our way to LA after spending a full day in San Diego.. we arrived quite late at night and checked into our room. The room itself was a bit dated but that didn't matter to us. We were given an accessible room and the bathroom was decent too. The best thing about this hotel was the breakfast which definitely exceeded our expectations. There was a decent variety of breakfast items considering the money you are paying and it even included some fresh fruits. Staff was friendly and I would definitely suggest this hotel if you are planning to visit Disney and other theme parks in Orange County!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us. We are going through some more enhancements this year that will update the property more. We hope to see you once more.  Thank you, Olga  Guest Services

Summary: We have always stayed here when we come to California.  We love the small atmosphere of this hotel.  This was the first time we stayed in one of their suites and I was so happy we did.  So much more room!  Will definitely say again.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing this property as you place to stay. Our suites are very comfortable and they have large screen TVs. We look forward too seeing you again.  Thank you, Mayte Plascencia General Manager 714-898-4043

Summary: Staff is really nice, they helped me out with all my questions and explained everything thoroughly. Great pool and hot tub, room was VERY clean and big with a great view. Only stayed here a few days, will be coming back here on my next vacation!
Manager Response: Very glad that you enjoyed your stay! Thank you for considering us for your next vacation.  Mayte Plascencia General Manager

Summary: My favorite part about this hotel was the staff, location, and food. The staff always has a smile on their face and was very helpful. It was located very close to the beach and also right by the freeway for places close in orange county. And you cant forget about the great breakfast!
Manager Response: We are glad your expereience was great. We strive to provide great customer service. We look forward to having you stay with us again.  Thank you, Mayte Plascencia General Manager

Summary: The rooms are great and always kept clean. Great pool and lounge area and also accessible parking. The hotel is in a good location also right next to the freeway with access to many places. Many options for breakfast in the morning and the staff is always open and willing to help when needed.

The rooms are clean and nicely furnished, with friendly staff. Good breakfast every morning with waffle maker. The bathrooms are nice, which is important to me. Convenient location right off the freeway.
Manager Response: We are glad that you enjoyed your stay. We look forward to seeing you!  Thank you. Mayte Plascencia General Manager

Summary: I was greeted in the morning by Richard who was very nice and respectful, the cleaning staff were sweethearts and overall a great experience. Grill, pool, putt course and ping pong. Can't beat that. I'd stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and are glad Richard provided great customer service. We look forward to seeing you again.  Thank you, Mayte Plascencia 714-898-4043

Summary: Staff was very welcoming, friendly and professional. my room was large with a very comfortable king size bed. the bathroom and vanity areas were very spacious as well.  There is also a very nice pool/garden area that made a nice place to relax outside.
Manager Response: The garden pool area is definitely a great relaxing place. Its secluded from the traffic and we are glad that you were able to enjoy it.  Thank you for staying with us!  Richard Chana Guest Services

Summary: Close to all south Ca. locations. Quiet big rooms. There is a suana and pool usually not to crowded. Lots of stores and restaurants nearby. Friendly staff and good breakfast Near room parking. I recommend for easy,no hassle stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for your survey and recommending other to stay with us. We look forward to having you as our guest in the near future!

Summary: The hotel staff was very kind and helpful. When we first went into our room, there was a huge spider on the wall. Also, the bed was super uncomfortable and squeaked every time you moved. Also seemed like people lived there.

I stayed here for a clinical rotation for school and had to search for something on a budget. My classmate and I shared a room. This was a reasonably priced room that offered everything we needed and wanted. The hotel rooms are really nice and the outside is really cute! This is a great way to go! Clean! Friendly! Great amenities (pool, hot tub, mini put-put)! Good breakfast (bagels, cereal, yogurt, eggs, bacon, waffles...)! Quiet! Lots of places to eat and go nearby! I highly recommend!!!

Small hotel. Close to lots of food places and not far from Long Beach. Pool area is cute. Next to driveway so it's loud. Provides free breakfast with yogurt cereal coffee waffle maker eggs sausage. The hotel is next to a Starbucks.

Friendly staff always ready to help, very clean, excellent house keeping! Free breakfast and free wifi. Very close to major free ways and close to good food! Pool side is very nice and it is very quiet here which is lovely for sleeping during the day!

pool and great coffee! friendly staff! breakfast was good, waffles and fruit and oatmeal. TV had good selection of channels and shower got hot quickly. i am quite satisfied with my stay here at this hotel.

Great place to stay. The hotel is close to shopping and area attractions.  You can relax after a long day in the spa. The putting green is a great way to relax. Staff is very friendly and have a positive attitude.  Rooms are clean and well maintained as are the grounds and exterior of the hotel.

Went on a business trip and was very happy with the rate, the room and the staff. It was a bargain for the area. Recently remodeled and you could tell. A hidden gem!  We were in 217 and had a view of the pool, ping pong table and little putting green. Even has a gas BBQ grill for use. The bathroom was clean and had a higher level toilet (grown up height) and the shower curtain that arcs out. My group felt satisfied with the complimentary breakfast too. Would stay again.

What a great price and a great value. Very clean rooms and friendly staff!! The beds are very comfortable!! Haven't slept that great in months!! I will definitely be returning!! Thank you Best Western!!

This hotel was perfect for my quick business trip! Free wifi, breakfast, and bottled water in my room! It was a great price and friendly front desk! We love Dana!!! Parking close the room and convenient washer and dryers!

I generally do not do online review, however I am very impressed with this hotel. The staff were very friendly and always willing to offer assistance. The hotel is clean and the hot breakfast was great. I highly recommend this hotel

The hotel was easy to find, the parking was convenient. Staff was nice and helpful. They had a very good attitude. The room was well dressed, the beds were fair and the lighting options were nice. The bed was fairly comfortable, worn a little past its prime but not a problem. The room we stayed in faced the busy street and was slightly noisy but no enough to wake me or the baby in the room. So overall not bad. Would stay here again

Had a great vacation. We went to the aquarium and the Queen Mary. After a long day out on the town it was nice to come back to the BW where we could relax comfortably. We shared a room with friends and when our baby got fussy late at night we came to the lobby to entertain him and put him back to sleep. Staff was very nice and understanding. Will always be staying at a BW!

Very clean and friendly. Breakfast is much better than you'd expect for the lack of restaurant/cafeteria and the size of the lobby. There was a bit of vehicle noise from the road but it was overall a very pleasant experience.

Very nice people and hotel!!!!!! This hotel was also a great value as the price was right! Near lots of stores and shopping and also close to all the DisneyLand and Knotts Farm stuff. The people here were very nice and efficient, I loved them all!

Excellent customer service, great rooms and great location. I love staying there . Highly recommend to anyone that like the beach area or shopping area. Very quiet and very clean property too. I love it.

Summary Heading: This hotel is great on a budget!
Summary: The beds were comfortable and the bathroom in our room was big. Loved the little private yard right outside our room. It was great for my son to run around. Although it says heated pool we went to use it and it was freezing. Too cold for my baby and young son. Loved the free breakfast! The front desk was very polite and helpful.

Less than $100 total for the night with a large clean room, separate sink area from the  spacious bathroom. Very nice and friendly. Wish all hotels were this nice for the price! Two large comfortable chairs, digital cable, desk and much more than you'd expect for the price!

My family of 4 stayed one night at this hotel during a soccer tournament weekend.  Our room was on the top floor, on the corner, on the busy street.  Traffic noise was awful.  The seal around the door was weak and it sounded like the door was open when it was not. We had to sleep with the fan on to drown out the traffic noise, but we could still hear it. The window was flimsy and did not seem to lock properly.  I ended up taking one of the curtain pull rods down and putting it in the window track for some peace of mind.  We asked for a different room but they were booked and unable to accommodate us better.  For the price we paid, we were quite disappointed.  The room seemed clean enough, but I would not want to spend more than the amount of time we did (basically to sleep) in
Manager Response: We are sorry your stay was not pleasant. It is only through feed back that we can improve. Our rooms may seem different than online as we have replaced all the carpets and bedding. On our pictures some carpets seem tan color however we now have a nice brown color with design through out. We are constantly looking for ways to improve and we take all our surveys seriously. We hope you will consider staying with us in the future and be a part of the exciting things the hotel will be improving this year.  Thank you, Mayte Plascencia General Manager 714-898-4043

Summary: I usually stay at the Best Western on Beach Blvd, but I decided to try this one because it was about ten dollars less.  Room was great, and it was closer to my business destination.  Breakfast was standard for this level of hotel, nothing bad and nothing exceptional.  My only issue was with the DVD player that was mentioned in the website.  The player was built into side of TV, but it did not work.  There was a disc spinning inside, but did not eject.  Before realizing this, I tried inserting a DVD that I just purchased into player.  The DVD was damaged due to spinning disc.  I requested to staff that Unit be replaced withe a different unit.  Front desk didn't seem to be aware that there was a DVD player buit into TV.  Staff member said he would have housekeeping remedy this for
Manager Response: We are glad that your stay was pleasant and that you gave us an opportunity. Our DVD players require a remote for it to easily eject and play. We apologize for not providing this to you. Please contact the hotel we would like to speak with you directly and provide you with better service next time you are in the area.  Thank you, Richard Chana

Summary: If you don't want to hear your neighbors conversations or sex noises, stay somewhere else. Otherwise, it's acceptable. Front desk staff is poor. Room was clean, but far older than the photo shown, and we didn't have a view or a large window, like the one shown.
Manager Response: We apologize that your stay wasn't pleasant the property although older has done a significant step to improve continuously. Our rooms have gotten new bedding that our current pictures don't show even new carpeting has been installed. We also have rooms with large sliding glass door. If our guest are unsatisfied we do our best to accommodate and provide a room that can meet your needs as soon as we are able to.  Please feel free to reach out to me if I can be of assistance to better understand your personal case when you stayed with us and hopefully get the chance to make it better.  Mayte Plascencia General Manager 714-898-4043

Summary: The hotel was good enough for the price paid. Parking is included and so is breakfast. It's a pretty close drive to Disneyland and LA.  The area of Westminster felt safe. We tried to go in the pool but it was way too cold!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us, we are glad you were able to enjoy our garden area. During this time of year is unusually cold for California. Our pool is kept at 70 degrees year round however with as much rain as we are receiving it may have caused the water temperature to drop. The spa is kept at 104 degrees we hope that the spa was a better option during your stay. We hope you will stay again with us again.  Thank you, Mayte Plascencia General Manager

Summary: Nice property, really great value.  Ground floor rooms have a patio that overlooks the pool area.  Putting green and gas grill for those that want to enjoy the outdoors.  I knew I picked the right property when I walked into the lobby.

Summary Heading: Why I love the Westminster Best Western Hotel
Summary: This is the only hotel I will stay in when I come into town to visit my family.  It's always very clean with a class A staff and the best breakfast in town. I have stayed there many times over the past few years to visit my family in Orange County.
Manager Response: It is always rewarding to be your preferred hotel. We love seeing familiar faces staying with us. Thank you for your business!  Alfredo Alanis Guest Services

Summary: The room is big and clean. The staffs here are all friendly. This hotel offers free wifi and parking. It has microwave in the room. The breakfast here is good. The hotel is like 2 minutes away from freeway.

Great place nice and clean staff very friendly.  Alfredo checked us in with a smile  Loved the water bottles in the room, so accommodating . I like decaf tea, they have that here for guests that don't drink caffeine.  Also the breakfast in morning is very nice

I just want started by say I was unsure about my stay at this location but to better then I expect love that the fact that there was kitchen in room was very big and cozy would  recommend this hotel to my friend if every in the areaüëçüèΩüëçüèΩ

Summary Heading: Fair value with an especially good breakfast
Summary: I arrived late after a red-eye flight from the east coast and probably got the last ground level room. I had a heavy suitcase. So I and didn't want to be on the second level. The room was was clean and generally OK. The furnishings are a little tired but acceptable.There was no convenient place to plug in a phone charger, so I had to do that in the bathroom.   The included breakfast was a highlight. It had everything I wanted, and was hosted by a very friendly and helpful gal who would come around and ask if she could bring you more of anything.

Very clean & comfortable! Friendly & helpful staff. I had a side corner room which was very quiet. I did not partake of the breakfast, but I'm sure it was good. They usually are. I will definitely come back here!

Summary Heading: Affordable quality and comfort in a great location
Summary: We had a great 2 night stay here while traveling through the area! The room was very comfortable and clean with everything we could ask for and the hotel amenities were great! We made use of the pool and hot tub area and even noticed a BBQ grill but didn't get a chance to check it out. The breakfast was served nice and early which accommodated our busy schedule and had many delicious options including scrambled eggs, sausages, potatoes, fresh waffles, and many other gluten and non-gluten items to choose from. Very convenient and safe location and it was very quiet at night. If we're ever back this way we will definitely stay here again! Thank you!!!

Conveniently located near the I-405 and the CA 22 very close to Anaheim. The huge room they assigned was a suite that included a kitchenette. Great friendly staff, specially the lady at the breakfast area.
Manager Response: We are glad you like our suite it does have the kitchenette and hope you enjoyed the pull out sofa as well.  Thank you, Olga Plascencia

Summary: Almost a five: everywhere is very clean, our room was spacious and comfortable and had two suitcase racks (very handy) instead of only one you normally find elsewhere. I liked the fact that shampoo, body lotion and shower gel were in dispensers instead of little plastic bottles (better for the environment). We also had a bottle of water each in the room.  Staff were friendly and helpful, and although the hotel isn't very far from the freeway you could hardly hear any noise. However there are two things that could be improved on: having some fruit at breakfast and some teabags in the room (there is a coffee maker but no teabags).
Manager Response: We thank you for your review, we will make our fruit easier to find, we place it on the counter throughout the day however could be easily missed from the breakfast area. We will improve.  Thank you, Alfredo Alanis Guest Services

Summary: We had to have a reservation 2 days from reservation date in an area that was very busy. Anaheim, California. We were able to stay within 15 minutes of our destination and also were able to save roughly forty five dollars over other best western hotels in the area. Very helpful staff at the desk as well. Small but adequate continental breakfast as well.
Manager Response: We thank you and hope you keep us in mind for your future stays!  Richard Chana Guest Services

Summary: Coming from NorCal, we have been staying in several places, but Best Western by far is the best from room service and quality. We checked in half a hour early and check out about 30 mins late, they were very cool about it. Free breakfast serve from 6-930am everyday which is amazing for those who doesn't want to go out in the morning. If you are planing to go to Disneyland or just visiting OC, I would highly recommend it this place. I will be back next year.
Manager Response: We look forward to you returning next year.   Thank you, Dana Le Guest Services

Summary: I really love this place. The room was so nice and service was awesome, especially the room make-up service really good at making our room flawless everyday! I also like the fact that they serve breakfast every morning. This is so far the best place to stay at because of the affordable price and great service.
Manager Response: Thank you, we hope you keep us in mind for your future stays.  Dana Le Guest Services

Summary: The place was clean and the staff was really nice. I would stay again.  There was a pool that looked clean and it wasn't hard to find the place. It made my stay less of a hassle and more enjoyable. I would rate it more stars if I could.
Manager Response: We are glad you enjoyed the pool and courtyard area, It is conveniently within the center of the hotel.  Richard Sanchez Guest Services

Summary: The rooms were very clean and the cleaning service was very good. The location was very convenient for us. Breakfast was daily with waffle, oatmeal, fruits, eggs, sausage, hashbrowns, tea coffee. We will come back if we visit again.
Manager Response: We will look forward to seeing you in the near future.  Thank you, Mayte Plascencia General Manager

Summary: I thoroughly enjoyed my stay here. The location was central to the area and close to shops, the freeway and tourist attractions. Staff members went out of their way to assist with all requests and were very friendly and courteous. My room was clean and smelled fresh. It didn't have that chemical "hotel" smell I usually find irritating. The water pressure in the shower was fantastic and it was nice that the sink area was separate from the shower area. Despite the proximity to the highway and major streets, it was peaceful and quiet and seemed to be very family-oriented in its clientele. I stayed in a ground floor room with a patio overlooking the pool. Picture attached.  I highly recommend this as a place for families or couples, looking for a quiet and cozy place to stay.
Manager Response: We thank you, we are glad you enjoyed the courtyard from your room. We strive for customer satisfaction.  Alfredo Alanis Guest Services

Summary: Very nice staff. Rooms were very homey. Very clean. Nice welcoming. I would definitely stay again. Great experience. Very clean pool. Delicious breakfast. And overall fast wifi for business. Pool was very clean even in the cold weather
Manager Response: We are glad you enjoyed your stay with us and look forward to seeing you!  Thank you, Richard

Summary: Great stay. The staff is very friendly. Breakfast was average. Fast wifi. Pretty close to freeway. And best of all the rooms were very clean. Overall next time i'm in westminster this will be the place to stay.
Manager Response: It's rewarding to know your experience was great and you will consider us when in the area.   Thank you, Alfredo

Summary: Came where to stay while we were on our way to see our grandmother in San fran. This hotel and service was beyond amazing the staff was extra helpful and friendly  My room was clean and the staff kept it clean. My breakfast was yummmmy! Front desk was sweet and helpful from check in to check out! I highly  recommend if your looking for a place to stay with great service and a nice room!
Manager Response: Great to hear your coming back!!!  Thank you, Alfredo

Summary Heading: Have had better experience in this property in the past.
Summary: Breakfast was mediocre at best.  The eggs were horrible, facilities were inadequate, poor food choices.  The room was very noisy from the street noise. The room seemed to be clean, but it was quite dark in the room, the lighting could have been better.  Location was OK.  We were visiting family in the Huntington Beach area.
Manager Response: We apologize that your experience was not the best. We offer a variety of food choices we have even provide gluten free options. We hope you consider staying with us again.  Thank you, Management

Summary: Nothing exciting that stood out but an ok stay for the price I would like the employees to be a little more personable. Front desk staff very accommodating however I think all staff should be able to interact with guests
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments!  Richard

Summary: We stayed NYE night and were so pleasantly happy that the staff was so nice when we checked in, gave us information about the area, wifi and breakfast. The room was exceptionally clean and extremely nice. It was like a small apartment and everything was in good shape. It was quiet and we got a great night's sleep even with it being New Year's. I will stay again for sure.  Thanks for the wonderful experience

Decent basic BW close to Little Saigon that we are visiting. Check in was quick and we was given a second floor room. The room is clean and average size equipped with two queen size beds, a refrigerator and small microwave. The beds spring would needed some help! it is making noise every time someone is getting up. The hotel is facing the main avenue so there is noise issue if you are a light sleeper, we keep the fan on all night to negated the noise. The property is old but the neighbor hood seem OK(look safe). Overall it is an average hotel to stay in for under $100.

Summary Heading: Exactly what you want in a hotel and more.
Summary: Very clean (which is really important to me), good breakfast, adorable putting course and individual patios for each first floor room. It was very quite and the staff was very nice and helpful.  A little pricey just because of the area, but it was money well spent.

Summary Heading: Great hotel for a nice stay
Summary: Going to Disneyland for NYE, this is a great option close enough to drive, 15 to 30 mins and out of the major Anaheim tax zone, friendly staff, clean rooms great time here plenty of parking and will return next year

My family and I stay here quite often and the workers have always been very nice and helpful. When needing to add an extra night to our stay during a busy holiday weekend they were very accommodating. We plan on staying here again next year.

Good convenient location. Good breakfast with egg hashbrowns sausage waffles cereal yogurt etc. Improved breakfast since last time stayed. This is our third time stating here and we will return. Good location for orange county and long beach area and huntington beach etc. Near residential area so pretty quiet. Will come again.
