Its spacious,everything is clean,everything works like it should and they're pretty friendly. I didn't like the hot water in the shower to take a while..on the other hand u got an spacious bathroom. The heater is a little loud but works pretty fast :).

This is my second stay at this property and I've enjoyed my stay both times. The staff is friendly and willing to help. Check in was fast and easy and my room was nice and clean. Breakfast was better than other places I have stayed at. Thanks again for a nice stay.

This is an affordable hotel that offers great service for the price.   The front desk staff is extremely welcoming and friendly.  Housekeeping kept my room clean and the free breakfast was great.  Definitely a good spot if you're planning to stay in the area.

This BW looks good from the outside, but, when we walked through the door to our room I was very disappointed. The room was not cleaned very well and the bedding had hair (both kinds of hair) on it. Yuck!!!! Don't stay here. Go to a hotel where housekeeping actually cleans the rooms and changes the bedding  when a customer leaves.
Manager Response: We apologize for not meeting your expectations. We strive for superior customer care and would have liked the opportunity from you to make it better. Please never hesitate to call if something is wrong or unpleasant. We would have taken any step to make you feel comfortable like giving you a different room or sending housekeeping immediately. Although this has never happened your stay and satisfaction is our priority. Please call at your best convenience we would like to speak to you personally. Please receive our apologies once more.   Management Mayte Plascencia

Summary: We have stayed over the years in many different hotels in the Orange County area and this time we found a gem. It would take a lot of space to fill up all my compliments about the hotel so I will summarize. The room was spacious, quiet, clean and comfortable. The staff from the front desk to housekeeping were very friendly and accommodating especially Olga who helped me at the front desk. The breakfast was great and had everything from eggs, sausage, waffles, fruit,cereal, pretty much everything you'd want.We will be returning next week on our way back from visiting Northern California and our glad we have this great safe hotel to come back to.

Summary Heading: The beds and pillows are comfy and my room was cleaned daily!
Summary: Some of the reviews had me skeptical of booking here, but I am so glad I did. The staff were pleasant and the property is well kept. The breakfast was really good and the price was even better. We stayed for a week and I will definitely book here again. It's central location is near everything from restaurants to shopping and grocery stores.

Family trip to visit in Seal Beach and watch the annual Boat Parade. Nearby without getting on the freeway. Rooms were decent, clean with average upkeep. Linens and towels were fresh and soft. Staff was helpful and friendly, always had a smile a "Good morning".  Rooms facing Westminster Avenue had road noise, but nothing beyond any busy street in the city.  Continental breakfast was filling.  Thank you!
Manager Response: We look forward to seeing you again in the near future!  Thank you, Olga Plascencia

Summary: Really clean, close to everything, fast wifi and the staff are extremely helpful  The rooms are really clean and there are plenty of channels, location it's perfect as is right off the 405 and there is an amazing Mexican place near by
Manager Response: We are happy to know you enjoyed the wide variety of TV Channels, and hopefully you had the time to browse through all the ON Demand movies.   Thank you, Alfredo Alanis

Summary: Breakfast is good..rooms were maintained clean and rooms were cleaned every day. Restrooms were maintained clean. Location is near to all shopping malls like walmart, target etc. Parking is very close to all the rooms.only thing that is missing is elevators.
Manager Response: Thank you for your survey, we hope you choose to stay with us again in the near future!  Thank you, Richard Chana

Summary: We are visiting  Disneyland and this hotel is half hour away from Disney. Parking is good enough and breakfast is good. Location is close to some convenient stores. Inside the room the carpet is little old but other than that the bed, restroom and appliances are in decent condition but could be better.Good economy hotel.
Manager Response: We appreciate your feedback its only through your comments that we can improve. We look forward to seeing you soon!  Thank you, Richard Sanchez

Summary: This place is awesome, good price an a very nice service ! Very clean and cozy,  staffs are super kind and service is professional ! Close to Huntington Beach and very good places and restaurants are around here
Manager Response: Its great to hear your stay was excellent!  Thank you, Alfredo

Summary: It is really good place to rest with your family, they have really good breakfast. They have pool, jacuzzi and small golf field that I enjoyed with my family, I'll  be back pretty soon because I love this place.
Manager Response: We look forward to seeing you!  Thank you, Richard

Summary: My family and myself stayed here for our 4 day Disneyland trip. I've been siked out before from online hotel pictures and in reality they are horrible. This is actually a little diamond in the rough. The outside isn't too nice on the eyes but the inside is really surprising. The beds are super soft and comfy. Microwave and fridge. I would not put my child in a nasty place at all. On my first night I encountered a minor problem, by morning it was all fixed and done with. No hassle at all. Very good customer service. The bathroom needs a little more TLC but definitely a place to stay at. It's worth it's price and the location is good.
Manager Response: We thank you for your feedback and appreciate your comments and suggestions. Our goal is to provide you with a great service and we are glad your minor problem was resolved in a timely matter.    Thank you, Richard

Summary: Was pleasantly surprised by this property. Looks just OK from the outside but rooms are nicely decorated and comfortable. They even provide 2 waters in the room, unusual for a budget property. Staff was nice and the hot breakfast was good with a nice selection. Only problem was the clerk who checked me in told me and the people in front of me the breakfast hours were 6-10 when in fact that's only on the weekends. It's 9:30 during the week. I got there at 9:30 and was able to eat but if I got there 10 minutes later, I would have been out of luck. That would have been a major fail. Staff needs to provide accurate info. Regardless, it's still a very nice hotel for a reasonable price and I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you, we appreciate your feed back we have informed all of our staff about the importance of providing accurate information. We are glad your enjoyed your stay overall.  Alfredo

Summary: The BEST WESTERN Westminster Inn exceeds expections of Customer Service!  The room was very plush, clean and well stocked with ameinities. The property grounds are well maintained. The staff is friendly and courteous!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to rate us, we strive to provide guests with great customer service.  Thank you, Alfredo

Summary: Stayed one night, the room we got was really nice, really peaceful and the beds are really comfortable.  Comes with breakfast, a mini fridge, and a microwave.  Rooms are really clean and the TV has good movies and shows.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review we value your opinions.  Mayte

Summary: Doesn't look like much from the outside but for the money this is a great little hotel. It is more like a motel than a hotel but it has a nice clean pool/warm tub (not hot) area, a BBQ grill, small putting green and ping pong table outside which is great fun for the kids.   Place is old but generally clean, bedding is nice/clean and the free full breakfast includes waffles, eggs, sausage, home style potatoes, yogurt, bagels, toast, coffee, juices, & cereal. Pool doesn't appear to be heated but seems warm enough since my kids spent hours in it.   It's fairly centrally located, short driving distance to beaches (seal beach, Huntington, long beach). In & Out and Fantastic Cafe close driving or decent waking distance.   One reviewer said its noisy but we feel like we are the only
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our property to such great detail. We hope to see you in the near future again.  Mayte Plascencia General Manager

Summary: I loved it it was fun thank u for all the great help overall i like to thank mayte she is a super nice person and thank the cleaning crew. And to daisy. She clend my room so good thakyou bestwestern i loved the stay
Manager Response: We appreciate your feedback and we are glad your stay was pleasant. Thank you for the compliments to our staff.  Thank you, Richard

Summary: Great place to stay with children or a group of people. A bit older, but clean and very friendly staff. Definitely coming back. And not too far from the beach! The owner rounds the facility and talks to his guests. A very personal touch. Love the ping pong table
Manager Response: We are thrilled you will be returning to stay with us, its pleasant to hear about your great stay.  Thank you,  Mayte P General Manager

Summary: This Inn has nice rooms, looks clean, and has a good breakfast. The beds are comfortable. A little noise from passing traffic, but great value for money.  The place has a pool and a nice backyard. Located in Westminster, the place is quite easy to find.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, we look forward to having you stay with us again.  Thank you, Alfredo

Summary: We're not too picky - but this place is noisy! Very thin walls. Lots of noise upstairs. Next door neighbors rolled in at 1:30am - woke us up. The hotel is nice and clean and affordable though. Only stay if you're a deep sleeper I guess!!!
Manager Response: We apologize that your stay wasn't the best, noise hasn't been a common issue. We value your feedback and will be more attentive. We do offer options if your assigned room for any reason is not up to par we will move you to another room. Our guests satisfaction is our goal.  Thank you, Alfredo

Summary: Best Western is a valuable hotel option in the area. Only blocks from In N Out and other food establishments, which is convenient for quick food runs. Has a heated pool, small put put mini golf, and ping pong tables. Friendly staff and waffles for breakfast! I would stay here again if in this area.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback, its always rewarding to reward great comments from great guests. Thank you for choosing to stay with us.   Thank you, Management

Summary: Very nice hotel with free breakfast and parking. Nice pool and calm neighbourhood. Strong wifi nice staff and close to major roads. We recommend. Also close to beautiful Huntington Beach and faboulous pier
Manager Response: We are glad that you enjoyed your stay with us, it is always rewarding to read good feedback. We look forward to seeing you again.  Thank you,  Management

Summary: Good sized clean rooms. Be sure to request a room towards the rear of the property, the street side rooms hears the traffic. Also, be sure to request a room overlooking the pool and garden area. There is no elevator.
Manager Response: Thank you we appreciate your feed back and look forward to having you stay with us.  Alfredo Management

Summary: I stayed here over the weekend and had to leave early due to a family emergency. The place was understandable and refunded me the night that I didn't stay. Quiet and friendly place. Would recommend this to friends and family.
Manager Response: Its always a pleasure to read of enjoyable experiences when staying with us.   Thank you, Dana

Summary: I booked this room at the last minute and got a great deal.  The room was very clean and the bed was very comfortable.  It had  its own fridge and microwave.  The staff was very friendly and they brought a crib for my baby very quickly.  Very satisfied!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review we appreciate all the feed back our guests provide to us. We look forward to having you stay with us again.   Thank you, Mayte Manager Best Western Westminster Inn

Summary: I booked this room on the phone....the attendant was very helpful and was able to give me a good discount for being military.  My wife was able to check in early with the children which was very helpful.  When I got to the hotel the room was very clean!  The room had a patio which opened to the pool area.  Overall this was a great experience and great location!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us we know you have many options when choosing a place to stay. We are glad to make a stay a pleasant one.   Than you, Manager Best Western Westminster Inn

Summary: A good value for the location. Expect quality to be on par with a motel 6, with better service.  Breakfast is included and is typical with other hotels in the same price range. Nice TV, moderately loud AC, and the shower had hiccups with occasional cold water (probably sue to wife using sink). Suggest not using sink while showering.   I would stay here again due to price and value for the location.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recognizing the extra things we offer. We have much larger rooms, fastest free internet, garden area with rose garden and activities like ping pong table and golf putting green. Our boutique hotel also offers free on demand movies on HBO etc.  Next time please try our Jacuzzi and pool area secluded from traffic noise.  Best Western Westminster Inn Mayte Plascencia

Summary: The rooms are huge and stocked with everything g you would need to stay for multiple days. Linens are of great quality, quiet area, amazing staff and good prices.  Full breakfast for the big eaters in your family
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us, it's always rewarding to see pleased guests. We look foward to seeing you stay with us in the future.  Thank you, Manager

Summary: This hotel was very clean and spacious. Check in was fast and easy. They have a pool and a small golf course. There are close stores nearby such as Albertsons, Ross and different places to eat. The continental breakfast includes a good variety. Definitely recommend!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us, we look forward to having you stay again with us.  Thank you, Manager

Summary Heading: Great location, pretty close to Disneyland
Summary: We stayed here a total of 6 nights and loved this hotel. It is about a 20 minute drive to Disneyland with traffic. Beds are comfy and the room was spacious. Quiet at night, took advantage of the complimentary breakfast so everyone was full before heading to DIsneyland. Staff was nice and professional. I was never concerned for my safety while staying here. My only 2 complaints are 1; parking, if you get back to the hotel after 8pm there is not very many options for parking. A few nights we had to park alongside the wall separating the hotel and the business next door. 2; our shower dripped constantly and looks like it has been for awhile as there was a water stain in the tub right where the water landed. Would definitely book this hotel again in the future.
Manager Response: Thank you we appreciate your comments. We definitely take steps to improve from important customers like yourself.  Mayte Best Western Westminster Inn

Summary: We have stayed twice now at this location for business,. The furnishings are dated, except the beds were comfortable.  The front staff was very friendly and accommodating, but it is an older building with steps and they not level in some areas.
Manager Response: We appreciate your comments and are doing many things to enhance our building like stone work, re doing our steps,  better lighting, artificial grass in our garden areas and improving our WIFI to 300 megs. We hope to see you again.  Mayte Best Western Westminster Inn

Summary: The hotel was nice and clean. The breakfast was very good of what u get, you get coffee and tea 24 hours a day. The rooms were a good size, lots of room to move around. Beds were very comfortable. The outside was clean, had a green space to play golf, a big pool that was very cold when we were there (beginning of October) and a hot tub. We enjoyed being there for a full week. Would love to stay at that hotel again. Everything is so close, your 26 minutes away from Disneyland and Knotts Berry Farm so very good location and same with the restrauants.
Manager Response: It is always rewarding to hear good experiences have come from staying with us. Thank you for considering our property for your stays,  Thank you, Mayte

Summary: Nice hotel with putting green, jacuzzi, pool, and free deluxe breakfast. Kids enjoyed the stay and close to beach and Disneyland! Price was reasonable, staff polite. The waffles in the morning have a heart shape in the middle.

Finding a value hotel for an overnight stay in the LA area is difficult. Sub-100-dollar hotels are rare unless you want to stay in an unsafe motel. I found this particular Best Western deal on their official website and it exceeded my expectation. I didn't expect the warmth I felt from the hotel, but both the service and the room gave me a warm feeling. The check-in was smooth and the room is well decorated. Although the furniture is aged but the room is clean and roomy. The area is quiet and convenient. Most rooms on the ground floor have direct access to the courtyard and the pool, with outdoor chairs and table.

Summary Heading: not a bad place for the money
Summary: My family of 4 stayed for 6 days and it was not bad for the price. I had asked for 1st floor, for I have bad knees and it was printed on my reservation, but the Inn states they never got that request and were totally booked when we arrived, but if I wanted I could move to a 1st floor the next day, just keep my bags packed and it would be in the new room. I said no, I wanted to be unpacked so I could enjoy the rest of my stay. In the 6 nights we were there we had 2 nights of hot water, rest cool to luke warm and we did not get back til after 11 most nights. Parking is horrible, if you do not get there early than you have to park in the drive way and hope no one hits you coming or going. We got 3 big towels, 3 hand towels and 1 to 2 wash cloths every day for a family of 4. It is

I drove in from Phoenix with my children not knowing what to expect upon arriving but was pleasantly surprised. The staff was welcoming and friendly. The room was clean and well managed. Love the outside grounds. They have a little bit of everything for our family to enjoy. My kids have told me several times "you picked a great hotel mom". Thank you Best Western for making a otherwise anxious mother feel very comfortable. I will gladly recommend your hotel to others.  üòÑ

Used as a stopover on the way to San Diego. Perfectly adequate for one nights stay - smooth check in, comfy bed and the breakfast selection was ok.  Having flown into LAX, the hotel was easy to find which was welcomed after a long flight

I LOVE THIS HOTEL!!!  The location is perfect, staff is wonderful, amenities are better than any other chain for the price.  Pool area is large and clean.  Beautiful grounds.  In room microwave and refrigerator, as well as coffee maker.

I had a amazing time not only with the hotel but with a sexy man!!!  The rooms are clean and the staff are excellent they have a pool and a ping pong table and a mini golf puttin green!!! I or should I say we will for sure be coming back soon!!!!

Summary Heading: Special time with a special someone
Summary: I had an amazing relaxing time at this clean friendly staffed Hotel. Javier was extra time informative. I was super impressed with the overall charm and Brilliance of this fabulous Hotel. I whipped my friend D******* in ping pong. While my girlfriend relaxed in the Hot tub Soaking WET

The entire staff has been personable & very helpful. Every morning breakfast was very good & the staff was always there to answer questions & help us. The breakfast is really good, today we check out  & Alfredo at the front desk as very helpful w directions & making sure we had everything we needed to drive home. Thank you so much - I recommend the Westminster hotel for everyone, great prices.

Stayed here for two days and thoroughly enjoyed visit.  Staff very helpful and courteous.  Rooms very clean and Maid service was on point.  They serve hot breakfast that was very good.  Would stay here on our next visit

Alfredo at front desk was always very friendly and helpful. Nice accommodations with good breakfast and close to freeways room service was on spot. Rooms were very clean. Plenty of towels for whole family. Would stay here again on next visit .

Ive been staying at this bestwestern off and on for about 3 months. I keep comming back because of the hospitality.  The front desk cl√®rks are always friendly and acomidatating. This bestwestern in particular is more comfortable then any hotel in this area. I recomend this hotel for familys , business,  or maybe romance.  The staff at motel has treated great and they deserve praise.

The room was nice, and the staff was friendly. There were no problems with checking in, and I would stay here again. The location is good and not too far from Huntington Beach. I recommend this place to anyone who just wants to just get away for a day or two.

It was a great time staying here. The place was so amazing.! 1The people were very nice. The staffs and employees were very helpful and friendly. The only thing  is that the pool was not warm after 5:00 pm. But what I think about this is that it was very wonderful.

The place was amazing and clean, the staff was wonderfully hospitable. The only problem was that the pool wasn't hot enough when swimming after 5:00 pm. The breakfast pastries and hot chocolate which you don't see very often, overall I was very satisfied with my stay.

The hotel was clean and Richard at the front desk was very helpful. I really like that internet and free breakfast is available. The hotel is located in a nice neighborhood. I would prefer this hotel over any other chain. The only thing I would change is having a room with AC. Overall great price for the area.

Summary Heading: Good hotel for the fair price
Summary: I came here on the Labor Day weekend to stay here two nights, is the trip that we go to Santa Catalina Island. Good  clean hotel, friendly service, very close to everything. Parking lot great very close to the room , they even have soap dispenser at the vanity, will be back

This best western is very clean. We accidently turned our a/c unit down too low for too long and came back to a really cold hotel room. To me, that's a plus! I liked that I could get the hotel to a nice temp after being out in the sun all day. They are also just a short drive from DisneyLand. We liked being so close to it. The breakfast is very good too. The sitting area is smaller then I am used to at other Best Westerns. We really liked there being breakfast potatoes, sausage, eggs, waffles plus many other breakfast items, so there is plenty to choose from where even the pickiest eater can find something. The shower water in our room was nice too. We got just the right temperature and could get it a lot hotter too and the pressure was good also. The staff was pleasant and

Very easy and quick check in. I will check in here again on my next visit. Very clean and safe area to stay. Just check in with your credit card so that there wont be a deposit. Free orange juice and coffee for breakfast!!!!

Came here from Phoenix on a trip to Knotts. We decided to stay another couple of days to visit the coast and decided to stay here which was a little ways off from the coast but it was a little more affordable. The rooms are nice and also very clean. The staff was friendly and also let me check in about 30 mins early. Great location close to everything. It was quiet and very nice. I enjoyed it.

Annual family reunion at Huntington Beach. Stayed the night.The night rented 2 room's. Very comfortable beds nice clean linen, the breakfast was wonderful, the pool and spa area are very nice. We will definitely return.

It has a ping pong table mini golf course swimming pool open view the bottom rooms have a patio entrance best experience. It has a nice restroom space , comfortable Beds chicken sausage waffles milk and apple juice

Our family has an annual beach party every year. We're always looking for a great hotel. We finally found one. This is an awesome location, friendly staff, and loved all the amenities.  Will definitely back!

We stayed at this location after our annual beach party. We arrived in the late evening and all rooms were ready and check in process no problems. We recieved all rooms exactly as reserved. The rooms were clean and spacious and the ouside patio area a nice place to hang out and relax. It is a perfect hotel for families and large groups!! We will come again!!

the children enjoyed the putting green and pong table felt like home had a little kitchenette the breakfast was outstanding several selections eggs waffles, cold or hot cereal. also breakfast is from 7am-10;30 not like a lot of other chains. i highly recommend bw

Summary Heading: Pretty decent spot in Orange County
Summary: The place is nice and centrally located in the Westminster, where there are plenty of food options (mainly Vietnamese) to choose from. Overall, other than spotty Wi-Fi which kept on not working, our stay was nice and peaceful. We stayed here for two nights in a queens room, which was clean and comfy. The hotel also offers a decent continental breakfast, with coffee and juices available throughout the day. I would recommend it if you're in the area.

I live in the L.A. area & wanted to get out of the city & found this little gem. It's nice, clean, amazing staff & cozy. My stay was great & ill definitely return to this location.   It's a great area for food & entertainment. You'll enjoy yourself.   Thanks for an awesome time.

Probably not one of the top Best Western hotels I have stayed in, but certainly very comfortable.  The room is clean and the beds are lovely (plenty of pillows available which I believe is highly important).  Just about worthy of three star status, probably helped by the excellent breakfast and recreation area which includes an outdoor pool with good quality furniture.

Javier doing a great job, very helpful and professional. I will not be here long enough to enjoy the pool like several others are this evening. Rooms clean. Convenient location. Suite is very roomy. I would stay here again on my next business trip.

needs updates but clean, no good internet connection, no good breakfast selections. hotel is far from everything. took hours to get to places. no good food places around except a subway. this is a hotel to just get you through the night not for long stays would not stay again unless for one night.

I stay at this hotel every couple of months and always am greeted by name and with a smile.  All the staff are extremely helpful and friendly.  Rooms are comfortable with fridges, microwaves, and coffee makers.  Breakfast is delicious with lots of options.  Wifi is easy to connect to and quick.

This hotel was very clean in all respects.  We had previously stayed at another Best Western.  This location will be our choice in our future visits to the area.  While our early departure was before the breakfast hour, we were given a 'To Go' bag snack.  We have never experienced  this service before.  The staff were pleasant and accommodating.

Summary Heading: Great hotel for vacation in California
Summary: This hotel is clean, very well located and not too pricey for the value. I thought it would be noisy with its location, but it wasn't. Our whole family thought the room looked great. The breakfast area is way too small, but it is a minor issue. The pool and spa were clean, and we felt close to everything we wanted to go to. I strongly recommend this place and we will stay there again next year.

I wasn't expecting much because of the price and not being a Best western Plus. Other than it being an exterior room type place, I am pleasantly surprised!  They have a full breakfast, the hotel staff is very friendly, and the king bed was comfortable and had luxurious linens. We are staying for 8 days and I am perfectly content!

First time here at this location and price is good and area is actually nice. I can say I found myself new favorite LA hotel:) will be back again soon :) staff are friendly rooms are nice and big:) there's food places near by or you can always order pizza :)

I've stayed her plenty of times and I just have to say that the staff and food are both awesome!!! I recommend any day!!! Perfect place to if your headed to Disneyland family hotel!!! To top it off they have a patio and golf course!!! Love it -Ashley

The people who worked were extremely friendly and helpful.  The room was beautiful  and the back door opened up to a beautiful  pool and jacuzzi and a putting green. They had a hot breakfast in the morning.  highly recommended  this hotel and will come back and stay here in the future. The price was perfect for what we got. Highly, highly recommend. The area is super clean and parking is right out front your door.

Hotel was clean and staff was very friendly! The room I was in had a back padio that had chairs and faced the pool. Housekeeping went above and beyond cleaning the room. I would highly recommend to anyone family or single

My family and I enjoyed staying here. We had no complaints what so ever. We will be back. We stayed for 5 nights and every time we came back to the hotel the room was clean and needs were made. Little to no noise and we were right by the pool.

Very good service, thanks. We always stay at best Western and are very satisfied anywhere that we have used them in the United States. The rooms were clean and the beads very comfortable. We were all satisfied.

Very friendly and helpful staff, spacious room and comfortable. The kids lived the pool area and table tennis table. Handy enough for Huntington and Newport beaches, lots of nearby supermarkets and food outlets. Useful little kitchenette.

We had a great time. The receptionist Shannon is nice and inviting. The rooms are clean and the pool and hot tub are really nice and good after a long day at the park. Nice area of town. Not a lot of traffic and good restaurants are near by. I recommend this hotel.

Very friendly and helpful staff. The room was comfortable and clean. They have a pool/golf/ping pong table all right here. Many stuff to do. Would definitely stay here again. I would recommend any one to get away for the night or business or for fun .

My family and I rented about 10 rooms at once, they were very accommodating for us and the kids loved the pool. Great location to the beach and the rooms were nice. Not to mention great continental breakfast! Would definitely come back.

good budget hotel with friendly staff and clean rooms.   good for basic family stays. no fuss. great pool and free breakfast. plenty of restaurants and shops close by, esp the Vietnamese areas.  great location to surrounding areas, esp seal beach!
Manager Response: We are glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We look forward to seeing you again in the near future.  Thank you, Mayte

Summary: This is our second time staying at Best Western for 7 days. Both visits were very pleasant. The staff is polite and helpful. We stayed in the one in Westminster because our family lives right around the corner. When we come out to visit it's nice to stay close to their house and especially at a hotel that is comfortable, clean and inviting. My children love it too
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us.   Thank you, Management

Summary: This is a reasonable priced hotel for the area,  a short drive to Huntington Beach. A very quiet, clean room. Comfortable bed. Great hot breakfast. All the staff was very courteous, the maids, the breakfast lady and the two people at the check in and check out counter. Thank you for helping make our weekend relaxing. we will definetly go back to your hotel.
Manager Response: We are glad to hear your experience with us was a great one, we hope you consider staying with us again.  Thank you, Mayte

Summary: Staff so nice and helpful in any ways possible! Pool very clean! Place to ping pong and other activities. Breakfast lots of choices to choose from! Clean lobby, room, and environment. Car keys got locked in car and they went beyond then what they do to help us out! Great people and service üëçüèª
Manager Response: Thank you for your great review, we are glad to hear that you received help getting your keys out. Looking forward to seeing  you again.  Thank you, Mayte

Summary: Our first time in cali, Great customer service, and they were very friendly. Room was nice and clean and they had a GOOD shower, unlike most hotels. It was last min for us, so we were grateful they had availability. They even had a crib for my 3month old newborn to sleep in! Great place to stay!
Manager Response: Thank you for spending the 4th of July with us.   Mayte

Summary: Great spacious suite + free breakfast + nice pool = perfect stay. Also can't beat there prices and cleanliness . Great weekend here , hopefully I'll come again soon. Thanks for a beautiful stay best western
Manager Response: Glad you enjoyed your vacation.  Thank you, mayte

Summary: Fantastic. Helpful staff, clean place. I would stay here again. Freeway close, In N Out close. Great breakfast, rooms are very comfortable and clean. Nice pool, close to the beach, shopping and the Westminster mall. I will stay here again and will recommend to everyone I know! You! The prices are very reasonable, especially for what you get!

My family stayed at the hotel for five days in June 2016.  My initial impression was not bad.  The outside is clean but is showing age.  There are no elevators.  Our room was clean and looked freshly painted.  It faced the street but we could not hear any noise.  We had two rooms, one with 2 queens and one with 1 king.  The king room has two comfy chairs that we liked.  The king also had a DVD player built into the TV...the queen room TV was larger but did not have a DVD player.  You had to go down to the office to get the remote for the DVD player.  Both rooms has a tiny microwave and a small fridge.  Both were clean and nice to have.  The baths were clean but water pressure and maintaining a constant temperature were a problem.  Dual faucets also made temp adjustment a bit
Manager Response: Thank you for letting us know.  Mayte

Summary: Sadly, stayed here one night to attend a memorial service the next day.  Room 121 was very clean and restful.  Unless you want to avoid noise and kids,CA pool view room would be a good deal for extended stays.  Front desk Richard and Alfredo were very helpful and pointed me in the right direction. Happy hour at Tacp Surf was busy at the bar but the food was cheap and good, beer was real cold and service was great. Walking distance. On same side of hotel. BK was pretty good. Very busy. Food always replenished.  Real sausage; not the links.  Even the PM coffee in the lobby was good. Little out of the way. Yet, it satisfied my needs.  Service with a sincere smile by all.

When we pulled up & they still had faded poinsettias in their planter box in June it should have been our first clue! The check in staff was kind & super helpful! My kids enjoyed the pool & hot tub outside. The room had some updates, but the property is definitely older & could use some updating. The location isn't anything spectacular, but it served our purpose of being within striking distance of Disneyland, while keeping our kids in the dark about our going there the next day!

Clean, comfortable, quiet and very pleasant. Very friendly housekeepers and staff. This motel is our go to place when in the area, the staff has always gone out of their way  to make us feel at home. The breakfast is good and the housekeeping is superb. Be sure to make your reservations in advance, because they fill up quickly. Highly recommended.

The check in person was very nice and friendly, and we were given snacks upon arrival.   As far as amenities go, I don't think they could do much to improve.  The breakfast was nice, and had everything we would have wanted.  Our room, also, was nice.  It had enough room, with a refrigerator and microwave.    This hotel, however, is very old and showing its age.  It really needs a complete overhaul.   There is no elevator, only stairs, so bags have to be hauled up and down the stairs.   The steps themselves are rickety and look rotting and crooked...I was afraid to walk on them.  The walkway around the upstairs perimeter is also looking kind of warped and uneven.   We did visit the pool, which was not heated as advertised.   The fencing around the pool was rusted and pieces of it
Manager Response: We appreciate your feedback and welcome all your comments. Everyone can see and perceive things a different way and we thank you for your input. Please don't ever feel calling the front desk is unnecessary as it provides an opportunity to get to know you as a guest and provide you with superior customer care. We hope you can consider staying with us in the near future. Thank you for staying with us .  Management :)

Summary: This hotel has its charms, the room is cozy and well supplied. The best part of this trip was the customer service! I had a great time with my family at the best western hotel with 5 people in a 2 queen bed room with 1 rollaway for 5 days. Yes that sounds crazy and trust me it was, that's why I am super amazed by the customer service!!!  The front desk was extremely accommodating, getting us everything we could possibly use (extra towels, spotless housekeeping, etc). Since we only booked 1 room and we're pretty much in the sticks of California, my parents pretty much stayed in the hotel room 12 hours of daylight, so the younger folks (myself and my brothers) spent a lot of time hanging out in the pool and the lobby/eating area due to cabin fever. The front desk accommodated our
Manager Response: We are glad we met your expectations. We appreciate you giving us an opportunity to meet all your requests. We look forward to having you stay with us in the near future.  Thank you!

Summary: I stayed here with my family for 5 days while we were on vacation, we booked early through Expedia. I really enjoyed my time here at the hotel, everyone was so friendly, and the room was pretty clean and spacious. There are a ton of options for the complementary breakfast, too!
Manager Response: Its rewarding to hear back from guests like you, and we are glad that your stay was enjoyable. Please visit us soon.  Thank you!

Summary: We had a great time at this hotel.  It was so close to major roads to get around the city.  20 minutes from the beach.  The morning breakfast had a good variety and was a great way to start our morning.  We didn't actually have a chance to use it because of going places but the courtyard with the miniature golf, pool, hot tub and ping pong table was a nice touch.  Housekeeping was great, accomodating that some days we just wanted towels and other days we wanted a full cleaning.

We were in town for a basketball tournament.  This hotel was perfectly located.  5 mins from the venue.  this was the first time that we stayed at a Best Western that had a sliding door AND a patio!  That was quite nice.  We were right near the pool and that provided the perfect access.  While we didn't use the putting green, it was a nice option to have.  The people that we encountered at the front desk were friendly and personable.  The only negative I have is that the breakfast needs some improvements.  While free, the eggs were not good at all.  It was if they were made from powder.  The other options (bagels, sausage, for example) were good to have, but did not seem fresh.  Breakfast aside, we will stay here again if we find ourselves back in Westminster.
Manager Response: We thank you for your review and for the wonderful words you gave us. We are delighted that you enjoyed the courtyard area from your patio it truly is calming and peaceful. We look forward to having you stay with us on your next visit.  Thank you!

Summary: Room was great, right outside the back was the pool and spa.  Very quiet and conveniently located.  Parking was very accessible, there were many places around the area to visit.  Staff was very helpful.  Breakfast was offered but did not get a chance to try.  Husband said it was nice.
Manager Response: Thank you for your stay we look forward to having you as our guest soon.  Manager :)

Summary: Very good and peaceful environment very clean and neat room great friendly people  glad I chose to  come here i enjoyed every moment would recommend to any one that's looking for a hotel with a family  great clean and clear pool.
Manager Response: Glad you chose to stay with us as well :)

Summary: Stayed here for the week and everything was great, friendly staff, good breakfast, clean rooms, I would definitely stay again! The only down of this place is the road noise but we just turned our fans on and it drowned a lot of it out. Overall it was great!
Manager Response: We thank you for your business and look forward to having you stay again. We are glad the fan helped with noise its also helpful that road noise usually dies out by early evening. However most of our doors have been receiving some updates to better sound prof the rooms. Again thank you!

Summary: Definitely an older property which has been renovated in the past couple of years.  The room was clean and the appearance decent.  The pillows were a little lumpy and the bed was slightly soft, but comfortable.  If I had a complaint, it would be the street noise.  Older windows definitely don't dampen the sound. So if you want some peace and quiet, ask for a room in the back. Breakfast was a little lacking.  I think the scrambled eggs were made from powder and the potatoes looked a bit undone, but everything else was good.

This is my favorite Best Western.  Great location, fantastic staff, all around good stuff.   The grounds are so well kept and have so many options.  Barbeque, ping pong, putting green, pool, and spa.  High speed internet quick and easy to access.  Delicious breakfast.
Manager Response: Its always a pleasure to have you staying with us.   Thank you!

Summary: We stayed here two nights.  Clean room and very friendly staff. Convenient breakfast. Nice pool area .Great location and Family Friendly. Front desk staff is very knowledgeable of the surrounded area.  A must stay if in the area
Manager Response: We are happy you enjoyed your stay with us. Thank you for your review!

Summary: Booked this hotel on a last minute reservation and was not disappointed. The room we got was top notch. Clean, comfortable, and very reasonably priced for last minute on a friday night. Staff was helpful and friendly. Pool and spa were great. Also they had a great breakfast. If I find myself in this area again I'll be back.
Manager Response: We are glad you were able to stay with us we know there are many options in the area. We look forward to having you stay with us again.  Thank you!

Summary: Really great customer service, nice property and awsome breakfast.  Hassle free check in process.  I would like to thank Richard for his great attitude in the middle of the night and the whole staff.   My family and I checked in after midnight and the hotel staff saved my room.   Great communication via email and phone.

Friendly staff, spacious rooms, nice outdoor area complete with ping pong, pool, and putting green. Only complaints are inconsistent water temperature in the shower ranging from way too hot to too cold and breakfast below par. Overall good value. You get what you pay for.

Love this location! So close to our training. Shannon was super helpful, spacious rooms, microwave/fridge which was great for my dietary restrictions. Free breakfast and coffee/tea all day long. Plenty of parking - pool - heated spa. Thanks Shannon. :)
Manager Response: We are glad you enjoyed your stay we look forward to having you stay with us in the near future.  Thank you, Mayte

Summary: Clean and friendly. Convenient to all the places we needed to be. Hot breakfast. Coffee 24/7. Helpful staff. Shannon took great care of us.  Good value. Had to wait a while for hot water. Internet was intermittent.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, we appreciate your feedback.

Summary: The price was very reasonable.  The rooms are clean, and the staff was friendly.  The motel was conveniently located to where we needed to be.  There is hot continental breakfast and coffee if available 24 hours.  The motel has two floors but there isn't an elevator..

This is fourth time staying here.The first room smelled like mildew and my bed didn't seem like it was changed. I informed them during check out. I am here now my check out is tomorrow and again I am disappointed there is a no smoking policy but all i am smelling is cigarette smoke coming through my vents. I called the front desk 6 times and no one picked up. I even called from my cell phone and no one picked up.I wanted to tell them about the smoke coming from my vent but now they can read it from here. I am a diamond member and I travel 90 % of the time I will probably not frequent this location after check out tomorrow. The staff is always warming and nice but i have even had towels with hair in them and tub with hair and this time my bed had hair.i was going to tell them
Manager Response: I want to take a minute of your time and apologize deeply for the inconveniences you encountered. It is not usual for our guests to find any type of hair on linens or towels. However we appreciate your feed back as that has encouraged us to revise our current procedures. Additionally your call should have been answered promptly. Also please receive our apologies for the smoke smell, guest are told at check in what are procedures are and unfortunately some choose not to follow them. Thankfully when we are made aware we take measures to assure that it doesn't happen again. Please if you find a moment of your time, call me directly at 714-898-4043. I would like to speak with you a little further and make it better for you. Thank you, we hope you would consider staying with us in the future.  Thanks, Mayte

Summary: We have stayed here in the past when visiting relatives in the area.  Overall good facility.  Friendly staff.  Clean rooms.  Nice grassy pool area behind rooms.  Very good free breakfast.  The mattress in our room probably needs replacement since it was not firm enough.  We got a discounted rate for staying more than three days.  Convenient to freeways and beach towns.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and we thank you or your feedback. We would like to share with you that we will be replacing mattresses any day now we are waiting on the delivery. We hope that you stay with us again.  Thankyou, Management!

Summary Heading: BW very good but noise problems
Summary: We do like Best Western, but the Westminster location has AC compressor noise problems on some of the top floor rooms.  The  AC units are on the roof above the rooms. Perhaps most of them are fine. Ask the staff about quiet rooms unless you have good ear plugs. We moved to the first floor and had a great stay thereafter. I hope they get the message and repair the problems.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review we appreciate the feedback you have shared with us. We will shift our focus in the direction of our central AC's. It is the first time its been brought up to our attention and its unfortunate you experienced noise. Again thank you for your feedback we look forward to you staying with us again!  Thank you,  Mayte  Management

Summary: Great Hotel in a good location. It was easy to get to my Training in Hunting Beach, close to the freeway, and every food option within walking distance.  Room was large and clean.  Breakfast was not fancy, did not change from day to day, but for the price of the room breakfast was a bonus.
Manager Response: Thank you for your business we know you have many selections when it comes to lodging. We hope you will keep us in mind for your next trip.  Thank you, Management

Summary: Shannon was the nicest and most helpful person I have ever dealt with at a Best Western. The rooms were clean and even had central a/c. The hotel has a very clean and heated pool and hot tub. They also put out a well stocked hot breakfast with all the fixins. I really enjoyed my stay. Ask for Shannon for five star help.
Manager Response: Shannon is a great asset to this property and your feedback proves it. We are glad you received the excellent customer service we always strive for. Thank you for your business.  Management

Summary: they have upgraded the lobby/eating area. The continental breakfast hass hot food and is very inviting. The staff were very friendly and helpful. This is our third stay of a week or more and enjoyed this one most of all. W.C. Minnesota

Quite a few of us stay here every year. We have early morning meetings so the hotel starts breakfast early for us. There was issues with the hot tub 2 nights out if our stay but Shannon went out of her way on our last night to accommodate us. The staff are friendly and helpfull

Always welcomed warmly, clean rooms, great breakfast, very genuinely friendly staff.  Nice spa, pool, putting green, and even ping pong table.  No noise from the street.  Will stay here again.  free wifi in each room.

Summary Heading: Business trip to seal beach and staying in this hotel for 17 days
Summary: The hotel was nice. Breakfast was good with potates scrambled eggs ,juices, bazel ,cornflakes and fruits would love if they include chicken in stead of sausages, coz I need to visist here again in next month. The staff was friendly. Rooms are clean and tidy. Close to both Newport and Huntington Beach. Close parking in relation to rooms. Putting green with pool and hot tub. Easy access to freeways. Good selection with vending machines with ice.easy access to Bus service as well.One improvement I would suggest for better internet connectivity ,they should put more wireless router so that every room get good coverage of wifi..they are ok to change the room nearest to the wifi..so no downer..one in wish list if they can start a Gym and small pick and and drop within 2 miles distance

Really clean place love the staff super helpful. The pool and mini golf and ping pong tables in the back were great for the family. Nice really hot jacuzzi for the parents and really great size pool. Housekeeping was great everyone was always clean when we came home from the amusement parks. Breakfast was great as well. I would definitely return thank you Best Western!
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to leave us feedback. We are pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay at our property and had good interactions with our friendly staff. We look forward to seeing your family again during your next trip to our area. Thank you from everyone here at Best Western Westminster Inn.

Summary: Easy access. Close to all amusement parks and golf courses.Nice breakfast and a spa.friendly help,however with a mild cofusion on check-in and out with a points card.overall a pleasant stay.Fairly quiet even with kids aroumd and close to the beach.

The hotel was nice. Breakfast was good. The staff was friendly. Rooms are clean and tidy. Close to both Newport and Huntington Beach. Close parking in relation to rooms. Putting green with pool and hot tub. Easy access to freeways. Good selection with vending machines with ice.

My first stay in a while at a place other than upscale hotel chain reminded me that you get what you pay for.  At the same time I have no complaints as the room was fine, location was good, price was right and parking was free.  I chose this hotel on location and it proved very convenient to my end destination and 405 fwy.  Staff was courteous and efficient and accommodated my requests for quiet room in back and early check in.  The queen beds were nice and everything was clean.  A little bit of road noise at night but you would have to be picky to complain.  Free breakfast was nothing special and served in a very small area.  It got chaotic when a small group of disabled folks were in there.  Nice to avoid the ripoff parking charges from upscale hotels.  Had a pool, putting

Breakfast was great had eggs, sausage, potatoes, waffles, cereal etc. Within 20 min driving to Huntington and Newport Beach. 5 min away from a mall and lots of food places around. Had a cute little patio attached to our room that led right out to a putting green and the pool. Only complaint is the door is facing out so you can hear all the traffic driving past but being able to park right in front of our door was probably more convenient.

Very nice hotel. Our stay was very quite. We came to visit family and go to Disneyland. It was only a 20-25 min drive to Disneyland which was very nice. The young gentleman who checked us out was very pleasant and friendly. They have a good breakfast with plenty of options. I wish they had more then just sausage since i cant eat it but the rest of the family enjoyed it. Thanks for a good stay.

I always enjoy the stay at Best Western with their friendly service. The breakfast was good with a combination of hot and cold items. My special rate room had a bad location near the laundry room and smoking area. The noises from people taking by pool.

Summary Heading: SPRINKLE YOUR YOGURT WITH OREOS, MM,CRANBERRIES AND HAVE A GOOD NIGHT SLEEP AT EESTMINSTER.
Summary: Easy hotel to get to from the LA airport. Just get on the I-405 South and get of at exit 19 Westminster ans Springdale. Turn right on Springdale to Westminster Blvd. Hotel on right hand. Good airconditioner at full blast, very good for hot summers. Breakfast is a full hot breakfast, with scrambled eggs, potatoes and sausages. For kids they have waffles and yogurt you can sprinkle oreo cookies, mm chocolate, and cranberries and chocolate chips. You can have cereals and big baggels, not mini like in other places. Rooms with sliding doors facing swimming pool. Very clean rooms with queen beds with pillows to spare. Very good wifi, you can talk using whatasapp. To get around Westminster they provide a real map. Everything you want to buy you can find in Westminster Blvd and Beach

Very nice breakfast, perfect location to beaches, Huntington Harbour, Seal Beach, freeways to Disneyland, clean rooms, helpful staff, nice grounds. Beds are OK. Many nice restaurants nearby and lots of convenient retail shopping including surf shops

We got the king suite. It was very spacious and clean with kitchen, fridge, micro, and huge tv. Only gave 4 stars because the bed was not comfortable. The staff are nice and the breakfast looks good w/ eggs, fresh make your own waffles, sausage, cereal, fruit etc. love the outdoor pingpong table and putt putt. For a lower price hotel, this is a good one.

These rooms are very nice and I would highly recommend staying here. Fair pricing and the rooms are clean and the service is good. Bathroom is nice and the water is both cold and hot which is good. Close to the beach.

Very nice rooms and the workers are very friendly. Good customer service also. I highly recommend staying here if you are in the area. Colors in the rooms are very nice and subtle also. Pricing is good.

I liked the place. Close to everything we wanted to visit. Really enjoyed the free breakfast. It included eggs, sausages, waffles.  Our kids really enjoyed a wide range of selection.  We also enjoyed the heated pool especially in the chilly weather.  Would stay again next time we are in town.

Overall, the service staffs are nice, the location is good but this building is old so the insulation is not so good. My room is next to the swimming pool and around 9:30PM I still can hear people talking from the pool, the footstep noise from the upper level is loud. If you want to stay at this location, ask for the upper level so you can have a good sleep.

The motel is clean, but rather dated. The main road outside produces high levels of traffic noise and if you aren't in one of the back rooms, this could be a major problem. The breakfast is a DIY system and whilst not great by any means, is adequate! For 90 plus dollars it is overpriced.

Clean, comfortable, spacious with a nice green space and pool out back. Everything we needed at a decent price. The breakfast wasn't great but it's the same as most hotels of this class. Would stay here again and recommend to friends. Wish we could have enjoyed the pool! Too busy at Disneyland :)

This was our first visit to Westminster & because our experience was pleasant we look forward to more visits. The staff was friendly and helpful. The room was nicely kept and comfortable. We will most likely stay here again.

We often stay here. It is great value for the money. The staff are always exceptionally friendly no matter what time of day. Breakfast is top-notch. Close to freeway on and off ramps without being noisy. Love the location. Close to lots of shopping.

Nice, clean room. Pleasant and helpful people at the front desk. Good location with easy to access stores and restaurants. I didn't use the pool but it looks like a nice pool. I would definitely come back if the need arises.

We stayed here for 5 nights on our pleasure trip to southern California.  We were close to many places and used this as our base to travel to the desert (ghost town Calico), Disneyland - 20 minutes away if you dont take the wrong way.  Oh that and the signage for Disneyland is really poor - but that is not a reflection on this gem of a hotel.  Room is clean, beds comfortable, mini fridge and microwave.  They replaced the fridge when it was not working right away.  Pool area is nice, ping pong some fun, the slope of the putting green was a little frustrating, but we are not golfers anyway.  Breakfast ample but the best part is the super friendly staff.  It did not seem to matter whom we spoke to they were helpful, felt like they had all the time in the world for you and did their

This was probably the 5th time we've stayed at this location in the past 2 years. We love the small, homey feeling you get. We love the 1st floor rooms with patios. The ping pong, pool & jacuzzi were a hit with the kids. Breakfast was awesome. The staff was great, especially Shannon :)   The only small (and I mean small) complaint is, the maid service is very slow (especially for such a small place). We left our room daily about noon and upon arriving back one day the room had not been cleaned and it was 3:30/4pm. We had all our beach stuff in hand as the maid strolled up to our room as we were opening the door. We had to wait at the pool for about 20/30 mins while she cleaned.  Overall, I would recommend this hotel. We will definitely be back again.

Summary Heading: Good rooms, Great service, wonderful staff!
Summary: Stayed here twice over 12-day USA visit. They were fully booked during part of our visit, or we would have stayed the entire trip. Rooms are clean, spacious, quiet. All have refrigerator and microwave, flat screen TVs with a good selection of channels. Some rooms ("suites") also have a 2-element electric cooktop. All rooms stayed in had free and reliable wi-fi throughout our stay.  On booking we were very well treated by Shannon, who was gracious and patient as we tried to work out which days they had availability. On check-in a week or so later Shannon was on the desk; she is brilliant! As we stayed a fairly long 9 days (over 2 stretches) we found all of the staff very warm and friendly. The maids were gracious, considerate, adept and appropriately communicative-easily

Very comfortable!!! The staff are very good people. I felt very safe staying here. Its very quite and cozy. Also very close to everything and family friendly with their ping pong table and mini golf. Will definitely bring my family here again!!!

Great service and friendly staff!!! Asked for towels once and had to go down and get them myself, but other than that no problems at all!! I even got a DVD player in my room. Great price and 10 minutes from the beach. I'd gladly stay here again!!!

My sister, niece and i stayed here for our vacation in June 2015. We weren't sure how it was going to be. We entered the hotel room it was clean and nice. Everything was great. We have no complaints what so ever. The staff was wonderful, the breakfast was great (our room was right by the office), service was wonderful. we stayed a week and it was the best week. We made the right choice staying here instead of with family. My five year old niece loved that the pool was right outside our room. AND a ping pong table?! that was awesome.Thank you Best Westner for a wonderful week! We will be staying here on our vacation back to California!

The room was quite comfortable, the breakfast wasn't great. Good for the price, though, especially if you're not going to spend a large amount of time lounging in the room. I would probably stay here again.

Summary Heading: Friendly atmosphere and small town feel in Big City
Summary: I had a great experience at this hotel friendly staff willing to go the extra mile all amenities provided excellent attention to detail employee name Shannon.. Did an excellent job for me from booking through checkout

Close access to freeway to a multitude of restaraunts and markets. Good service (front desk helpful), rooms clean and big (got a king-sized bed).  Wi-Fi worked. Breakfast was the usual best western afre -- nothing to brag about, but part of the price.

This hotel provides great service with exacellance in there food, service, and rooms.I would highly recommend this hotel for any events pertaining to knots berry farms or many of the shows playing just around the corner.

Stayed here 4 nights during our family vacation! Walking distance to convenience stores and restaurants and easy access to the 405. Rooms were spacious and very clean and the staff was fantastic! They even left us our extra towels folded as a flower! Hot breakfast served every morning with sausage, eggs, hash browns, waffles, toast, bagels, pastries, cereal and a ton of other options! Will definitely be staying here again!

Summary Heading: Disney bday trip with the best friend
Summary: Love this hotel we stay here when we come to Disneyland lots of stores near by and very clean the breakfast here is yummy I personally love the waffles the staff is friendly with very easy check in and there's even a patio outside ur room with table and chairs :))) thumbs up for Best Western in Westminster

Nice place to stay, we had a downstairs room with a patio, just steps from the pool.  We didn't use it, but it gave us a pretty view. Loved the bedding, the beds were good quality and comfortable.  Good tv, fridge, microwave . .  it was clean and we were able to park very close to our room.  Didn't have the breakfast because we had plans to meet family later. Front desk personnel was very, very nice.

Summary Heading: So handy to the freeway and very clean rooms and friendly staff.
Summary: This has been a great find for us, very reasonable priceing. So handy to everything if you have a rental car. The staff were very helpful and welcomeing. Super clean rooms the cleaning ladies keep things perfect. Will stay again. AAAA+++++

I loved my stay at best western it was fun the employees were greatand the house cleeners were the best and i will tell mmy family to come becase it was amazing the breakfast was awesome and the service was amazing i will serenely come again

I have stayed here many times with boyfriend and have had no problems the staff couldn't fix for us. I would recommend this hotel for sure if ur looking for a cleAn and comfortable room. The rooms come with DVD players which is nice,  most place I have stayed don't offer this. They also have free breakfast in the morning. The rooms come with microwaves and refrigerators as well as a coffee maker. Down stairs rooms have sliding doors for access to an open patio with chairs and a table. There is a bbq for just to use and a ping pong table.

Change in reservation date should not impact any other reservation element..  "No elevator" should be clearly stated so requirement for same should be honored or guest so informed   Condition of stairs were basically unsafe.

Large, clean rooms, friendly,  polite staff, centrally located,  pool, hot tub, putting green. Only issue was the breakfast was the exact same thing every day. You can get to Disneyland without having to go on the freeway. Not far to drive to Seal Beach or to get on to the PCH. Close to he 405.

A comfortable mid-range hotel.  Great beds, quiet, & clean.  Modest but adequate breakfast, great staff.  Check in went well. Room well equipped with coffee pot, microwave, refrigerator, iron, and nice television.  Pool available. I will be back and stay in again, to be sure!

This is by far the best Best Western I have ever stayed at (and I have stayed at many).  All staff is friendly, caring, and helpful.  Rooms are always clean and nicely decorated.  Microwaves and mini fridges in every room.  Beds are extremely comfortable.  Great outdoor area with ping-pong table, pool, spa, small patios with downstairs rooms.

The visit was not  bad. Although when I first checked in the room wasn't ready and I had to go back downstairs to ask for a different room. It happens. The guy was very apologetic and was surprised that I was so calm and not angry. Other than that everything was great. I enjoyed my stay.

Summary Heading: SHANNON & BEST WESTERN are GOLD GOLD GOLD!!!
Summary: We have been staying at this property for five years, coming down sometimes twice a year for hockey. We've always loved the convenience, affordability and value this hotel has to offer.  It's always been peaceful and relaxing to return to after a long hockey day. This trip, we booked 4 nights and the first night was just as expected, PERFECT.  The staff are so friendly and the rooms are well-equipped with refrigerators and microwaves. Sitting on the patio deck in the morning doing my crossword puzzle while bird-watching put me in the best of moods for the day.  Unfortunately, our world was turned upside-down when a huge mob of younger hockey families literally took over the hotel.  They grouped together in the once-peaceful courtyard/pool area, and moved ALL the chairs and

We chose to stay here while having warranty work done on our RV. We have a suite & therefore could save our food items from our,RV fridge. The staff is friendly, happy, & accommodating. The room and grounds are clean. Breakfast is great. We are happy campers, especially since we have to keep extending our stay!!

I've got a big room with kitchen. Carpet was just changed. The building is dated but they are renovating the rooms. The pool and spa are great. Breakfast is good and the staff is friendly. This is a good option in LA, close to malls like Westminster mall and Bella Terra and 10/15 min from Huntington Beach.

Since I have lived in this area my whole life, I am pretty familiar with the local hotels/motels. My husband and I like to get away for a night or two sometimes and this is our favorite place. They have a few suites, which are awesome. They look like little apartments with full kitchens etc. All of the rooms are really clean, and the staff is great. They definitely go out of their way to accommodate you. They have a really nice courtyard area with a ping pong table, which is cool. The pool and jacuzzi are nice and clean and the pool is heated. Plus there is a full complimentary breakfast in the lobby in the morning. It really is a great hotel and the prices are extremely reasonable. There are a lot of pretty scummy hotels in the area that are full of tweekers, but this one

Summary Heading: Don't get room 223 - Breakfast was nice. Pleasant staff
Summary: Having read other reviews suggesting a back room to avoid noise, I requested and was assigned to one - Room 223.  Unfortunately it has an adjoining door to the next room.  The door does NOT have a sound barrier so every new neighbor I had, I heard EVERY word they said, shouted, or listened to on the TV. Not good. The room was large, clean, comfortable and the breakfast was wonderful for the basics. The staff was friendly, helpful and made sure to check my bill that it had the discount I had reserved. Overall I was pleased with the hotel, although it's not in the nicest part of town - it was a nice feel. Yes, it's a little older of a building, but who cares - the price was fair.  The Wifi was poor, at times, in the room so don't count on getting too much laptop work done at
Manager Response: We want to thank you for reviewing your stay with us because its thru guests that we can shift our attention to things we may not be aware. We will be looking at options to conceal the noise a little better. We are glad that everyone was friendly and offered you help when need be. Please come stay with us again so we can better provide  you with superior customer care.  Thank you, Managment

Summary: We stayed 5 nights. I was very impressed with the cleanliness of the entire property. Inside the room and all the grounds, pool and front desk / breakfast area. I apreciated a copy of USAToday being available at no charge every day.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us we are glad to hear your stay was pleasant. Cleanliness is one of our top priorities and its rewarding to know you noticed. We are glad that the USA today was received well also. Thank you for your business.  Management

Summary: Clean, comfortable rooms, love the breakfast and the amenities included in the room and the hotel.  Very quiet.  All staff are very sincerely friendly and happy to see you and to assist you.  Nice pool, spa, and putting green.

Love this hotel!  It's nearby attractions I want to visit and convenient from major roads/highways.  Always clean and comfortable accommodations.  Very helpful and courteous staff!  Was here in December and pretty sure I'll be back in May!

Needed a place to stay close to work due to an early meeting. Checked in late. Room was nice but both queen beds had squeaky mattresses. I chose this hotel due to the location, free breakfast and internet. Breakfast was ok, sausage and (dry) scrambled eggs.

This is a decent mid-range motel that is obviously older, but has been refurbished and well-maintained.  Exterior corridors; no elevators.  Convenient to Long Beach airport and the 405 freeway.  Rooms facing Westminster Ave have traffic noise; but staff accommodated us with a quiet room in the back.

This is a very nice hotel, nice pool, jacuzzi, mini golf, ping pong table to keep the kids out of the parents hair. In the rooms it really feels like you are at home. It had a mini fridge, microwave, night stand, and a little table you can do work on.

It the best place  so you rest and the house clean they were  nice to talk to and they are so helpful. Front Desk Staff  was so helpful and I really like at the nice younger lady name olga she was helpful and  I meet the manger andshe was so nice and love and it was nice sleeping there and with be back :)

Everything about this hotel is nice. The beds are great, rooms are clean and staff is nice. We will be back to stay here the next time we take our annual family vacation to Southern California . It has a mini golf coarse and pool with jacuzzi. They accommodate is with no problems. This is our go to hotel.

We stayed here for a family visit to Disneyland. The rooms were very clean, quiet, and the staff were fantastic. Definitely staying here for future trips to the area.  The continental breakfast was exceptional & plenty for a days trip into the park.   üëçüèªüëçüèªüëçüèªüëçüèªüëçüèªüëçüèªüëçüèªüëçüèªüëçüèªüëçüèªüëçüèªüëçüèªüëçüèªüëçüèªüëçüèªüëçüèªüëçüèªüëçüèªüëçüèªüëçüèªüëçüèªüëçüèªüëçüèªüëçüèªüëçüèªüëçüèª  Best bet for staying in the area.

This hotel is great.  It's very clean. The beds are amazing, and the staff is awesome. My family and I looked everywhere for a nice and clean hotel then we came across this one. It's hands down! We WILL be back at this hotel every time we visit Southern California.

We chose this hotel because they had adjoining rooms, which is what my sister and I wanted so that our 4 boys could have unlimited play time. It's close to lots of food places and although there was a mix up with our rooms they made up for it with a partial refund AND the correct rooms the next day! We will definitely stay here again and also recommend this place to others!

Another fantastic stay during my annual Disneyland trip in December.  Very clean and spacious room which included a microwave and refrigerator.  The bed was comfortable.  The WIFI was fast enough for me to get some work done during my vacation (maybe not a plus but still convenient LOL).  The staff was super helpful and friendly.  Location is conveniently located to the 405 with a nearby Starbucks and In N Out.  Free hotel parking a plus! Great location for a Disneyland Annual Passholder with free parking at the resort--quick drive without paying extra for being super close to the parks.

Quiet, clean, and comfortable place for a quick night rest. Front Desk Staff was very helpful. We requested for an extra bed ($10 extra) and baby crib (free of charge) which came right away upon request. I slept on the extra bed and was able to sleep well.

This hotel I my home away from home because it is so clean and the staff here are so friendly. If anyone were to complain then they are not normal! when I walk into the room everything was so neat and there was a lot of room and there's a fridge and microwave what my family needs!

The room is lovely, clean and spacious. When entering the room, we are surprised as bathroom is huge (In other hotels at the sam price, bathroom is so tiny)! üòÑüòÑüòÑ We also have a patio with chairs and table so you can enjoy fresh air when it is not so cold. Breakfast is good, too! We travel as a group of friends and love it! üëçüèª

At first I thought it was going to be an old ugly hotel but once I got onto the room it was amazing since it was so clean. Their a fridge,microwave, television, bathing needs, fast wifi, and pool and miniature golf which is cool overall this hotel is awesome

I love this hotel!  I use it as a getaway when I need to escape my everyday life craziness, as well as when I have work commitments in the area.  Staff is always helpful and friendly.  Rooms are always clean.  Beautiful pool area and spa.  Delicious complimentary breakfast and wifi in room.

Staffs are very friendly & rooms are clean.  They even put the TV remote in a bag when you first check in but wall is very thin & kind of old.  Prefer to stay at rooms all the way to the end, more quite.  Very reasonable price with breakfast included.  Very short distance to Disneyland.

We usually stay at cheap cheap motels when we do Disney trips to save some dough. I'm talking $50-$60 a night. And I have stayed at many fine resorts in my time that are top dollar. This place was a bit more expensive than the cheap motels but it was well worth the extra $10 a night. It was cozy and clean and well maintained. Didn't feel dirty to wake up and room was big.  Free water bottles, free (warm) breakfast, hot tub, clean sheets, tons of free HBO movies and tv shows on demand. We were pleased.

It was a good price for the amenities they have available, ping pong, putt putt, pool, AC unit/heating, fridge and microwave work well, television on demand with Time Warner Cable.  The staff was kind and helpful throughout the whole trip, extra blankets and pillows were available.

Summary Heading: Do not believe this, these are empty promise
Summary: Best Western Westminster Inn, 5755 Westminster Blvd, Westminster, CA 92683. The room itself is decent, but there is too much noise in the room with a running engine (not the air conditioning). They offered offered another room but there was the same noise. Your sleep will be disturbed.They promised compensation, but do not believe this, it's an empty promise. Certainly not recommended.
Manager Response: We apologize for the inconvenience you encountered during your stay. We strive to deliver customer service and promises, if any are made. Please do not hesitate to contact us, I would love to hear more and review the promise that wasn't delivered to you. We value each guest and are constantly looking on ways to better serve our guest. Please reference your reservation number and we will take it from there.  Thank you, Management

Summary: I went on business trip by myself but i decided to stay at Best Western Westminster. They had everything ready for me, my room and maintenance helped me with my bags. The breakfast was delicious sausage, potatoes, and waffles. The hot spa was very soothing after my day at a meeting. My room was very clean and the bed was so comfortable. My stay at Best Western was the best. I'm glad I choose to stay at best western!

Enjoyed my stay at this property while I was in westminster. The staff is friendly and helpful. They provide a hot breakfast that includes eggs, sausage, potaoes, bread, cereal, oatmeal, fruit, and yogurt. There's free wifi and parking is first come first serve. However, you don't have to worry about parking as it seemed like they had enough for everyone. Really enjoyed my stay and I'll be recommending this property to friends. I'll be staying here  whenever I'm in the area again. Thank you

Very clean property all was intact and ready when i arrived. Everyone was very friendly and courteous. There customer service is deffinately top notch. I will always stay here when i am in the area. Thank you everyone i really enjoyed my stay.

Great room. Very happy with the size, amenities and staff. üòÉ I am very satisfied with the kitchenette and size. My parents were also very satisfied as well. Close to restaurants, mall, and freeways. üòÉ

Amazing staff they care about their residents. My family had lots of fun in their pool and ping pong table the breakfast was great. Every time i stayed their i felt love from the staff.My family loves their rooms the bed are so comfortable i always have a good night sleep and wake up refresh

Always go here when im in twon and love it. housekeeping is so nice and do a good job keeping it tip top. Will tell any one who is looking for a hotel in westminster to go to this one. Thank you mayte and all your staff.

The customer service I received was superior. Everyone is friendly and waiting to answer your questions. It's just great feeling to feel that everyone cares for your stay. The internet was also fast and allowed me to efficiently get my work done. Loved it!!! Many thanks!!!!

Very reasonable for the occasion. When we are in the area we choose this hotel for the location and reasonable cost for our stay to see family. It is also fairly close to the coastline. Surf City is 15 minutes away.
