1 night in Room 212 was enough to give me and my daughter over 40 bed bug bites each that took several weeks to heal, including days of taking Benedryl, weeks of Rx cortisone cream, and a few days of Rx steroid to heal. I have stayed at this motel several times and never had this issue before, but I cannot risk it again. The night staff, Alfredo, was very understanding, and the manager, Mayte, was great about helping us first to change rooms for 2nd night and then to check out completely. We had arrived at 8:30 pm Weds., gone out for a late dinner, then gone to bed at about 10 pm, sharing the one King bed. I woke up early and felt itchy. By 9 am Thurs., when we left for the day to visit my elderly parents, I had visible small welts that I thought might have been hives from
Manager Response: We take all and every guest concern seriously and this case was no exception. We took measures as soon as this was reported. We are committed to providing every room with high standards of cleaning procedures. We thoroughly inspect our rooms and sanitize and use the UV Wand which has proven to be an ultra clean method widely used in the industry.  In this case, we did not take any chances  we went as drastically as replacing the entire carpet and bedding. Although no pest were detected the well being of our guest is our top priority.   We welcome the Orange County Health Department if they choose to come, we are confident of our rooms and our cleaning measures.

Summary Heading: Renovated rooms are very comfortable and great value
Summary: When you first pull up outside, you will not be impressed by the property or its surroundings. You will feel you have been "had" by overly flattering online photos. It is older and more basic than many of the "resort" style Best Westerns we are familiar with. But wait until you are checked in by smiling, efficient staff in the spotless lobby, and see your fresh, spacious, newly renovated room with comfortable beds and even a refrigerator. The pool area is clean and inviting too. There is some traffic noise from Westminster Avenue, perhaps more in the front facing upstairs room we had (although otherwise property is quiet.) And the free breakfast is standard motel fare, with not quite enough tables for guests. But overall we thought this place was great value, so if you need to

Nice hotel staff, the bed is super comfortable. Breakfast was decent with some nice choices including fresh made waffle machine. Interior decorating and furniture can use an upgrade, but I would stay here again.

We needed to find a hotel close to Long Beach and were pleasantly surprised to find this Best Western. Convenient, clean, breakfast and great value for money. We will stay here again next time we need an overnight in the area. Staff was friendly and helpful.

I love this hotel.  Every time I am working in the area I stay here.  The staff is always pleasant.  Everything is clean.  Nice breakfast.  Never a problem with wifi and the pool area is beautiful.  Great location close to the freeway.

During 4 month project away from home, located in Orange County, I opted for my "go to" hotel and landed at the Westminster location, the rooms are clean and comfortable, the breakfast is good, the staff is friendly. Avery inviting pool area with a BBQ makes it feel at home. I even brought my Wife and granddaughter down here from Tahoe, for a couple of weeks and we enjoyed the close proximity to Knotts Berry farm, Disneyland and the great OC beaches. Its been a nice stay, I would definitely stay here again if work brings me this way.

They run a very nice place with very nice people. It was clean and organized and the full breakfast was great. When we needed anything or wanted information they got it for us. I would recommend it to my family and friends. Thank you guys!
Manager Response: We are delighted that you had a pleasant stay its rewarding to know that everyone here was helpful. Thank you for letting your friends and family know as word of mouth is one of the best advertisements one can receive. We look forward to seeing you!!!  Thank you, Management

Summary: I was disappointed to stay in this facility.  After reading a few reviews I decided to book it.  The room was clean, but the furniture old and worn out. no lobby and the place for  breakfast very poor, and needs to be remodel.  The breakfast itself very simple and poor.  I would say spend a bit more of money and go somewhere else.
Manager Response: Thank you for submitting a review, we value your feedback. We are excited to say that we are in the process of remodeling this property . We have several rooms already done and you may have been in one that is on the schedule for next week. Starting next week the remaining rooms will be receiving updates and new carpet. We hope that you consider staying with us in the near future and be a part of these enhancements.  Thank you, Management

Summary: Nowhere will you find a better staff or cleaner hotel. Rooms are beautiful and roomy. Staff will help you in any way possible. Breakfast was great. The swimming pool is great. In addition. they have a ping pong table, which is a blast. Great place to stay.
Manager Response: We are delighted that your stay was awesome. Our vision is to offer superior customer care and have every interaction with the staff a memorable one. We look forward to seeing you soon when you are in the area.   Thank you!

Summary: Stayed at this Best Western because of price.  Didn't know what to expect but turned out to be a nice quiet hotel.  It's on a busy street, but once in the room, extremely quiet.  The room was clean and roomy.  Carpets could be cleaned, but other than that everything was great.  The staff was extremely courteous.  Didn't have breakfast there.  It looked like a small breakfast, eggs, potatoes, sausage, beverages, toast.  Not a lot of eating places around except fast foods.  Nice place to stay.

We stayed for 4 nights. We had a lovely room with an outdoor patio overlooking the garden with roses and pool. Very nice room with kitchenette. It s nearby Huntington beach. Very beautiful and very quiet beach in a southern French style Boulevard. If you do not care to drife 45 minutes to Venice Beach or Hollywood this is the place. An oasis in the suburb of Westminster in L.A. Breakfast was ok. Subway nearby and mall. In L. a. This is the place for us!

The first room I got had a weird smell and didn't look as though anyone had stayed in there for a while.  It was not very clean and had a couple of spiders come through the ceiling air vent near the bathroom.  I tiptoed all night through the room. It was also very noisy from street sounds.   I didn't complain about that, but got moved to a lower floor for another reason.  That room was MUCH better.  The rest of my stay turned out great.  That room was very clean and comfortable.  I ended up loving the hotel.  Next time I will try to ask for a room in the same location that I was moved to.

I have stayed in this establishment a couple of times and loved my stay every time.... which is why I keep coming back! I am a frequent traveler to Westminster and have made this my go-to hotel.  The staff is very friendly and caring.. they always try to find a way to make you satisfied.  The room and the prices are well worth it. The rooms are huge, clean and comfortable. For the price of $100 a night for a King Room- this is a really great deal! I have also stayed in their suite which has a full living room area and a full kitchen area. All rooms are layed out to surround the pool.  Booking ahead for this hotel is HIGHLY recommended. This hotel is so popular that it's reservations fill a month ahead!

wonderful staff, room, grounds everyone is friendly. internet lags sometimes. great pool and clean rooms. breakfast is nice and hot. laundry is on sight with is convienient. kid friendly.. suites are very nice size

I am going to come back this is such a friendly  spot every one makes u feel so welcome. Its clean  and good rate  free wifi. They all so had a pleasant  court yard and pool area. Thanks to all the staff!

The Best Western in Westminster has Good rates with lots of parking.  The staff was very friendly, the rooms were clean, the air conditioning worked well and they have free breakfast.   All they had left was a suite on a 3-day weekend and the price was very decent.

Working hundreds of miles from home for months at a  time, makes it nice to check into a hotel where my business feels appreciated, and I can comfortably settle in to rest and work. This Hotel fits those needs nicely and I expect a great stay for the next few months. Nice warm breakfast in the morning and a friendly staff, I would definitely recommend to my friend and associates.

Perfect for a family vacation. Lovely service. The downstairs rooms have a nice porch, where you can enjoy lunch, while the kids play mini golf. Free Wifi and breakfast, which my family and I enjoyed very much. We especially liked how we were able to make our own waffles.

Shannon is the the best always has a smile for u when u walk in the door good rates and clean I will be back when I'm in town. I love the pool and jacuzzi, plus there is a small mini golf and ping pong table for the kids. Your super close to awesome restaurants and shopping and only miles from the beach. I have had an awesome experience and would love to come again.  Thanks for making my vacation a time to remember.

everything is great here Shannon is awesome and so is mayte! The courtyard is beautiful and everyone is so nice, I wouldn't go anywhere else.  Highly recomed this place.  They even have breakfast every morning.

Very clean, quiet, and the staff was very courteous, Shannon was awesome. My room had a patio door that faced the courtyard which included a swimming pool, golf putting course and a ping-pong table.  Very relaxing view. I will stay here next time I am in the area!!!! Highly recommended!!!!

Wasn't too sure with the curb appeal, but was a great stay.  Quaint and cozy hotel with a friendly staff, clean and efficient hotel. Breakfast was good, pool was great, hotel located in a nice area.  roomscomfortable and quiet! Will definitely stay again.

The staff at the hotel is the best you can find, always there to help your stay in any way they can. The hotel is always clean.  The beds are comfortable.  The hotel is quite the Wi-Fi works all the time.  The office and breakfast area is spotless, and the breakfast if you want one is wonderful.

Did not expect it to look so run down on the outside. The bathroom floor board dirty and dusty. Unfortunately the water in the tub was leaking which was very annoying. When we returned from shopping around 10pm there was a full blown flood in the bathroom. If this was leaking when we arrived then why was it not reported by housekeepers??

Summary Heading: The m√°nager is a condescending racist
Summary: Well i stayed at this hotel yesterday and the garden view is nice. The room is dated but clean and the breakfast is nothing to write home about. My issues where as followed, 1. I wasnt recognized as a Diamond member, than 2. The housekeeper walked in my room at 10 am than i complained no apology from the manager. 3. The manager is a liar yes i said it liar i asked for a extensi√≥n and she claimed she couldn't accomadate my requested due to being soldout yet i saw availability and booked a room but no rooms, really? When questioned she became agitated that i challenged her in her lie. Rooms never where full i was looking on the web as i requested a extensi√≥n. The m√°nager is not fit to be in the customer service industry and she also refused me lotion yes the house keeper didn't
Manager Response: I apologize for the inconvenience during your stay, we go above and beyond the call of service for you and for all of our guest. Its unfortunate that your requests were not met, As expressed by the staff this property is a small property and long extensions for check outs is almost impossible on busy days. Our check in time is 3pm and when honoring late check outs we must take in consideration that housekeeping needs plenty of time to deliver a clean room to our next guest. In regards to the lotion we didn't refuse lotion to you, our rooms have dispensers in the vanity area with lotion. For that reason we don't have a supply of lotion bottles and upon your check out, we cheked the dispenser to make sure there was lotion.   This porperty is welcoming to every one and diversity is embraced. Unfortunately in this case we were unable to please you after numerouse attampts. We even offered to move you rooms as early as 10 am given the fact that the room type you had was already sold out. You have stayed in the past numerous times and time after time you seem to have difficulty  or issues with this property. We chose to give you a full night off as that seemed to be the only option we had to make you feel better.  Thank you, Management

Summary: Visited from Florida for 5 nights to see Disneyland, Sea World, Six Flags, and the other sites around LA.   Easy access to the freeway, shopping malls near by, a Veggie Grill about 5 miles down the road near Long Beach, Costco and a Whole Foods 3 miles to the south.      The breakfast area is nice, computer and printer works.   I printed my Six Flags ticket and checked into our flights.  The only constructive thing I would say is to replace the carpets, we were in room 105 on the bottom floor.   Carpets get tracked which is to be expected, but that's what people see.
Manager Response: We appreciate every thing you mentioned and I want to thank you for taking your time to review this property. Only through your feedback can we grow and be better. Because we value every guest we are happy to inform you that we began the process to replace carpets. As of this week 16 rooms including room 105 have been replced. We look forward to your next visit and for you to see the many great improvemetns that we are doing.  Thank you, General Manager

Summary: It was a very pleasant surprise to find this hotel so clean with such friendly and accommodating staff.  It's not a new hotel, nor does it have some of the amenities of larger hotels, but the room, the lobby, the breakfast area, and the pool were all very clean and functional, and we had a very good experience during our two-night stay.  For the price, it would be hard to find a better hotel in the area.

This hotel is not fancy but offers good service for the money. We had a suite that included a kitchenette with all utensils and plenty of room.  The hotel is always clean and the service is excellent.  The pool and hot tub are clean and attractive and the grounds offer a small putting green, BBQ and ping pong table. Breakfast is served in a large area with tables and plenty of room.

Hotel was great. Javier was most helpful with our bags and any questions we had. He was very professional. Breakfast was excellent and staff very friendly. Would recommend to my friends. Why do I have to make this 200 characters?

This hotel was perfect for my vacation. It was close to the freeway, clean, friendly and provided a great breakfast.  The staff was very accommodating. I had a patio that I really enjoyed early morning with coffee and there was a ping pong table. Thank you for making my vacation a pleasant experience.

Summary Heading: Javier and Best Western are the perfect combination
Summary: This was the best hotel experience I've ever had. It wasn't for a Javier this place would just be ok. This place is exceptional. If you come visit this hotel you will not be disappointed especially if he's working.  Damon 949-633-0190

I was accommodated and staff was friendly and where good to my request and I would definite be booking here again  I enjoyed my stay and I would recommended to anyone  also its a good location and good places are nearby at convince I give it 2 thumbs up

I had a 4 day business trip in N. Huntington Beach. I went up PCH and drove through a couple Hotels that are close together. I just couldn't do it. I needed something at a good price that was safe. That was really all I was looking for. I called first to see if they had availability. Javier was working that night and was very courteous and real. When I got the the BW Javier was super cool and made sure I had everything I needed. He was responsive and it didn't just seem like a job for him. The room was surprisingly nice and clean. The bed was comfortable. They had 2 complimentary bottles of water. The shower rod feature, giving more space in the shower was nice. The TV selection was, also good. The breakfast was good and open longer than most places and there is no parking fee.

Came here for the first time. The room looks very beautiful. The service is very good also. My family and I actually had a good time resting and relaxing in our long trip from San Diego. We will defenitely come back in the future and will suggest to our friends about this place as well.

We spent 3 nights, and it was as expected.  The rate was good over the Internet, cheaper than a call in reservation.  So we made it over the Internet and then called in to reserve the particular room we wanted.  The rate was the best in the general area for the room.  The breakfasts (complete) are excellent.  The staff was very helpful and met our needs.  The only thing they need to do is SHAMPOO THE RUG!  This bothered my wife immensely.  The rest of the room was clean, and they tidied it up every day.

When down in Long Beach twice a year. My child goes to CSULB we stay here because it is a good value. Great pool and hot tub with a ping pong table out side.  Room are clean we get the one with a kitchen just to have the extra room. They remodeled the breakfast area to make it larger. It is a older complex but they it clean and tidey.

Wonderful staff , very clean rooms and pool that was heated with a nice hot tub. King bed very good quality, nice breakfast desk open all night. Safe neighborhood and great a/c. Rooms are nicely decorated and parking is ample. Coffee served all day and will definitely stay here again.

The beds are real comfortable.  We had a room on the first floor with a small patio, next to a golf putting green.  Full breakfast is more than I expected.  The waffles are definitely an item to try, along with the sausages, eggs, potatoes bagels etc.  We requested a room in the rear of the building when making our reservation.  All of those rooms were occupied.  However, Shannon, who was at the desk when we checked in got us a room the following day.  Kudos for Shannon and all of the room and dining staff.  They all made sure that our stay was fantastic.  We are coming back to Orange County in October and will surely stay here again.

The hotel looks a bit run down. The first room we were shown was a bit to worn and dirty. The second room on the second floor was better.  The staff was nice and the stay uneventful. The breakfast area was small and crowded.

Enjoyed our stay, the peacefulness, the good breakfast, the housekeeping and service. Nice staff =) Make sure to have some great waffles and good coffee. We stayed 4 nights and all of them were great, very comfortable beds.

We stayed here since it was convenient to a friend's house in Westminster.  It was comfortable, and we had a good night's sleep for a low price..  Breakfast was not important so it's low quality really didn't matter.  We just had a few items to get the day started.  In general, it's a good value for a motel in the area.

I loved how they greeted us when went inside. The room was beautiful and I loved the breakfast (waffles, sausages, potatoes. The pool was nice and clean,the jacuzzi was very nice.And I loved the way they helped my family with our problems.We didn't have toilet paper and housekeeping came fast. I loved the property and the employees, and I would love to go back.

We arrived on a Tuesday, August 11, 2015 and approximatly 4:30 pm and when we entered the room, it had a foul odor. My wife immediately went to use the rest room and I sat on one of the beds to wai for her. As I sat there I began to notice that the carpet had dark stains throughout which is most likely why there was a foul odor to the room. I also noticed trash under the table and chair. I took a picture of the trash with my cellphone. My wife came out of the restroom and we looked at each other with disgust and decided to look for another hotel. It didn't takr long for us to find another hotel and booked it for 3 nights. We returned to the Best Western at 5:40 pm and explained to the desk clerk that we were very dissatisfied with the room due to the circumstances. We were

We stayed for 2 nights.  The hotel is average, nothing fancy.  This hotel is pretty old, the room where we assigned to has bad odor, stained on carpet & filthy, broken shower head, old kitchenette, and warn out cabinet, super SLOW internet, dirty pool water.  Breakfast is below average, plain & boring.  I discovered other hotel (like Holiday Inn Express) as they served better breakfast with more bacon, sausage and better quality coffee.   Though‚Ä¶I must say that the front desk employees are helpful & kind.  Any issues you encountered‚Ä¶.their act on it right the way, they take your concern priority.  Also, this the hotel has self-service laundry onsite (washer & dryer), that‚Äôs a plus !!  The hotel location is great, 30 mins drive from Disneyland.  Pretty quiet location mainly at

Area is very quiet, good breakfast (sausages, waffle, eggs, potatoes, juice...), new remodeling room, free water bottles. Front desk is very nice and friendly. The room is very big, desk, microwave, small ref. and two side chairs, fast internet. We will come back

I love this place. It is the best hotel around. The staff is awesome. They are very personable and they truly care about your stay. I've never been to a more comfortable hotel then this one. They really do a good job at making it feel like a home away from home.

Stayed for a week on business. The price was fair and the hotel was clean. Staff was nice and polite. The breakfast was your standard hotel breakfast. No complaints. There were plenty of restaurants nearby.

Great staff front desk service is the best checked in early and they had my room ready was there for 3 days housekeeping was great real nice ladies I witch I knew there names but in overall great experience will come back soon also very affordable and nice breakfast

I came to this area during the first week of the  U.S open surf competition in Huntington Beach. To my surprise, most of the hotels were fully booked. My friend and I got lucky to get a room from this hotel. The price was great for what i got. There was free breakfast in the morning which included eggs, potatoes, sausages, and waffles to name a few. The person working at the front desk was very accommodating and greeted us with a smile. The room we stayed in was nice and comfortable. There was a pool area to cool off from the heat as well as a ping pong table and putting green. I will definitely come back whenever i need a place to stay in that area.

Stayed here with friends while the US Open of surfing was going on in Huntington Beach. We enjoyed our stay at this location as all the staff are very friendly. The room was clean and big enough for our group and it came with a small fridge and microwave. They have a pool, jacuzzi, and putting green but we didn't use it much since we were at the beach most of our time here. Their breakfast had a nice variety to it and the breakfast lady was friendly and made sure everything was stocked. The only downside was that they weren't able to get us a first floor room with a patio on our first night but they were able to move our stuff to a new room the following day while we were in Huntington Beach. They gave us a quiet room on the first floor that was away from the street. I highly

They really know customer service. Always smiling and ready to help. Clean and with free water bottles how cool is that. There patios are very relaxing and its family friendly. The breakfast was good too with an attendant making waffles for you.

Made my first trip to California unforgettable. Shannon was a great help and the workers were very friendly. The rooms were nice and the beds were comfortable. I definitely would recommend Best Western to anyone traveling to West Minister.

I was in need of a decent hotel for a few days and was surprised of how clean and affordable this hotel was!!! To top it off they offered a variety of items for bfast which was very convenient to grab and go plus saved us money and time and were able tp start our day early.  There pool is so inviting and relaxing after a long day of being out. The cleanliness was great rooms look super clean i would totally come back and stay here again!!!

I stayed in this hotel for my getaway and i must say my stay was amazing!!! Front desk clerks were great gave me directions to the places i wanted to visit. Breakfast was great.  I loved that fact that it opened early and was able to have something before starting my day. I would totally recommend this hotel when on vacation.

Good room service.good breakfast.clean pool.clean hot tub.fun mini golf.I like the back patio on next to the pool.it is in a safe place outside of L.A.breakfast is outstanding.are able to send emails to the front desk and they will print it out for you.easy to get on and off interstate and Shannon was great.

We stayed for a week for a softball tournament...not a fancy place at all, but clean. When housekeeping was cleaning, they found some cash I had left out on the bed. The front desk called to ask where I wanted her to put the cash so it would be safe. Great little courtyard and Shannon was most accommodating!!

Best Western in Westminster, California has been great! Shannon has been awesome with anything needed, and rooms are clean!!!!    Great price also! I definitely recommend staying here! First time in California,   and has been a great experience!!!!!! Caca

Hotel is the absolute pits all rooms are disgusting carpets are horrendous all of the air conditioning units are broken and make such a loud noise I had to check my whole family out at 1am the manager was rude was moved to a room that smelt of urine there are plenty of other nice hotels in the area I have never felt the Need to write a review on here in my life but this is the worst hotel experience I have ever had dirty filthy noisy hell hole is the only words I can describe !'n

Service was poor.  Eating area was small.  Room was musty.  They got my reservation wrong but were unapologetic and rude.  The area of the hotel was not great as well.  I will not stay at this Best Western again.

My family and I stayed here for 6 nights during July 2015. We had a most pleasant stay. The rooms were well kept and clean with much appreciated air conditioning. Buffet breakfast was provided and there was more than enough variety. The staff were friendly and very helpful. The hotel had a pool and hot tub and little mini golf, all of which we utilised along with a computer and printer. There were good size TVs and free cable and on demand TV shows. All of this was complimentary as was the wifi. When we left the hotel and reached the airport, we realised that our 5 year old had left his lifelong teddy bear behind him. When we contacted the hotel they responded straight away and mailed us the bear for no cost. All in all, I would definitely recommend this hotel to anyone. It is

The Hotel was clean and tidy but very noisy from the air conditioning vent outside the room which kept me up all night as well as the uncomfort of the beds, staff were friendly and breakfast was okay. Room had average space but there was enough.

Very Clean  And Quiet Area Great For Relaxing the staff were courteous. the breakfast was greater than most if your comparing to other motel hotels of their kind. the pool are was clean and inviting. the bathrooms were very nicely kept. I would definitely book here again.

The BW Westminster is a nice place to stay, reasonable rates, good breakfast offering, nice outside amenities (ping pong, pool, spa, putting area, bbq.  Rooms are clean, nice beds but some need a makeover.

Good Services, clean rooms and comfortable. Staff very friendly and helpful when were required. Orientation on how to go to main attractions and beaches were accurate. I recommend this Hotel if you need something not to expensive and good quality.

Beds were awesome! We were in town for an angels game and pretty much just spent the night and enjoyed the breakfast. Overall pretty good beds and service and breakfast was good. Pool closed very early which was a the only downside.

Nice location that is easy to get to from everywhere.  Really close to some great beaches- seal beach, Laguna beach and others- 5 minute drive to dip feet in water!  Also close to Disney parks and other family attractions.  Nice and helpful staff!

Great place to stay located not far and easy access to Disneyland. Very quite. We had room that faced away from road. The hotel had easy access to Disneyland and to the Pacific Coast highway. Good location to access the beach areas. Good restaurants nearby.

This is a nice little family friendly place to stay. Not too far from the beach. Clean rooms. Nice back patio place to sit and relax.   Breakfast is very convenient and fairly plentiful. Easy check and friendly check in. Very pleased with our stay here.

Great place to stay, easy to get to all the major attractions in the area. Fresh Breakfast, hot and delicious. Very friendly and accommodating staff. I have stayed here twice and both times have a been a pleasant experience!

Summary Heading: Great location, reasonable price, you get what you pay for.
Summary: Location is great approximately 15 minutes from Seal Beach, about 10 minutes to 15 minutes to Disneyland, 8 minutes to Knotts Berry Farm very centrally located. The front lobby was very clean and the continental breakfast was subpar. The room unfortunately was not the cleanest the carpet was pretty dirty we had the entire family walk around in sandals while in the room because of the carpet there was a couple of issues with the restroom the tub and shower area was pretty old and dated a new caulking was place to try to cover up but wasn't the cleanest. The pool was a little small. The hotel looks like it was previously a apartment complex that was turned into a hotel. They did have a grill outside that you may use you and nice patio area is downstairs and they do have a washer

We like the location of this hotel..because it is close to Seal beach-a beautiful beach to visit! some of the rooms need remodeling though. For the price--it does include breakfast., which is always nice. Parking is easy--if you get a bottom floor room--otherwise the stairs give you a workout! :) The pool area is nice--yet need a separate area for smokers. One employee--Asian fellow- was helpful & friendly--the night shift man-Richard!! Thank you Richard --for helping arrange another night's stay..so we could spend more time with family! :)   Will stay again when in the area.

This was a cute hotel that felt like a home environment. I thought it looked small at first but realized that it was actually cozy. There was a grill for use, ping pong table, and the pool actually had towels for use. The breakfast was good, even though the dining area is small. I will stay here again, and the staff was great!

Summary Heading: Good hotel for a good price
Summary: The hotel is so clean and big. The staffs were nice and helpful. I only stayed there for one nice to visit Vietnam town, but it was a good stay, want to come there again. The breakfast is nice with good coffee and everything you need for a breakfast.

Summary Heading: Location good, hotel not so much
Summary: If you are looking for a location which places you between Long Beach and Disneyland, this is a good place.  This Best Western Inn has a varied breakfast and great and helpful staff but the rooms need a major overhaul.

The hotel is very small but nice. Pool and hot tub. First floor has patios. Grill,very small putt putt, and paddle board table outside. Rooms are nice size, beds are comfortable. Nice pillows. Fridge and microwave in rm. free breakfast .. Waffles, eggs, sausage and potatoes. Yogurt, bagels and more! Only one washer and dryer. And less than 9 miles away from Disneyland! Would stay here again! Kids loved it.

My family come here for a holiday from Shanghai China. Rent a car from LAX and very easy to get here. The pool in the backyard is great, room and toilet is clean, the parking , wifi and breakfast are free and good. We like here and will come again.

Good location and a nice back yard. It is fair with price. Hotel is old. Boring look. Bed is too weak for supporting two average weight of people. Items for breakfast are too limited. If you just need only basic for sleeping this is your place otherwise you should select a different hotel.

Great location, near Huntington Beach California. Clean rooms and friendly front desk staff. My only recommendation is for high chairs to be provided at breakfast. The lobby was very clean and had decent amount of space.

Good spot as far as its not in a slum or ghetto type area,nice and quite,the rooms were good size with a back sliding door big beds nice large bathrooms.theres laundry facility on site freeway access near by lot of COPS patrolling the area makes you feel safe like staying in your room.The breakfast is pretty outstanding if I say so myself.Just don't have any more than 1 or 2 friends or family stop by the consider it excessive traffic and won't let you extend your stay

This hotel worked out okay for us due to an excellent staff.  They helped address our squeaking bed and other issues.  However, this hotel is very old and everything shows its age.  The rails look like they might give at any moment.  Everything is covered in several layers of paint.  Coverings are coming off the upper deck. The golf putt surface has several folds in it making it useless for practice. The water in the hot tub was green and full of a nasty foam.  It's in need of serious renovation.  Had we paid less for our  stay I wouldn't care as much about the condition, but it wasn't worth the money.

I always have a great time at this hotel.  The pool is great.  The staff is very nice.  Everything clean. Free parking and free Internet and free breakfast.  This hotel is a great value. Very close to beach and 405

Close by HWY 405, easy access. Includes continental breakfast was nice. Server helping at breakfast is ver friendly and attentive. Room is quite enough for me considering my room was facing to Westminster St. A good size convenient store meant within walking distance is handy.

We enjoyed our stay at Best Western Inn in Westminster,CA. It was very reasonably priced and the front desk staff was very helpful with whatever we needed. The room and bathroom were very nice. We would recommend this hotel to anyone staying in the area.

I have stayed at this hotel multiple times over the years and have always had a great time. It is very clean. Free Parking, Free Breakfast, and Free Internet that actually works. The staff is very helpful. I love the location, close to the beach and the 405 freeway.

Checked in really late and the guy at the counter greeted us with a big smile and hello. The neighborhood looked clean and safe!! The room was clean & spacious. Dark shades for sleeping in! Comfy bed & great shower head. The morning staff are just as pleasant!! Everyone & everything was wonderful. Coffee was out at breakfast & the nice woman jumped in before I could even ask!! Breakfast was great! Waffle maker, eggs, sausage, juice & other delicious things! This hotel is a wonderful stay in a nice neighborhood (which is scary when traveling to new places!!) one of the cleaning women asked to help bring my cooler down & I kindly insisted I was okay. Than later as I was struggling a cleaning man saw me and ran over to help without question. THAN as I was getting Ice another staff

Great hotel. Affordable with a friendly staff and complimentary breakfast. I had a delicious waffle and some fruit. There was also eggs, sausage, cereal, coffee, juice, yogurt, etc. The room was clean and had a comfy bed. Nice and safe location too. Would stay here again!

After finding hotel on internet and booking online, I was expecting a pretty nice hotel. I wasn't even sure I was @ the right hotel when I arrived. I had to ask. Seemed like an old building that was partially fixed up and turned into a hotel. I had an upstairs room and even the floors were uneven (had lumps underneath carpet)

Loved this hotel. Wonderful staff and accomadations. loved the pool, the room, the location, the closeness to the beach and food.Easy check in and check out. It had a laundry room and that was an extra.

This hotel was exactly what needed! Clean for the most part. Inexpensive and free breakfast! This place has a pool and easy access to the highway!  There was some mold in the bathroom. Would stay again

Summary Heading: Pictures are much better than reality....
Summary: The hotel itself was not as good as expected.   The property looks tired and old.   Rooms were clean, service at first was good.  Pros: Check-in was timely Clean room  Cons: Noisy Street  Breakfast area is small seats 20 people max, had to ask to things to be turned on, stocked, etc.    Ice machine was broke or switched off.  Carpets in rooms need to be cleaned.

The staff is courteous. The room is very clean and the staff is very helpful. The breakfast food had a variety of choices. Fruit was lacking however. The pool area is very clean. The miniature golf putting green was fun. Thank you.

This room was exactly what we were looking for with its location and price. The rooms were nice and clean. We also enjoyed the pool area. There is also a little putting green area that the kids enjoyed. The hotel itself isnt anything fancy but is a decent hotel for a quick weekend trip. I would recommend this room.

Outstanding service, Clean rooms. My family and I definitely enjoyed our stay here. The breakfast is one of the best I have seen with a great selection of choices.  Shannon at the front desk always greets you with a smile at check-in. Alfredo was really nice when I asked for a late check out.

This hotel is very nice  rooms were clean ,pool was nice  Breakfast was good had everything we needed . The staff was really nice especially  Shannon she took care of all are needs  I would recommend this hotel

Summary Heading: Good location for Orange County Visit
Summary: Good for visiting Huntington Beach, Long Beach, and  other nearby towns.  Good  value for the area and one of the best hotels in the area except for very high-end places.  We've stayed there before and have been well satisfied.  The back rooms are the best.

We drove to LA and spent the night in Westminster at a Best Western so that we could drive to Newport Beach as well. This hotel was just great for us.  They accomodated us in our asking for a nice quiet room and they were helpful in printing out directions to the beach.  I would stay here again since it is near the freeway.

When we arrived around 3 PM the Wi-Fi worked fine, but by the next morning ..... nothing. Picture the slowest dial-up and multiply it my ...... infinity because we could never get online. So if you need to use the Internet, you may have to figure another way.    The staff was fine and the breakfast was a little better than average.  They are in the middle of a 3 year remodel, so I guess it's the luck of the draw as to what kind of room you get.    Our room was downstairs. Old but clean. I had not seen the old fashioned individual hot and cold bath faucets in years. $77+ for two queens.

i have stayed at every hotel in with in a 20 miles of this location and i must say there is no other hotel that can compare to the quality and service you will get from the bestwestern hotel in westminister ca.

Had booked this hotel for two nights but really was only in the hotel room for a total of 8-9 hours overall. I had booked it because I was going to join in the festivities of the 24 hour Disney Event where the parks were open for 24 hours straight and I knew I would want a place to sleep before heading home. The hotel is not a long drive to the Disney parks but they were close enough for the price. There is not much near the hotel that we could see. Some gas stations and liquor stores and I did see a Subway to the left of the hotel across the street. Free parking though so I would suggest this hotel only if you had a car to use to get around.  Got to the hotel on Thursday night and check in was quick and easy. The front desk clerk reminded us that the hotel had free breakfast in

Good location, reasonable prices and acceptable breakfast...hot tub is great as is pool...also putting course...a good stay, close to I405, not too much street noise, friendly staff, Internet was a tad bit intermittent but worked 95% of the time

Was in Riverside CA and was looking for a better place to stay at. Looked threw a few reviews and came across the Westminster in. I recently went threw Idenity Theft and I explained my situation to they guy a the front desk. He was very helpful in holding a room for me on short notice and without a CC. I have stayed here before in the past (4 years ago), The place has changed since I was last here. they added a breakfast room and updated the furniture in the rooms. Also added a few more eminitys from the last time I was here. Check in was easy and the staff was friendly.

I have stayed here multiple times over the years and always have a great stay.  Free parking (many hotels in OC charge $20.00 to park), free internet works great, and Free Breakfast.  It is a great value and I highly recommend it.  I will be staying again soon!

For the price you won't be disappointed.  It's one of the properties that need a make over so it's not looking like the Howard Johnson's hotel but you don't have to spend another on the room. Had nice pool and rooms are still large with microwave and ice box not really but sounds cool .  It was easy off freeway and very quite hotel.

The Hotel staff was very friendly, the rooms were large, clean and the beds were very comfortable.  The Breakfast had a lot of choices, scramble egg, sausages, hash browns or Belem waffles, yogurt, fresh fruit, yogurt and a variety of dried cereals. Standard hot or cold drinks. nicely located  easy to get to the beach, Anaheim,

This hotel was a great value for the money. Clean and comfortable. Water pressure in the shower was great. Front desk staff was very accommodating and friendly. The only issue was the finicky key card.

Exceeded my expectation when I thought about staying in a best western. It actually is a mini suite with a kitchenette (which I need a fridge for my daughters milk) so for the low price I was impressed. Clean. Two couches. Big king bed. Table and chair. BIG tv with all the good channels!

Spent a wonderful night here with my family on a short vacatiin.  Desk staff extremely helpfyl and kind.  Breakfast was great with eggs, sausage and potatos, and waffles.  Would stay here again.  Only reason ni t a five was pool light was out but got replaced the next day.

My brother and I brought my mother, his wife and 2 kids here for Mother's Day weekend. The rooms were very clean and so were the bathrooms (we booked 2 rooms). The children had a blast at the pool, it was heated very well so the children got to swim in the evening. Complementary breakfast at the hotel was well stocked with many food options. My niece jumped for joy to have waffles for breakfast! The only complaint we had was the construction on the hotel driveway starting at 9am. The adults were awake but the children would liked to have slept later. Otherwise this is a lovely hotel and will definitely book here again.

The hotel is just a few miles from Seal Beach, which is a really nice little beach town.  The hotel is really quiet and the staff that work there are really nice.  The breakfast is great too! While we weren't able to enjoy the pool, it looks very inviting.

I usually don't care for Best Western hotels, but I was definitely impressed. The room was very clean and quiet. Very comfortable. The complimentary breakfast had just about everything you could think of. It doesn't look like much from the street but it fits with the surrounding area. This hotel has caused me to reevaluate the Best  Western brand. For the better.

Nice stay. Nice hotel with microwave, mini fridge, and nice patio. We stay hear for three days. It near restaurants and easy access to major highway. The price was good. I think the carpet and the mattress could be upgraded. Otherwise, it was a nice stay overall. We will come back.

One of my favorite best westerns,it is minutes to huntington beach and oc venues. All the staff are super friendly. Get a room with a pool view. Continental breakfast is o.k. The building is rustic (needs updating) but is very relaxing.

Very clean and neat sheets extra blankets back yard  eggs waffles fruit cereal activia yogurt jacuzzi pool putting green ping pong perfect weather and best of all immaculate caring service. Thank you very much

Don't let the exterior scare you away.  Stayed here after a flight that arrived late at Long Beach Airport and didn't want to drive to San Diego.  The rate was great, and while the room was a bit dated everything was clean...from room, bathroom, to lobby & breakfast area.  Employees were all accomodating.  A great deal & I highly recomment!

The room is very clean and the bed is very soft :) This is really good especially for after a 12 hours long flight, I really sleep well and have a good night! Also, the breakfast is good and well service„ÄÇBest western hotels are very good, I always chose Best western hotel when I visit America :)

my sister is disabled and we were originally put in the diabled room. the carpet was stained and the room was very basic. managenent made it much better by placing us in a non ada room which had kitchenette, better seating, plus more space and near pool, so second room seemed much nicer for the cost. free breakfast pretty good, too bad no gluten free waffles.

We stopped in for an overnight stay. The room is clean and service good. this was the best priced Best Western in the LA area. It is pleasantly surprised by the friendly reception and clean spacious rooms. We will choose this hotel again.Would recommend!

This place is great! The room is very quaint and offers great views. As well, service and accommodations are very well done. Breakfast is served daily and if that doesn't please you, there are restaurants within 15 minutes by car. I would definitely come back and stay for longer the next time I'm back in California.

Great service for a good price. I recommend for sure!! Good location, and the bedrooms are so comfortable. If it possible try to go on the pool, when it's sunny, also has a great views.Best western I say it again come back for sure!!!!!!!!!!!!

Summary Heading: Good hotel at a great price!
Summary: Stopped in for an overnight stay, this was the best priced Best Western in the LA area so was not expecting much. Was pleasantly surprised by the friendly reception and clean spacious rooms. Was even given a welcome bag upon checking in. Would recommend!

Summary Heading: Good place for a great value
Summary: This is a nice place to stay for the value. The staff is friendly and check-in was easy. While the exterior seems a little dated the interior is fine. Our room is large with a nice overstuffed chair and the bed is very comfortable. We are staying here for its location near LA, the beach cities, and Anaheim. We will be back!

Nice check in, good room. All was very good except the internet speed was slow in the room. Otherwise, great value and good service. Very good location for our trip, clean and convenient. We would stay again

I found the staff to be very accommodating and helpful. The location is very convenient to other parts of Los Angeles and the room rate is very reasonable. The breakfast area is well appointed and there is free on-site parking.  The free Wi-Fi is certainly a plus. Will consider the place again the next time to travel.

Summary Heading: Great hotel for a great price
Summary: The staff is so nice and the lobby gets better each visit. We have been using this motel for the last year when visiting for work and fun trips.   They finally solved the Internet hopefully it will get a little faster now that it stays connected.

We travel from Alberta to volunteer for the LB Indy every year and quite a few of us always stay here. The rooms are always clean and the staff pamper us. They set up breakfast really early for us we can be gone by 5:15 am Shannon the manager is an exceptional lady that does everything in her power to accommodate our needs. Richard went out of his way to deal with a situation that came up and we were very grateful for his assistance. We will stay at this hotel for many years to come :)

We have been coming to this motel for over 6 years and the service gets better every year.  They have upgraded the lobby and the breakfast area.  They have also upgrade the breakfast bar.  They have a hot breakfast now besides the cold items. You will like this motel if you are staying in the Long Beach, Disneyland area.

This place had a wonderful customer service.. heated pool was awesome..I had alot of fun just putting on the mini golf green..definately would stay here again. Not far from anything..we're able to get to the beach and Disneyland in no time.

They have always been good, but they have improved their lobby and breakfast.  The management and all the help bend over backwards to make sure you enjoy your stay.   I recommend this motel to anyone needing a motel the LB area.

Summary Heading: Great service and close to everything
Summary: I'm visiting family in long beach and having fun at the theme parks. Best of both worlds close to freeway. Not a tourist area.  Staff was excellent, very accommodating. The roons were well kept, though you can see their age a little. I will be back.

Summary Heading: truly not to be a Best Western motel
Summary: given the  the Best Western  name brand , we  stayed here,  rooms needed  to  have a complete  major renovation ,  dirty  carpets to sagging  beds and the  television , which has fading colours, although  centrally located,where we  wanted to be,   truly not worth the value.to stay here..

I was impressed with this hotel. It's not on a "main" street but easy acess to the 405 fwy. The front desk employee was great and completed check-in easily. He answered questions that I had and was very friendly! Our room was nice with a patio view of the pool area. There was even a BBQ grill! The room was clean with a microwave and refrigerator. I would definitely stay here again!

If you're looking for a clean, affordable and comfortable stay near Disneyland area then this one is for you. With free wifi, breakfast, parking, pool (with a nice view of the garden) and friendly and courteous staff. Our stay here was great. We'll definitely be coming back here once we visit Disneyland again.

Lovely place to stay and great value for money. My wife and I found the location of the hotel to be very convenient for travelling to the south of California as far as San Diego and also to visit the other areas of Los Angeles

Great stay, great breakfast! The family loved the pool, and spa, get place for kids to visit. Safe and comfortable bed with kitchen in room cooked dinner for kids and saved money on take out. I would stay again

Nice Room with a very good Breakfast in the morning.  Great Front Desk Staff.  Were very helpful with the questions I had.  Will be back here as I travel every week and always need a great place to rest.

Summary Heading: Old building, poor service, nice staff
Summary: This place was one of the worst best western inns. The building is very old. Once the AC/heater starts working you could see yourself at the airport. The rooms were not really clean. The carpets were dirty. Old bathroom and restroom. The breakfast is very limited and low quality. The only good thing about this place is their nice and kind staff, otherwise I would not recommend it unless you are desperate to find a place.

A terrific deal, neat & clean well appointed rooms but if you're interested in complimentary breakfast deals I would suggest going elsewhere.   The breakfast area is extremely cramped, unkempt and lacks adequate seating for the number of guests. I recommend they offer outside seating near the patio and maybe trays to carry food items to compensate for the lack of seating.

Great price. Room was nice and clean. Very quiet. Plenty of parking. Stayed for only one night but liked it very much. Easy in and out of the freeway. Definitely will book this hotel again if in the area.

We have stayed at this property few years ago, we have truly enjoyed. This time our stay was even better - they have increased the breakfast area, and are now serving omelet, hot saussages and boiled potatoes. Rooms are great, and we've got the room facing the pool. Kids have enjoyed the pool. Would definately return !

Clean, comfortable, well maintained. Great breakfast with omelet, saussage and boiled potatoes. Great pool with heated spa. We were able to use the computer and printer in the lobby  to print various tickets to events. Would definately return.

Always great customer service at its max. Friendly staff with caring attitude the breakfast was great specially the potatoes. The complimentary water bottles is definitely plus if you plan on spending alot of time at hotel request a patio room.

We didn't get the room with patio we had reserved for s long time ago. We dident like receptionist behavior. The continental breakfast is free, it is as usual. We where here for two nights and visit LA.

We have stayed at this hotel for the last 7 years and have been very satisfied with the suite.  It is large and has a fully stocked kitchen with dishes, pots & pans & silverware.  A small range & refrigerator is included.  The room are always clean and the staff I helpful.  Nothing fancy but very livable for an extended stay.

Room carpet not clean had to have them vacuum and then steam clean them.  Room needs overhaul. I would not stay here again after this visit. Not enough dishes had yo go buy paper plates, cups and anything else I would need. Too dirty.

the court yard is always a plus pool is clean the jacuzzi is in great shape  roses in back are amazing like generations of the most beatiful roses i have ever seen   once again westminster has made a great home for a perfect sailing adventure  thanks best western

This place was very nice to stay. I have nothing to complain about. It is very clean. They do a great job on the rooms and grounds. Very comfortable, just make sure you bring your own toilet paper theirs is horrible. Disneyland had better.  Very quiet and off the beaten path which my family likes. We would stay there again. Hope this helps others also!!

Nice place. Not too noisy. Clean. Best staff in Westminster! Definitely a bargain for all the amenities. Central location to beach cities and amusement parks, Leisure World, etc... If you like big fat pillows and LOTS of them, they come with the comfy beds. We keep coming back here for all these reasons.

This is a great family hotel and perfectly placed to get to everything you would want to see in Orange County. We were 30 minutes or less from amusement parks and the beach. It has easy access to the highways. The breakfast was decent and the staff was very nice. The room itself was perfect for my family of four. The kids really enjoyed the table tennis and putting range onsite. I myself enjoyed the coffee 24 hours a day!

We stopped at this Best Western for the value. We were extremely pleased with the location and the staff. Although, the room needed minor repairs, and more attention to cleaning, it wasn't something to explode over. I would stay at this location again.

This is a great BW. The rooms are very clean and super comfortable beds. They seem like they were newly renovated, everything seems clean and new. The spa was right outside our sliding back door and it was nice and hot. It is hard to get a room here though because they are always booked up with per diem workers which 9/10 times I end up having to go elsewhere.

This hotel it was very well located, very close to the 405, near where I had a business meeting. Very clean, the room very clean, everything working well. The check in and check out, very fast and easy.

I booked 1 night stay only 2 days in advance at Best Western Westminster Inn with a reasonable price.  This hotel offers an economical stay in the area.  It closes to Disneyland, Knots Berry, beaches, shopping, and I405.  The guest room is clean and has good d√©cor, and very comfortable bed.  Best front desk staff I ever met.  Definitely will be back gain.

The location for all the great things to do    dinseyland and knotts berry are very accessible even by bus   long beach seems so far but with the orange county bus transfer station its just 2 buses a breeze   the hotel itself has great staff perfect location for any and all transit   even the local grocery store on corner makes for perfect barb ques in  the courtyard and ping pong  pool is always pristine   all around great place

From the greeting to the send off, great experience. Love the staff, the pool area, the putting green, the bbq  they have it all! The rooms are very clean and the bed sheet and comforters are crisp. You cant beat the price and would pay more if I had to. Love this place from top to bottom.

We stayed for 3 days in a spacious room with a small kitchenette.  An older motel where you park outside your room.  Rooms had not long been refurbished, bed was very comfortable.    We didn't use the pool or BBQ - all rooms seemed to open to the pool area.  The area was good and it was quiet at night.  The only criticism I would have is that the kitchen cupboards had not been renewed even though the bench tops had and there was not much in the way of kitchen or eating utensils.

after spending a terrible night in another hotel, we moved to this Best Western, it was the smartest decision we made during our Orange County stay.  Alfredo at the desk welcomed us, answered our questions, and showed us to a room we were more than satisfied with.  Everything was clean, no smell, comfortable and quiet at night.  If we return to the area,  this will undoubtably be our hotel choice.  Staff was friendly and smiling,  says something for their place of employment.

the rooms are very spacious the courtyard is amazing,   ping pong table barbque roses   clean pool  even a putting range  the staff at westminster are very helpful and caring    super location hop skip to huntington beach close to las alamitos bay and right in middle of the 2 with knotts berry farms close by

This is not the newest or fanciest hotel, but they've done everything they can to make the best of it.  The staff is very friendly and helpful, the room was clean and tidy, and the hot breakfast was a great way to start the day.  Even the coffee is better than it has a right to be.

Hotel is not hard to find. Check in was quick and my room was in a good location. Digital cable and lcd tv with a DVD player and on demand was a nice touch. Rooms are good sized and have central air so none of those annoying window units. Says the pool is heated but felt cold. Hot tub was nice but some of the jets didn't work and it had a funky chlorine stink when you turned it on too.  Courtyard is nice and there's a grill and ping pong table. Small breakfast array looked alright but I did not eat. Plenty of parking. Rooms need new beds, furniture, carpets and remodeled bathrooms. Also please take the soap dispensers out, it's tacky.  Use organic products in biodegradable/recyclable bottles. A new hot tub would be fantastic. Had no issues with staff or service they seemed

The first night I didn't know that we have the problem with the heater. The next morning  I turned the heater high only the cool air was coming out.  I called the office they said somebody will check it. But then they called me back and  moved  us to the other room with the working heater.

Reasonable price and clean hotel in a quiet area of OC.  About 10 miles away drive directly to the beach area of OC. I would definitely recommend this hotel. The breakfast is average at best but what's to complain for the price? it has a pool, grill area as well.

This hotel is small (two stories) but very clean and comfortable.  Employees are very friendly and efficient. We stay here two or three times a year and have always been very satisfied. Rooms are always clean and pool/spa area is close to all rooms. Breakfast is provided and plentiful, room to eat or take out. Suites are large and provide stove & refrig, dishes & silverware, everything you need for a longer stay.

Came down to see our friends visting from Vietnam.Loved the hotel and the grounds,The put-put course was just awesome.The staff was real good.I droped everyone off at little Sagion and came back to take a dip and a round of put-put and while i was in room changing the phone rang.It was happy hour for rewards card holder.OOOO yea beer and wine and snacks.Shoot what more can you say.It was well put togather and we meet some nice people enjoying ourselfs.

Location was good for us because it was near family. Price was good for the quality of this hotel, not a bad choice. Friendly staff and clean rooms. Although we had a non-smoking room and there were carpet cigarette burns(?), although the room did not smell like smoke. Overall the room was comfortable. The food was OK, but no variety, same everyday. The new improved lobby and dining area was great. For us the value was worth the price.

Nice place off the freeway and close to the ocean and family. also fairly close to things to do in orange co and greater L.A. There is a nice pool and spa area and a usable barbeque. Good eats in the morning or walk to Starbucks just a block down the street

we love the private back yard and private entrance to the swimming pool. you can just sit back in your room and watch the kids swimming and be within their reach.  they serve up beautiful hot breakfast. Friendly and helpful staff.

Nice property. Best front desk staff I ever met. No clue why its averaging 3 stars. Its not the ritz carolton but for the price and type of property it is deserving of more stars. Theres one of the cleanest hot tubs and pools i been in. A putt putt course for kids. Some select rooms have patios on lower level. It was competely quiet. Very very clean. The owners clearly care.  Great location. I reccomend it to friends. I was there thru the weekend again totaly quite. Great beds and pillows. Carpet could use a upgrade but was clean. Bathroom was clean. I stay at hotels in all price ranges. This was nicer than some i pay tripple the price for. Keep up the great work!

I stayed for one night. Everything went well from beginning to end and it was a very good value. Computer in the lobby was fast and helpful. There was a REAL breakfast with good coffee which is nice. I like it's location--near beach area and cooler weather but far enough away from it all to not be involved with it (if that's what you want--and I did). I'd definitely stay here again and recommend it.

I could not recommend this motel to anyone.  The carpet looked filthy.  We had one hand towel in the bathroom.  There was a cob web on the ceiling.  It seemed like very little money was being spent on making this motel a place where anyone would want to stay.

Summary Heading: For us, a great location & good value
Summary: We have stayed here whenever we visit family nearby over the last five years.  The staff are helpful, and while the facilities are not the newest, they are always clean and functional.  We'll stay here again next time.

Owner has finally given in and spent the money and listened to folks regarding service and seems to get things going right.  Recommend this place for convenience of location.  Front desk more on the ball too.

We stayed here for a family vacation in September. We drove to Huntington Beach every day and it only took 15 minutes to get to the beach. The free breakfast was typical continental breakfast, but it was fresh, and had a good selection of items to choose from.  The pool is relatively small but there weren't a lot of people using it when we were there. We did sit in the hot tub which was nice and relaxing.  The grounds of the hotel are quite basic. Price for what you get and location were very reasonable. Staff were helpful and friendly.  Would stay here again.

Hotel is in a nice location with easy access to freeways and the beach. Room was nice and comfortable. The AC was a tad noisy but very efficient. Kept us comfortable. Excellent breakfast with good non-carbohydrate options. No elevator so you need to haul bags upstairs.

Summary Heading: Comfortable and economical - good for Disneyland if you have a car
Summary: Best Western Westminster Inn is a comfortable hotel that offers an economical stay in the area.  Cost just over $600 for 7 nights in a 2 queen room.  When we pulled up to the front the first time we were a little worried because the curb appeal is not that impressive.  The door to our room was on the front leading in from the parking lot and there are no windows at the front anywhere except at reception.  But when we walked into our room we were pleasantly surprised as it was a basic clean room with 2 queen beds, a glass patio door leading out back to a private patio, mini putting green, pool, hot tub and ping pong table.  Inside there is a fridge, microwave, flat screen TV, and a separate sink area outside of the washroom.  The sink area was also separate from the rest of the

stayed here two nights whilst travelling around California.The hotel is well located and close to the 405.Our room was nice and clean and beds were good.The only crititism I could have was when we stayed there it was 90+ degrees at night and the air con was just to noisy to sleep at night with.The breakfast was good and there are plenty of places to eat out at of a night

It's nice to be able to go to hotel in these days and feel safe.  Staff is very friendly and helpful with your needs.  Rooms are beautiful done and meets all your needs for your family and you.  We are looking forward to stay again at this hotel.What a wonderful place.

Great room, Great prices. Slept extremely well on the comfortable beds. Close to the park. Having free breakfast we didn't have to eat expensive food at Disneyland! This place has it all for travelers on a budget.

I liked the room except for outdated carpet which was stained and all rooms are in need of upgrade, bed is best part of room along with flat screen tv, AC is loud when on but it cools. its fairly quite at night even though by street which is busy. parking is tight. if you have large car or truck its a challenge, price point is good and was main reason for staying, battroom is outdated with separate hot/cold valves need single handle controls for scolding control

the people are awesome    very great directions  easy to get to bbeaches and close to marinas    love the easy access to everthing only 13  minutes from disneylad   and they dont jack up prices like the others do    off the grid but close to action

The hotel is located a few blocks from the 405. Nice location, easy access. The price is for the room is reasonable.  Staff is friendly.  You may have to ask for cups, additional towels. No noise, good neighbor hood.   Beds are bad,need to be replaced.

Summary Heading: Nice, quiet, clean, great place to stay!
Summary: This is the perfect place for families to stay when they visit Disneyland. It's not far from Disneyland and it is very clean and quiet. The beds were great and we had a lovely, spacious room complete with fridge and microwave. Nice pool with hot tub and a fun putting green. There is definitely a family atmosphere here. Delicious breakfast with waffles, sausage, eggs, roasted potatoes, Danish, toast, whole and 2% milk, orange juice, yogurt and fruit. The staff keeps it well stocked and very clean. Wonderful, friendly staff. This place is a little older but well maintained. These people care! :)

I hate hotels and rarely look forward to vacations. Best Western Westminister Inn surprised me. I slept well in the soft beds, our room was always cleaned and well stocked when we got back from a day of fun. We used the barbecue every night. Staff was always friendly and courteous. The lady who stocked the breakfast stuff even helped my son get a plate and find a nearby seat. Highly recommend this hotel to everyone. Right off the freeway exit which helps you get everywhere you need to go.

We really like staying here because it is very close to our children's home. This time they upgraded us to a suite. It was enjoyable, even thought we only slept there.  We like the new lobby and dining area. We did not get a chance to enjoy the pool, hot tub or put-put golf.

Room was very nice and clean.  The room had a refrigerator microwave, and a coffee maker: all of which are very helpful when traveling.  I would highly recommend the Best Western Westminster Inn in Westminster CA.  I would definitely stay there again.  Though I didn't use it, a nice continental breakfast was available.  The location made it very easy for freeway access.

Summary Heading: An economic option for Disneyland Parks
Summary: We visited Disneyland parks in August 2014, we stay at BestWestern Westminster inn, its location is very convienient 20 -30 minutes driving from disneyland, at an affrdable cots and the typical quality of a BestWestern Hotel.

Summary Heading: Convenient to Long Beach and other beautiful sandy beaches.
Summary: We were pleasantly surprised by the large room and comfortable beds and as we were on the lower floor overlooking the warm swimming pool, were pleased that we had decided to stay for four nights. Guests seemed to have access to a gas barbecue on the lawn and there was a table tennis table nearby. We had two comfortable garden chairs outside to enjoy the wonderful climate.  The one part we did not like was the small breakfast bar with only three small tables despite many more guests. You could chose to take the ample breakfast meal to your room or on the lawn.

I received a call from the sales Mgr at BW Westminster Inn expressing concern at my negative comments about their property when our family booked two rooms there.  She was MOST gracious and apologetic about their WiFi amenity.. After checking with my teenage kids, they admitted that of the four BW hotels we stayed at, this hotel had the best of all of them.  Still couldn't get a good signal on my smartphone but they said they had no problem with their laptops. I stand corrected. While I admit that Westminster is a safe town, I still think the interior courtyard should be made inaccessible to anyone from the street who are not guests.  Fix that and we'd be happy to stay there again.

I was looking for a reasonably priced hotel within a short distance of Marine Stadium , Long Beach. A quick review on Trip Advisor and I found the Best Western in Westminster. The hotel is close enough to the freeway to be convenient and far enough so the noise is not an issue. Staff were efficient and friendly. Rooms are a good size, clean and well maintained. There are flat screen TVs in the rooms as well as a fridge and microwave. Free HBO , high speed internet and hot breakfast are all included in the price. There is a small swimming pool which is ideal for the kids to splash around in. Hotel also has on site laundry facilities. There is a strip mall within 2 minutes walking distance which has a supermarket and a couple of restaurants. The hotel also provides an "Order In"

Summary Heading: Deserves 3.5 stars. Good budget motel in a great location
Summary: If you are traveling on a budget to So Cal, the BW Westminster Inn is a good choice. Pros: Half the cost of other hotels in the area, but still in a great location: just a short drive to local beaches including Seal Beach and Belmont Shore. Easy access to freeways, Short walk to Starbucks. Room had clean, comfortable bedding, refrigerator, microwave, and free WiFi.  Cons: Breakfast items were just fair.  Motel has all open corridors, so even though the rooms are labeled as "non-smoking" guests will smoke outside of their rooms, which can enter your room through open spaces around your door. So if you have allergies this may be an issue. Also, there is a designated smoking area upstairs to the front of the building, so those rooms hold more of a smoke odor.

Summary Heading: Good choice for a basic hotel
Summary: This hotel was a utilitarian option for some of my family because we all couldn't fit in my mother's house.  It was pretty basic hotel but clean enough.  Decent enough for the prince paid and no real problems.  It was good to have a breakfast available first thing in the morning.

Hotel is situated close to freeway, beach and shopping.  Looks outdated, but very clean, helpful staff, great pool and putting greens, BBQ and ping pong for the kids.  For the $$, this is a good deal and I would stay here again.  Plenty of parking and lighting was good.
Manager Response: Thank you for your good words, hope to see you again soon

Summary: Best Western should NOT advertise "free" WiFi if it never works.  It doesn't matter if it's free if it's never works. Excuses that "they are working on it" won't cut it anymore with our family. Try to keep 3 teenagers happy on vacation when there's no WiFi! Very poor security in an "iffy" neighborhood with open access from the street to the inner courtyard with rooms and patios facing the unsecured courtyard.  Creepy!!
Manager Response: Wi Fi password is provided at the front desk,  sorry if the front desk had not communicated that on your check in.  . Our location is one of the safest in orange county.  Thanks for your comments

Summary: Exterior looked run down.  Breakfast eating area only had 3 tables for guest to sit and the hotel was pretty full. Food was not appetizing.  I would not recommend this hotel to anyone.  There are probably better Best Westerns in other cities.
Manager Response: Yes! that our lobby expansion caused some issues with breakfast.  Very happy to announce that the expansion is complete with more room for breakfast

Summary Heading: Man, you will be happy you chose this hotel.
Summary: I spend good money when choosing my hotel/motel.  But, you don't have to pay thousands for a great stay.  Best Western covers the important issues that any family would have. The bedding is clean. Very clean. There are no huge dirty bedspreads that are recycled.  The sheets and blankets are white and bleached. The rooms have standard microwave and fridge. The water pressure is great and hot water is plentiful. The office has nonstop hot coffee. They offer a happy hour of drinks and snacks (wine no less) from 5 to 7. The breakfast has a lot to offer.  The staff are great.  The pool is warm and clean. The rooms are nonsmoking, however, the first floor has patio doors and chairs. The parking is great. Hmm, what else,,,no noise issues, great cable channels, beds are sooo comfy.  The
Manager Response: Thank you for your positive review. Hope to see you again

Summary: We stayed in a room that has kitchen, very spacious. The area is safe, near Little Saigon. Hotel is clean.  Free Wi-fi, and free breakfast. Shopping mall is about 10-15 minutes from there. I would definitely recommend this hotel.

The location and hotel room was good. The rooms were clean and everyone was friendly. Scott at the front desk was very nice and made sure our stay was welcome. We will stay here again when were back in town visiting.

We stayed here for 4 nights on our trip to O.C. We wanted a central hub that was within 30 mins to Anaheim and the beaches. This was a great find at a great price. We ended up going to all the O.C. beaches from seal beach to san clemente as well as downtown disney and mission of san juan capistrano. All were easy to get to from this hotel. The hotel itself is under minor renovation. The breakfast area was a little cramped so we ate in our room which we didn't mind. Eggs,sausage, potatoes as well as bagels and waffles which were good. Coffee was great too. The rooms were clean and a nice size with the ground floor rooms having a little patio area outside facing the pool. Didn't get to use the pool but there was a grill area as well as putting green and ping pong table. Definitely

My two boys (18 and 14) and I just got home from a week's vacation in Orange County and used the Best Western in Westminster as our hub.  I'm giving this a rating of four mainly for the value not necessarily for the hotel itself.  The value is incredible!!  We were going to CA to visit the beaches and this location easily saved us upwards of $100/night.  With as high priced as everything is, and I do mean EVERYTHING, in the area, this savings went a long way with us.    The hotel itself was average.  Room cleanliness was okay, nothing great but I've seen a lot worse. Room was big and roomy enough for the three of us with a very large bathroom and shower area.  One thing that I didn't like was that on two days, we returned back to the motel about 4 pm and our room had not yet

The hotel was semi decent.  Our room was not the cleanest but was ok, the bathroom tub would not hold water, the pool was a bit dirty, and in general the outside needs a lot of updating. The plus side, there is a nice picnic area with a grill that the guest can use and there is some other activities for children such as the golf area and ping pong.

We stayed in one of the kind deluxe studios for two nights. The room was very clean, the bed was comfortable, and the A/C worked great. The breakfast was decent and will be even better once the construction for the expansion is finished. The staff was all very nice and helpful. We will definitely stay here again next time we are jn the area visiting family.

We stopped here over the memorial weekend so the hotel was very busy the hotel was perfect for us as we was finishing off our road trip The staff were helpful when we needed them to be check in was a breeze and so was check out They are extending the breakfast area which is needed I think however because it was memorial weekend the areas was so busy we just popped over the road to the donut storr (and this is not a typing error they are actually called that) Even though it was busy we still managed to get a parking space The rooms were standard nothing flashy but comfortable and clean they had microwave coffee machine and fridge The lobby had 24 hr coffee which was handy  One bonus for us was the free wifi we had stopped at four hotels and the Westminster hotel was the best

Summary Heading: Not one of the better places I have stayed
Summary: The room is the standard Best Western d√©cor and is comfortable. However, the shower curtain was installed so that 6 inches was laying on the bottom of the tub making it easy to step on and slip. Water pressure is excellent but it fluctuates from scalding hot to freezing cold (no exaggeration!).
