I had to position the shower head so that I would have room to jump out of the way when the water temp changed. Challenging to take a shower! Outside, I don't think I have seen asphalt sidewalks on the 2nd floor. It felt like you were talking on the roof. However, it was quiet because you didn't hear anyone walking up or down the walkway. Maybe when the finish the addition to the lobby there will be enough room for more people at breakfast -- I skipped it because there wasn't room to sit

Summary Heading: Ping pong table is the best!
Summary: This is the second time staying at this small hotel; and I am sure to return. The rooms are clean, the price is affordable and the staff is friendly enough. I have gotten an amazing nights sleep both times I've stayed; pillows are perfect for me! My favorite part of this hotel is the pool area! Large pool, cute ambiance and they have a ping pong table complete with paddles and balls (and a small putting green). How great is that! They are going through a bit of a remodel right now; nothing that interfered with my stay, but can't wait to see the place when they are done!

clean rooms and great service from employees,  with a fair price and hot food in morning  your stay will be great!  working on front lobby area which will improve your morning visit be done soon!  short drive to other areas and attractions!  Long Beach very close!

Trying to find a good location between Disneyland was made easy and pleasant with this Best Western. Very friendly and helpful staff, and the room was clean and very well taken care of.   The dining area was undergoing renovation which will expand the area, a much needed upgrade. But the construction didn't adversely impact our access to breakfast, just made things a little crowded. The selection of breakfast items seemed limited but wasn't bad, and certainly better than some other hotels/motels I've stayed in. My wife particularly enjoyed the small patio of our first-floor room for her morning coffee.   The staff was very pleasant and honestly caring, with Shannon even printing us out a back-way route to Disneyland that helped us avoid construction traffic.   Pictures on the

Overall this is a nice place for the money, beds are a bit hard, but clean! Showers are nice, the hot tub could be cleaner. Staff is very nice! Ok breakfast and plentiful. Would stay again. Might bring a soft mattress pad though to help with bed. Nice, darkening curtains too.

We live in the area, and stayed here for almost two weeks, while our new house was being remodeled. We were in an upstairs room, towards the back of the motel. Our room was spacious, and fairly quiet. It was also clean. The room we stayed in, had a kitchenette. The stove was pretty old, and not a lot of cookware, so I didn't cook much, while there. We only ate breakfast a couple of times in the lobby, and the breakfast was fine. It was nice that they had an employee to make waffles for you. The breakfast area is very small, but I drive by almost every day, and they are currently doing construction, so it looks as though they are expanding that area.  The free wifi, was spotty at best, so I used our hotspot most of the time. My kids swam in the pool on one of the days we were

The staff was very helpful and always willing to help.   The exterior of the hotel was very dirty not a very good first impression.  The toilet had to be flushed 4 to 6 times to get the content to go down.

The staff was very helpful. The room was clean and comfortable. Easy access to interstate. I would stay at this motel again when in the area and recommend it to my friends. It was an excellent value for the price. They were doing some construction on the front office, but kept the work to hours that wouldn't affect customers. They also kept their construction area very clean and safe for everyone.

I choose Best Western when I travel to Southern Ca. to visit my family and friends.  I lived in Orange Co. Ca. for over 40 years.  Mostly for the past 3 yrs I've gone for family illness' and my husbands final resting place.  This last trip was for a relatives funeral.  Best Western has accomodations very close to my family.  Their rates are very reasonable, They provide very good service and they are well kept and clean. I don't even bother to check out other accomodations as I know they're the best in the area.

A nicely priced and clean place to stay that is close to the major freeways in the Long Beach area.  Stayed here several times and the staff is friendly.  Can get a nice room with internet and a decent morning meal for free without paying an arm and a leg.

I tried the Best Western Westminster Inn for the Long Beach Grand Prix weekend and a quick trip to Disneyland and I was so impressed I added this hotel to my list of favorites.  The service was great and it is obvious that the owner and staff try their best to provide a great value for the money.
Manager Response: As a returning guest we appreciate your regular business. Thank you for staying with us

Summary Heading: Too bad you cant see smell and noise in pics
Summary: I was looking for a room for one night. From the pictures and reviews I was sold. Unfortunately, our experience was not as nice as the other reviews.  Pulled up at night to a very small, dark parking lot. Check in went smoothly. We got room 201. The first thing that hit us was the smell. It smells filthy. The kind that sticks to you after you leave. Got the light on and the carpet is dirty. The beds are clean though. Pillows are hard. Next up is the noise. We may as well have a bed on the street. In fact, when trucks go by, the bed shakes. I would not recommend staying here--at least not in this room. Also wifi issue. Only one device works at a time.
Manager Response: You are correct that due to construction that week it was noisy. Also we checked that your rooms  did have a window that allowed extra noise, we have fixed it. Housekeeping is checking rooms for any left over smell and will assure a clean smell

Summary: This hotel is not too far from all the action at Disneyland, and Knotts Berry Farm.  It is quiet, has a great breakfast, nice pool, and it has a putting green for the kids!  Already booked to stay again in November.
Manager Response: we are looking forward to your return in november, we heard your kids improved a lot on their putting skills

Summary: Stayed one night along our route through Southern California and was very happy with the Westminster Inn.  Rooms were large and clean. Bathrooms were generous & well stocked with towels & supplies. Free WiFi was good.  Afternoon snack was great as was the hot breakfast. Had an upstairs room with opening windows. A nice change from always having to use air conditioning. Didn't use the pool but it looked clean and well maintained. I would not hesitate to stay here again.
Manager Response: Glad you noticed that we are one of the few hotels in the area with central air, its better filtered air.

Summary: My family really enjoyed this Best Western.  We chose it because it has hot breakfast .  The room was clean especially the carpet.  We don't care if the room small but the carpet has to be clean.    The staffs were very friendly.  We normally don't request room clean everyday and we reuse the towels.  We tried to keep the env. green and save the money.  The kids like to watch the movie because the TV has the DVD player.  Overall, we will likely stay here again next time we here.

The hotel was very nice inside (although the outside was less than pleasing), the staff was wonderful. My only complaint was the water turning ice cold while showering. Even the breakfast was decent for a free breakfast...REAL potatoes!

Summary Heading: Best Best Western in the Area
Summary: I love this hotel.  The staff is super helpful and friendly.  The breakfast and evening wine and snacks are terrific.  Rooms are well maintained and comfortable.  All rooms have microwave and refrigerator.

Great staff.  Hotel needs updating: Entry lock not working, water temp not consistent and ventilation is poor.  Also I thought that the hotel could have the perimeter enclosed with key entry only as our room was near the parking toward the back.

The room was clean, and the sheets and towels bright white and fresh. We had three kids with us and there was no problem getting a cot for our baby. One of the staff provided their own highchair for our use while we were here.  Fridge and microwave in the room making a little 'self catering' possible.  Breakfast was ok, not so many 'healthy' options... but great waffles and bagels! Great with a heated pool for the kids too, a table tennis table and a few golf holes.

Nice hotel, small but well kept. Great lounging area around pool, very casual and open.  Bed OK, but squeaked upon getting into it, both of them. Staff was great and very friendly and helpful.  Yes we would stay again.

Comfortable room. Nice amenities. The Internet service was fast, even with four of us online simultaneously. The beds were comfortable. We didn't use the pool or hot tub but they were close by. I used the miniature golf putt-putt green. The breakfast was about the same as other hotels. The hotel was right off the freeway and on the main street of the city. This made it convenient for navigating around town.

Summary Heading: Great amenities and breakfast for the price
Summary: My youth basketball team enjoyed our nearly week-long stay.  We enjoyed the breakfast each morning and it was always well stocked and fresh.  The kids loved the pool and hot tub each day as well.  The staff was not overly friendly but I have no complaints.

I stayed one night on business and found everything I needed. A quiet clean room, reliable internet service, comfortable bed and a hot shower. Other hotels in the area were $200.00; I paid less than $80.00 including tax.

Summary Heading: Quality not compromised by low price
Summary: We have stayed at several hotels a crossed the US in the last 2 years. The Westminster Inn in Westminster is by far our favorite. My kids love the pool, Jacuzzi and the ping pong table and always a treat to play miniature golf with them on their mini golf course. The staff is friendly and very prompt with any repairs/complaints concerning the rooms. We had one room where the toilet wouldn't flush properly and as soon as we hung up, within a couple of minutes the Manager was knocking at our door to fix it.  We had another situation where the DVD in the TV wasn't working properly. The manager grabbed another TV and swapped it with the one we had to make sure we could watch our movies we rented. .  Good location, close to freeway and market for groceries. They have a social hour

Summary Heading: Recommended for those on a budget
Summary: Needed to find an inexpensive (it was $85, so VERY inexpensive) room for one night.  Had a car, so we were able to get there very easy (right off the main highway) in the evening, arriving from San Diego, and the next morning were able to, just as easily, get to the South Bay beaches without too much time wasted on either end.   In that respect, it was very convenient.  I spent some (welcome) time by myself in the room at night while the rest of my family went to see a movie, and it was relatively quiet and even though the exterior hallways and such seemed a little dumpy, I felt safe on my own.  This motel is nothing to look at from the outside, and the rooms are very standard, but they did have complimentary water in our room (none of the other Best Westerns we stayed at on our

Summary Heading: Stay at Best Western Westminster Inn, Westminster, CA
Summary: If you want a nice quiet place to stay that is very clean and comfortable just minutes away from Disney Parks then this will work at a great price with very nice TVs and many cable channels to choose from. I recomment you check it out!

We visited in the very beginning of march 2014. I have family in west minster and we were originally planning to stay with them. An unexpected emergency came up so we could no longer do so. We quickly sea here'd for hotels in the area. This was great. Cheap enough for 5 college students to afford. It was clean and they were very accommodating to our needs. They weekday happy hour and daily breakfast we awesome and for the most part the staff was friendly and took goods are of us. Scott in particular was awesome. The pool was clean the hot tub was warm. Our only complaint was that at 5 am a few of the nights we heard loud bangs on our door and when we went to the door to see what was going on no one was there.

Very satisfied with this location. We are staying at this place several time during vacation and business occasion. I'm recommend to anyone that looking for a place near Disney land and Beaches area..

Summary Heading: Very Clean / Not so great breakfast
Summary: The room was clean, smelled fresh. It rained so we couldn't check out the pool. They have a pretty cool little happy hour, if you don't mind box wine. We always stay at best westerns for the breakfast and this one wasn't the best. The eggs are very sour. We tried them both days and both days they tasted like they had gone bad. The potatoes were also very peppered, like they take your breath away if you inhale.

This hotel was ideal for the team trip. All the staff was so helpful. We had a great team bbq one of the night which worked out great the kid swam, played   pin pong and they even had a puting green! We couldnt of ask for a better trip

We like this motel and have stayed here before, but our last trip we experienced sagging mattress in room 105.  My wife and I prefer to sleep in the same bed, and we kept fighting rolling toward the middle.  Otherwise, fine hotel.
Manager Response: we appreciate your comment. You have stayed here more than once and we thank you. We will remedy the issue of the mattress. Our Mattresses are high standard and we want to make sure any bad one is immediately replaced. Thanks for the good words  Syed  owner

Summary Heading: Surprisingly nice room and fine value
Summary: The inn is very plain on the outside, but the room was very good, with every convenience and very clean.  The included breakfast was also good, and staff was very friendly.  A particularly good value for what you get.
Manager Response: You have reviews in over 20 cities so your kind ratings of us is appreciated by all at the hotel,

Summary: The staff went over the top. We checked in 4-8-14 about 5pm. I cant remember the gal who checked us in but she really made us feel at home. She made us feel safe , recommended restaurants, and was really friendly. At checkout we received the same great service, they provided us directions, and spent about 10 minutes with me- Wow who does that! The rooms were roomy, comfortable, clean, and affordable. We will surely stay at this motel again. I recommend  the suite- kitchen, large bed,sofa bed, fridge, everything you need. Oh I almost forgot the heated pool and spa- a must.   Thanks for the great service, we will be back soon.
Manager Response: your review led to all people working here a free lunch for satisfying you. we read your review to all.

Summary Heading: Good deal for what it is
Summary: Here's the deal, you can't compare 5 star hotels with hotels like this Best Western. So if you expect this place to be sparkling clean with brand new fixtures and furniture, you're delusional.  This is an older hotel in an older part of town. The carpet is stained and old, the breakfast is OK, and the grounds are just sort of ordinary. However, the room was clean (as clean as you can get it without like a week long cleaning), the food was well-stocked each morning, and the manager and maids were nice and helpful.  Here's an example of why this place is above average when you compare it to *similar* class hotels: The TV provider shorted out during my visit, but the manager addressed it right away. He even called me the next day because he wanted to make sure the TV worked for the
Manager Response: we were very touched by your sons comments, hope to see you and him again

Summary: Older motel but very well maintained with an extremely friendly and knowledgable staff.  It was a pleasure to stay here and with the pool, hot tub, putting green, ping pong table and barb-b-q facilities, there are plenty of things to keep the faamily occupied.  I look forward to staying here again soon.
Manager Response: thank you. we are looking forward to seeing you again

Summary Heading: Older motel style property with a caring staff
Summary: This was my third visit to this property.  I really like it, but there were some issues, although minor should be mentioned.  The dispenser for lotion by the sink was broken and I was assured it would be fixed and was offered a bottle instead.  Also, the shower head was not working properly, would not adjust and leaked a little.  That being said, I am sure that both issues were fixed.  The staff at the desk was concerned and was willing to do anything to make my stay more pleasant.  I like the location near Long Beach and a block from I-405.  The bed was excellent as was the internet.  I was too late for breakfast and was still offered a danish or bagel.  Most hotels won't do that.  The room was clean, but some of the grout in the tub was old and discolored.  The shower curtain
Manager Response: appreciate your nice comments and we thank you for pointing out the opportunity to be better

Summary: Hotel doesn't look like much from the outside but the room was great.  Complimentary water bottles upon arrival, happy hour with cookies and wine.  Bed was the best ever! Wonderful price.  Would stay there again for sure!
Manager Response: thank you for your kind words. Our staff enjoyed having you stay here

Summary Heading: Best Western Westminster Inn Great Motel
Summary: A group of race fans for the Long Beach Grand Prix have been coming to this motel for about 5 years.  It is always clean, beds good and management great.  They serve a very nice continental breakfast in the morning. Gail F.
Manager Response: Gail, we look forward to your next trip and you will find that our breakfast has improved further.

Summary: I have stayed here a lot over the last few months  the rooms are clean and beds nice! When ever iv been in need of something like towels the staff has always been happy to bring it to me and helpful win in need of directions they have had them printed out for me and ready to go every time iv  asked!  Would recommend this hotel!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review Kelley

Summary: The rooms are affordable and worth every dollar. The staff are great and the breakfast isnt a buffet but it does the job. I cant say i had any problems except the air wasnt working right but it was warm enough in the rooms without it.

Not the best-appearing hotel in the area, but after a mixup with some charges on my credit card and a new employee, the owner and manager of the establishment saw fit to give me a full refund on my two-night stay, therefore completely satisfying me after the mess up.

Summary Heading: Run down, rooms not dusted, and ants!!
Summary: There were ants in my bed, the night table next to the bed had peanut butter on it that they never cleaned.  They only surfaced clean so there is a lot of dust where ever the maid can not see or reach.  I will NEVER be returning to this location!!!!   The management/owners of this hotel bully their customers to only leave positive feedback they need to take ownership of the problems of this hotel.  I see i am not the only person that has complained about this property.

Very nice, small and not a lot of people. Pool was warm and clean. Kids enjoyed the little put put and the oranges in the lobby. Great experience. Will definitely stay again. In room WIFI wasn't that great. I ended up just using the internet on my smart phone.

The hotel is best for the value.  Clean room, friendly service, free PC and printer use in the lobby,  and nice hot breakfast (the lady  even made the waffle for me).  I would definitely use them again if I return to the area.

Summary Heading: Happy New Year at Westminster Inn
Summary: We came for the 2014 Rose Parade. We got affordable prices on a well maintained motel with a clean room, comfortable king bed and chairs, and excellent television channels included. The location provides easy access to the freeway. The entire staff was very helpful and friendly. Service was top notch . We enjoyed the pool and spa as well as the barbecue grill. Continental breakfast and happy hour make a winning combination. We highly recommend the Westminster Inn.  Ron D 1/3/2014

Stayed at his hotel several times over the years when I came to visit Oragne County and Disneyland.  The room and amenities improved over time.  Price is low compare to all the amenities provided and also over Bestwestern hotels.  The room is nice and clean.  It's great for family with low budget.  The staff are nice.  It's a small hotel, so you'll get a more friendly personal welcome treatment.

Summary Heading: One of the best hotel for your vacation
Summary: My girl friend and me really like Best Western. The room is very clean and doesn't have any smell. Bed is comfortable. We spent 6 days and 5 night and we didn't encounter any trouble in Best Western. Highly recommend for a small family or couple to book room there. The price is cheap.

Summary Heading: About a mile off the 405 freeway
Summary: In town for a wedding in HB the cold weekend of the 7th and chose this location due to the perfect location to the major highway for easy access to everything.  Quick check-in/check-out; friendly staff; clean property; nicely decorated for Christmas. Large room with king bed, 2 comfy chairs w/end table, dining table w/2 chairs, flat screen TV; dresser, 2 night stands, coffee maker, fridge, microwave & 2 complimentary bottles of water. Did complimentary breakfast both mornings: good selection/quality and pretty tasty; yogurt, cereal, eggs, potatoes, sausage patties, waffle maker, bagels/toast, milk/juices/coffee, fresh fruit - lobby is very small but was able to get a table each time. Liquor store directly across the street which was great for grabbing snacks/alcohol. It was

I really liked the room. It was clean, everything in good working order.  Staff was pleasant.  It was nice to have hot breakfast choices.  Really like the area around the pool.  Hotel is located in what seemed to be an older area with no restaurants around so had to drive a bit to find places to eat.  I would say that was the biggest downside to staying here.

I chose this hotel for my most recent trip to Disneyland because my usual BWs were fully booked and this location offered a great rate and was still close enough to the parks.  Was easy to find and conveniently off of the highway and the holiday decorations added a great homey feel.   Check-in was easy and fast.  Staff was very nice.  Room was on second floor and the outdoor stairs were a little hard to maneuver with a large suitcase, laptop bag, and purse--next time I'll make two trips or ask for a first-floor room. Room with king-size bed was HUGE with a wall full of half-windows that overlooked the pool area. There was even a kitchenette complete with fridge, sink, microwave, dishes, coffee maker, and counter/bar space with stools--I was not expecting this at all and was

While working in Huntington Beach and seeking a permanent residence, I found this place simply driving by.  The sound of Christmas music playing outside and decorations all around I decided to stop and inquire on a room for a few nights.  The staff was warm and very helpful. Super nice!!!  They make you feel like home. ¬†I thank you for making my stay pleasant with a clean and comfortable room.  I will definitely stay here again.

The staff are always friendly, the Hotel clean and the service the best.  It's where I always stay when I come to this area. The suites are very comfortable with full cable TV The breakfast is always wonderful and freash  Highly recommended

Nice BW.  Very reasonable for so close to the beach.  Amazing Sat. TV. Small breakfast space but hot food served.  Staff was very nice and helpful.  Casual.  Drive to beach was 5 minutes or less, for way less money.

Me and my family of 4 had a very nice stay. It was very clean and the beds were very comfortable. The breakfast was great. They had a nice variety and you can even make your own waffle. I wish they would have had some fresh fruit. They had some activities, like ping pong and mini gulf, which the kids enjoyed. Unforunately, the hot tub was not hot. Otherwise, I had a good experience. And, it was a safe area.

Summary Heading: The best value and experience in this price range I've known!
Summary: All I can say is that I've traveled a great deal, and you can check out website pictures and not know until you walk into the room and the property what you will experience. To say I have been amazingly satisfied with the quality of the care that is taken with the property consistently, that a non-smoking room really means non-smoking, and the linens and other amenites are at level close to that of very expensive hotels, is an understatement.  The normal hotel noises and things exist like anywhere, but the staff here from all the front desk personal, to housekeeping to maintainence takes pride in their work and pleasing the public is not an easy task, but they do it well.  I am getting a great deal of work done, can walk easily to various food establishments and very easy for

Scott at the front desk met all my requests in an efficient and professional manner. The rooms are nice and clean, the price is great . You won't be disappointed. I will definately stay here again. I would recommend this hotel.

I have stayed at this hotel about 4 times in the last year. I have always enjoyed my stay.:) Rooms are nice, clean, and roomy. Staff is friendly and professional. I highly recommend getting a room with a kitchette, very nice and i felt just like at home. Hotel is  centrally located right off the 405 freeway.Its next to great food and convenience stores.Plenty of easy parking and very quiet. When im in Orange County for corporate training i try to stay here, i highly recommend.

We were welcome with a smile and a gift  they even printed us maps of the places we wanted to go. got to our room was really surprised plush pillow big flat screen tv  remote has a cover on it stating it was a clean remote. Body gel shampoo and hand lotion in bid dispenser so the was plenty  Bed comfy screen door so you can get fresh air ping pong table out back a green for putting pool and hot tub..was a great place and close to things you might need food gas store..full breakfast just over all a great place..

Hotesl staff was very helpful.  When the room that I had requested had been given away, they were able to upgrade me.  Breakfast was wonderful.  Patio feature on the downstairs units were very enjoyable, looking out on the pool and BBQ.

My wife and I stayed here for three days in October 2013.  The room was clean and well equipped.  The back of the room opened up to a small patio near the well-maintained pool.  The breakfast area was somewhat small, but the food available was very good, i.e., scrambled eggs and sausage, cereal, yogourt, waffles, pastries, etc.  The woman who cared for the breakfast room did an excellent job of keeping the food well stocked and the area clean.  We got a good special rate for a three-night stay..  Oh, by the way, they have an early eaving happy-hour with free wine and snacks.  We will definately stay here again if we can get a good rate.

We appreciated the staff's willingness to accommodate our special needs when we arrived late and needed a ground floor room for my son's dialysis equipment.  The rooms were comfortable and quiet.  The breakfast was nice, too.

Stayed here with our little one and it was terrific.  Room was spacious, TV had built-in DVD player, pool was large, nice and quiet at night.  The continental breakfast had a lot of choices, though not a lot of room to sit, so you might consider bringing it back to your room.  The service was fantastic as well.  My wife came down with food poisoning (from someplace else!) and they were very accommodating.  We were very pleased with our stay, and will be sure to stay here again next year where we're in the area.

A special request was made when I made the reservation online and when the guest arrived, the request was filled. The items requested were very nice. Nice to see when something is asked for it's provided.

this is my 1st viSit in Huntington Beach and MyMister decided to stay in BestWestern Inn  coz its very close, totally clean, price is right, food is really good. Me & MyMister Love to stay HeRe > siMpLy peRfeCt and if  we cOme back again we will surely stay heRe.

The place is nice and Shannon and Scott is very nice and is always willing to help you. The "HAPPY HOUR", was really cool because Shannon really went out of  her way to make everything nice and  fun.  Thanks !!!  Her personality is very friendly and kind`` I locked myself  out my room‚Äù and needed another key and she assisted me.    The price is fair for the area. I think that when  you stay over 3 nights, they should give you a ‚ÄúBETTER RATE‚Äù per night.   The kids (all ages) should  NOT  be able to be in the spa, because they were really out of control. (it should be  for ADULTS ONLY ) If adults have children I think that they still should not be allowed  The pool was nice and clean. Need to control the spa better``:( PS. I miss Scott rings``:)

The pool is heated and clean. The spa water is very clear. I liked the mini golf to pass away the time. They made some nice upgrades to the property though the furniture was alittle worn. The staff is super nice and gave us a welcome bag of snacks and a beverage.

We have stayed at Best Western in Westminster several times and are very pleased with the service and accomodations.  Of the several motels we have checked out, this is by far our favorite.  The staff is friendly and helpful, the breakfasts are wonderful, the beds are comfortable and there are even evening snacks!

room is very very big, romm has kitchen with everything for 4 people, near to Seal Beach (10 mins), patio facing to the swimming pool, table tennis in patio, bed is really good, bathroom is nice, all I can say is, "all here is nice"

Me and my boyfriend recently have been coming every other week to stay and it has been nothing but a great experience. Always super clean rooms and great service from the employers. Shannon at the front desk is always a pleasure dealing with, she is the sweetest and makes our experience that much better, because of her we will be returnin more frequent. Its a nice little getaway, also the breakfast for this hotel is always on point and super yummy. The beds are super comfy and the funiture is kept very nice and not ran down. Definitely the best hotel in the area. Highly recommended(:

Rooms was great and the House keeping was wonderful.  ill be coming back in the future.  the area was not bad. the Tv was great for my baby girl to watch and the pool was clean and not far from any rooms really.

The room was very clean and larger than expected, the bed was excellent, the fridge bigger than in other places, the freezer actually works !! Large bathroom with a lot of towels. Good breakfast and snacks by 5:00 PM. Many thanks to Scott (front desk) for his service.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time out to give us your feedback. I was glad to hear it turn out better then you planned. We‚Äôre always trying to find ways to improve. So feedback like yours lets us know what we‚Äôre doing right. If you need anything we are always here to help. Thank you again Jessica

Summary: I travel 60% of the time for my Company....Beleive me when I say I have stayed in BAD places, and GOOD places in LA and all accross USA for that matter.. THIS PLACE IS EEEEEXCELENT!!! . I'll break it down real fast. Pillow top beds with 4 huge down pillows, micro & big mini fridge, modern decor & furniture, microfiber pillow couches, berber fiber carpets, granite counters, outlets galore, 42" LCD, wall programmable a/c & heat, smells new and CLEAN CLEAN, ping pong table, putting green, heated pool, private patio lounges, outdoor gas grill, hot potatoes eggs sausage & waffles, Farmers bros coffee, evening happy hour snacks with wine, ocean breeze, quiet neighborhood. All FREE,Motel 6 $55, for a $20 more a night....WOW!!! WORTH $100 EAAASSYYYY!!!
Manager Response: First I want to say thank you for giving us your feedback. Also for all the nice things you said. We are glad you enjoyed your stay and found everything to your satisfaction. I hope you had a chance to enjoy the new putting green. Thanks again.  Jessica

Summary: I stayed here for five nights. The first night was terrible due to air conditioning running in the next room. It was terrible! The next day I asked to be transferred to another room. It was better and quiet. The rooms that I stayed in were clean and comfortable. The front desk personnel were not too friendly but were willing to help. The hotel is close to Huntington Beach, which is about 10-15 minutes away.   The rate was reasonable, ~84/night. Which is pretty good for the area.

It was clean, comfortable and pleasant.  Easy to find and close to my activity.  The breakfast and afternoon wine social were most welcome.  Plenty of nearby spots for eating and close to freeway access.  We also chose to use the AARP/ Senior Discount which was a nice savings.

Summary Heading: On cloud 9 with a restful, peaceful, and comfortable nights of stay!
Summary: I have never been so thrilled, happy, and on Cloud 9 to find such great, peaceful, comfortable, clean lodging as the Best Western Inn in Westminster, CA. The staff at the front desk greets you with a smile and with hospitality. I love the clean room, the nice firm bed, and the down pillows! Talk about a restful night!  Manager Jessica Johns is an asset to Best Western. Her pride and dedication will have customer like myself keep coming back. i will highly recommend this place to anyone.  Keep up the excellent, friendly, atmosphere!   Jo

Planned on staying here second part of our week-long trip...went back to where we stayed originally.  Smelly room with stained,dirty carpets close to main road. Couldn't sleep all night...noise from road, building would shake every time car passed by (only at night), air conditioner so loud every time it would turn on (this is what initially woke me up at 1am) and smelly room. Stayed one sleepless night out of 4 planned, checked out early in the morning. Didn't bother to stay for free breakfast.  When we checked in, gentleman at front desk helped a couple in front of us who didn't have a reservation and was staying only one night. Gave them AAA rate for making them wait (don't know for how long...only person at front desk and left the desk), offered 3 options of room suggesting

The facility is nice, the staff was very friendly.  The room was clean and the bed comfortable.  We stayed for two nights in June.  When I reserved the room, I did so because they faced the pool and I could watch grandchildren swim.  Also, I have a handicapped husband and told them it was really important to be close to foyer and pool.  They could not have put us further away.  That was my only complaint. They offered to move us next morning, but with one night left and moving it all myself, it was not worth it.  I probably would have gone somewhere else had I known I would not get a pool view room.

Good location( my wife is vietnamese, Little Saigon is very close), beaches are within short driving distance, Disney land is close,  great staff, room were very clean and comfortable. Scott and Laurie really helped make our stay there very nice. All the staff were very friendly.  We will return.  Kevin and Van from Canada
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review. I was glad you enjoyed your stay. Plus to hear the staff was helpful while you were here. We look forward to having you stay in the future and if you should need anything please give us a call Were always here to help. General Manager  Jessica Johns

Summary: For the price I'm not sure you can expect much more than they offer. I was dissatisfied with the stained ,dirty carpet and the loose toilet.  As dirty as the carpet was it makes you wonder what else is going on???? The breakfast area is cramped as it is part of the lobby and the coffee was not good- not sure why it is hard to have good coffee but that was the case.  The waffle I had was good and the rest of the days we went out for coffee and did not eat in the lobby. the location is convenient and good the parking was good. For a reasonable price the hotel is worth considering. I'm not sure I would stay again
Manager Response: I want to thank you for your review it lets us know were improvements can be made.  So your feedback is important. I was sorry to hear that you were dissatisfied and I talk with the staff and let them know what you experienced and we our having the carpets cleaned. Just to let you know our bottom floor rooms have all had their carpet replaced it is in our plan to work on the top floor as well. I would also like to let you know that we will be expanding our breakfast area as we agree it is too small. So I hope you can give us another change when you‚Äôre in the area I believe you‚Äôll find that this is wonderful hotel. Our Goal is to provide every guest with a superior experience. Please fill free to give us a call we are here  to help.  Jessica Johns

Summary: We always stay at a Best Western unless there isn't one in the area. This is by far the best so far. It has everything you could want. The Suites are spacious the bed heavenly. The new HD TV's are great. The people do whatever it is to make your stay a memorable one. Close to the Beach, Shopping and fine dining. We can't wait to go back.
Manager Response: Thank you for writing a review as always we enjoy having you. I look forward to your return; room 120 isn‚Äôt the same without you two. So hurry back soon! Remember were always here for you if you should need anything just give us a call. Jessica Johns

Summary Heading: Great location, friendly service, good value
Summary: Stayed here recently with a girlfriend from Sydney and this BW is amazing for three reasons: Great location, friendly service and good value.  What more could you ask for if there's a shoppig complex down the road with movie theaters, in N out across the street, the beach and Disneyland both easily accessible. There's also bowling nearby if you're bored during your vacation!  Scott the front desk manager and Jessica the general manager were very accommodating to our request and helped us out a lot.  They also have happy hour every day from 5-7 where there's drinks and snacks available.  Overall a great bargain!
Manager Response: Thank you for the feedback I am glad you enjoyed your stay. I was happy to hear you had time to enjoy the 5 o‚Äôclock snack time. It is a new thing we have added and knowing our guest have enjoyed it lets me know it is a good addition. Sounds like you found everything in the area quite well  if you need any help with making a reservation please gives us a call were always here to help.  Jessica Johns

Summary: We had the best time! the room was nice and comfortable i really loved the pillows and the breakfast and snack time were great! the office staff were very professional and polite Scott and the 2 ladies at the desk were very nice and so were all the housekeeping staff they were great i cant wait to return again soon  : )

We received a good rate through AAA for our room, but we were pleasantly surprised when we got into our room. We had been upgraded and didn't even ask. When we got to the room we had to call the front desk to see if they made a mistake. She replied "no you were upgraded, enjoy your stay".

Very good continental breakfast, great location, and the staff were very nice. The room was clean, but old furniture and the room had an old smell. The price was too high and they changed price from Friday thru Sunday.  :(  You would end up with 3 different rates per day) I feel if you stay two (2) days or more they should give you a better rate on the room.  It is not fair when there are events in town and the hotels are allowed to ‚Äúdouble" their prices!!! :(

The Hotel is OK and the staff are good. The only problem is the floor carpet should be replaced already because it stinks and looks like over-used. Amenities are good and the breakfast is OK too as it is refilled by the attendant.

Summary Heading: Review for Best Western Westminster Inn
Summary: We enjoy the stay.  The breakfast is great with hot items like eggs and potato, along with other items, like muffins, toast, bagel, cereal, milks, and juices.  We are going to Disneyland for the kids, and they have enough for breakfast.  It is still cheaper compared to the hotels nearby Disneyland even it takes about 20 minutes drive.  Since we need to park the car in the parking garage anyway, I think it is worth it.

Great hotel near the beach.  perfect for me and my family vacation.  Only down side was that we were near the housekeeping laundry room, we could hear the staff talking in the am. Also the breakfast area was small, but we would just take the breakfast back to our room.

We booked this room for a couple of nights and it's a good value. Our room was clean, quiet and comfortable.  Internet, parking and continental breakfast included. The breakfast consisted of waffles, scrambled eggs, sausage patties, breakfast potatoes, assorted yogurts, aj and oj, milk, coffee, tea, toast. The hot items weren't the greatest but it was included. Coffee was good and available all day. They had a computer in the lobby area that you could use for free.  The location was okay, it's about a 15 minute drive to downtown Huntington beach which was nice for us.  The staff were very friendly. We did not use the pool but it looked nice.   I would stay again.

Hotel is very nice and has improved much over the 3 years that we have been stopping there. We enjoyed the hot breakfasts and the large room that we had. The staff at the hotel is friendly and helpful and have gone out of there way to provide us with a good experience when we stay at this hotel. The location is great for us as it is near family. Breakfast room is somewhat small wich makes it difficult to eat some times but the quality of the food is good and the type of food they have available is quite good.

The person at the front desk (Scott, I believe) was outstanding.  He allowed me to cut my stay by one day and, more importantly, went out of his way to make sure I had a room on the first floor to accommodate my disabled mother.   The room was clean and everything worked.  Overall, a great stay.

Excellent service. Orderly, clean room, pool area and surrounding facilities. Breakfast fresh, pool area very clean and orderly, putting green very nice, ping pong fun. patio on ground floor room nice to sit and visit with family members. Loved the grassy area where our grandchildren could play. The pool was safely fenced, which cut down on the worry of the little ones getting into that area.

My family and I choose to stay at the BW in Westminister, its in the middle of everything. Beach was 10minutes away, Long Beach was 15 minutes away basically it was a perfect location. The hotel itself was very clean, comfortable beds and, we even had a mini patio set right outside our room. Where there was a mini golfing green and a pool.   My kid loved it, and noise when other people where playing was never loud. We plan to stay here again on our next vacation due to the location and how pleased my family was during our stay. We've already recommended this hotel too family who will be visiting in the next few weeks!

Summary Heading: Home away from home - Miguel B
Summary: This  is our 2nd time at this best western, I enjoy there amenities that they have here to offer. The staff here are very helpful. The room that we got was very clean. I enjoy coming here for. You get more than what you paid for. They have little mini golf course, that I used while the family was taking a nap from our mid day return from Disneyland. I will come back here again.

Close to Disneyland and beaches but quiet and comfortable and affordable.  We like to stay there because the rooms are patio rooms with sliding doors out to the yard and pool area.  Putting green, table tennis, BBQ and other amenities.
Manager Response: We appreciate that you took the time to give us your feedback. It‚Äôs always a pleasure to see you and if you should ever need anything please let us know. We look forward to seeing you again in the future.

Summary Heading: Good Location & A Few Nice Things Too!
Summary: Asked for a quiet room in advance, as I was arriving late. That definitely did not work out! Not only did I get their most noisy, vibrating room, but their "SMELLIEST~STINKIEST TOO!" We could not even stay in it for at least 3-hours to air it out. It was like they dumped a gallon of carpet deodorizer & my chemical induced asthma went insane. I asked for another room, but they said they were full. The area was packed with summer crowds, and the Surfing Championships too. The Good~I always like to be fair. Triple sheeted bed with down type comforter~nice. Mattress was my favorite, next to the Sleep Number beds in Sheridan Hotels. My bad shoulders loved it. Nice shower, plenty of room space in this King Bed Non-Smoking Room. Nice size refrigerator, plenty of parking. (*No dedicated
Manager Response: First let me thank you for leaving us feedback. It is crucial in letting us know what we're doing right,and to help us correct any areas where we've come up short.  I apologize for any dissatisfaction you had during your stay with us. In regards to your room, we're on a first come first served basis. This also applies to reservations as well. At that time we were using a new cleaner/deodorizer, and regretfully the housekeeper that serviced your room wasn't clear on the need to let the room air for a time before shutting the door and window.  We have since made sure to re instruct all staff. For parking, we do have dedicated    handicapped spots as required by law. Our pool is kept at 75¬∫ to 80¬∫ year round. The spa is 100¬∫ to 103¬∫. Reference the noisy patrons, we encourage all guests to inform the staff at any hour, so we can maintain a peaceful environment for all to enjoy. The same goes for any issue,including a malfunctioning TV remote. I'm also sorry for your displeasure with our complimentary wine... we serve it daily and have had no complaints thus far. In closing, we'd welcome your return visit to show you we do strive to please each customer with the best possible experience. Thank you for your review. Jessica Johns General Manager Best western Westminster Inn

Summary: This hotel is a great location and a great atmosphere. The staff is very friendly, the rooms clean. It is like getting the service of a 4-star hotel in a smaller and very comfortable place. The last trip where I stayed here they had even upgraded their breakfast from continental to include eggs, sausage, and potatoes. They also provide a two hour happy hour! They are continually upgrading their services. They also have barbecues out by the pool - which is a great option for travelers who get tired of eating in restaurants.

This hotel was clean and the room was very nice. Big spacious bathroom and sleeping area. The bed was satisfactory and had 4 very comfortable pillows per bed. The breakfast was typical for hotels that offer free breakfast, but had additional hot items available. Overall this was a nice hotel and was not expensive.

I chose this hotel because of the reviews on here. The full breakfast saved us a lot of money and it was always hot and well stocked.  Our beds were comfortable and the room clean.  I got a downstairs room towards the back so it was quiet and we had chairs outside our sliding glass door to sit and enjoy the cool breezes.  Plus they were handy for drying out our beach attire. The pool and Jacuzzi were clean and there was even a ping pong table that my teenagers and I took advantage of.  All the staff I dealt with during our week stay were helpful and polite. The location was great - only a 15-20 min. drive to Knott's, Medieval Times, the beach, and the Aquarium. There wasn't a fitness center but with all the walking we did during our activities, all we wanted to do was rest when

Great value and they have a secluded pool, hot tub and a little patio with chairs on all the ground floor units. A free mini breakfast of waffles, scrambled eggs, sausage, cereals, bagels and good coffee and juices are included.
Manager Response: I want to thank you for taking the time to give your feedback. I  was  pleased to hear you had a chance to enjoy the new putting green we put in .We are always here to help just let us know.

Summary: Scott is friendly, courteous and professional.  We highly recommend everyone to stay at this location.  You won't be disappointed.  The minute we arrived, he had everything ready for us and since the parking lot was full, he was nice enough to move his motorcycle so we could park there.  What a guy!!!

Best Western had the cleaniest rooms around and no outside noise. I should know we couldn't get in this hotel until the next night after we got in town. Than they only had a room open for the next two days so we had to stay somewhere else. But we were able to get back in later that week. Well worth the moving around.   The beds were also the most comfortable out of all of the places.  This hotel is not in a high traffic area, so it is easy to get to the beaches, food, and other entertainment.  The staff was great.  The price was great.  Overall our stay was wonderful.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. I am glad you enjoyed your stay. I was sorry to hear that you had to do so much moving around. Summer time can be very busy. Just let us know if  you need any future hotel plans  we are here to help.

Summary: This hotel is clean and the staff is friendly. The room was great and the bed was very comfortable. We did not get to have the breakfast but did see everyone else enjoying it and it looked wonderful. We were there for a family get together  and we were close to our destination . I would recommend this hotel to anyone !!

Recently stayed here for a family wedding party.  Rooms were well kept, noise was at a minimum throughout the stay and the staff went above and beyond the call of duty to make sure that all of the guests were happy.  This included ensuring that the waffles were properly distributed in the morning to having umbrellas moved to the pool area to ensure guests were in the shade even when it wasn't requested.  They cleaned the rooms on a regular basis with swift and accurate service.  Highly recommend this location to anyone who is in the area.  If I was to visit the area again, this hotel would be my first choice of places to go.
Manager Response: I want to say thank you for your feedback. I am so glad that everyone was helpful while you stayed with us. It was nice to see everyone in you party was having a good time. The staff loves to help provide each and ever guest with a  great experience. We look forward to serving you again in the future.

Summary Heading: Improvements Every time we come back
Summary: My husband and I have stayed off and on for the last two years and each time we come back they have done something to the property or room. This time it was new carpets and paint. They are currently re surfacing the pool. Jessica and Laurie and their whole staff are great. They really go out of their way to make you comfortable. We have a lovely suite with a sliding door out to a beautiful pool area complete with Jacuzzi, Ping Pong Table and Propane BBQ. They do take Pets but only in some rooms and their is No Smoking or at least on our side of the building which we prefer. Come to Westminster and enjoy coast at the same time. Seal Beach, Long Beach and Belmont shores a short drive away.

The room was nice and clean, breakfast was good and the staff even made the waffles for us. The service of the staff and management was beyond our expectations, but more amazing service came after we left the hotel. We left a new Google tablet in the room and only noticed it when we arrived at the airport. We called the hotel and the management was so helpful, they checked the room, found the tablet and shipped it overnight. It arrived the next morning, we appreciated their help so much, and they would not let us pay for the shipping.

Summary Heading: The best place to stay while visiting Long Beach State
Summary: We always stay here. It is the best value in the area and very convienent. We have stayed there many times over the years and have always been happy with the accomodations. If you have several families staying at the motel you can get ground floor rooms that have a door out to the picnic and pooll area making it great for families with kids.

Summary Heading: Excellent service, nothing but awesome things to say about every part of our stay!
Summary: I just wanted to give a big THANK YOU to Jessica who went above and beyond to make sure our stay at the Best Western Westminster was the best stay ever! She was so polite and helpful with everything and we really enjoyed our stay there! Next time we come to town we are definitely staying there again!  ; )

We stayed here during the 4th of July Holiday in 2012.  We wanted a place in the area of Huntington Beach for it's festivities.  This is place is an easy drive to the beach.  We've stayed at the HoJo and Comfort Inn on Beach Ave in HB and this place is much quieter without the weekend parties those others have.  We love the size of the pool and we used the BBQ grill and picnic table by the pool.  Breakfast was ok, your typical breakfast at a BW.  It's not a Embassy Suite with their breakfast so don't get mad. Room was comfy and we were able to fit two bicycles as we didn't want to leave it on my car's bike rack. Only problem I had was our next door neighbors stayed up outside and we can hear their conversations. We were on the first floor by the pool and the room has a big

Always a pleasure to come and stay here, everyone is friendly. The rooms were cleaned and requests were promptly answered! The breakfast was super like always they have more than other places nearby. I want to point out that I've stayed both upstairs and ground floor and they are both clean the only perk is ground floor rooms have patios.

I stayed here in 2012 for the Long Beach Grand Prix - in 2013 I added a business trip segment and stayed a full week - The staff is excellent - the grounds are nice and the pool area is comfortable.   I slept well in a comfy bed and had no problems.  I like the fact that they have direct Internet and a wireless option - This is reasonably close to the shopping and food - and has a Starbucks a block away -
Manager Response: Thank you for the nice comments, we are looking forward to your return. By next week we are enhancing our breakfast to include many other hot items and it is all complimentary to our guests. sincerely syed :) owner

Summary: I've stayed in many different hotel, and this one would have to rank towards the top of the list.I was very impressed by how clean and well kept the rooms looked.One of the reason I chose the stay here, was because of my Best Western rewards I get as a member.Not only did I get a great discount, I got some peace of mind knowing I save a few bucks. ; )
Manager Response: Thank you for the good review, we look forward in your return. sincerely syed owner

Summary: this is a great family hotel the staff is very nice great personallities, the up keep is very very clean, and the best of all is the breakfast, with all sorts of selections and I don't want to forget about the wonderful heated pool.

We have originally planned a stay at a bit cheaper Best Western close by, but since that hotel got closed, our tour company has negotiated the room at this hotel for the same price for us.  The room was superb. We ate breakfast every morning, it was quite simple, but their vafers are lovely :) Used their computer and printer to print several tickets to the events. They had plenty of parking, and the area seemed to be safe. 5 minutes ride to KFC, Taco Bell and other dinings, shopping mall is also 5 minutes away. Would definitely stay again !
Manager Response: Thank you for your nice comments, hope to see you again soon sincerely Best western Westminster inn staff

Summary: I don't understand how this hotel got such high reviews... This is an okay motel (exterior) corridors, and the manager/owner is very passionate about his guests, but too bad the motel was not as impressive...  Negative: The Wifi connection was next to useless.I spoke with the front desk on several occassions about the problem and she told me she was aware and looking into it. It got better but still not reliable or really usable. I was relying on it to call and check on my family back home so was quite disappointed by the poor internet service. The breakfast area is TOO small. The breakfast area is just the lobby -- Just three little tables inside each can take 3 people so it was very crowded and busy around 830am. Not too impressed about this and the microwave was right by the
Manager Response: Thank you for you opinion, we value it and look into all aspects. Most of our beds are relatively new and most people love them, very few do not like them. I hope you will give us another chance sincerely Best western Westminster inn

Summary: Reserved room online more than two weeks in advance, requesting a second floor room by the elevator. I'm unable to climb stairs. When I arrived at the property, I was told that they don't have elevators. NO attempt was made to respond to my email, to let me know they didn't have elevators. Probably because it would have resulted in a cancellation? We were given a first floor room, where the upstairs occupants jumped around all night, and a car revved its engine in the parking lot for an hour at 1:00 a.m.  We checked out the next morning after finding that their idea of breakfast was vending machine pastries and bad coffee. Found a brand new hotel in Costa Mesa for MUCH less.  No more Best Western franchises for us.
Manager Response: Glad that front desk found you a room on the first floor. We do not allow loud parties so sorry if someone upstairs was noisy. Someone is at the front desk 24 Hours so just call and they could have stopped the noise.  Note that at breakfast we have waffles, eggs, sandwiches or egg burritos, yogurt, cereal, oatmeal, juices. Mostly self serve.    sincerely Staff best western Westminster inn

Summary: It is an old hotel, but the stay was pleasant.Breakfast was good. If you plan to use the sofa bed, it is barely 2 inches think. and you will wake up sore. location is good. It is a little bit far away from the Disneyland, where we went, but you can manage the commute. Staff was helpful and friendly.  The room was clean and kitchen is well equipped.
Manager Response: Thank you for your satisfaction comment. We noticed that the pullout sofa in your room could have been better so we have replaced it.

Summary: We stayed for one night on the weekend.  The room was clean and comfortable.  Our request for a downstairs room was promptly taken care of, since the don't have an elevator and we didn't want to lug our suitcases up the stairs.  The staff also quickly brought us extra pillows at our request.  We will certainly stay there again.  The only negative is the very limited breakfast choices, but if you like packaged pastries it's ok.

I stayed here with a few friends when we decided to take a weekend trip and it was awesome! The weather was great at the time which allowed for us to take advantage of their pool! The room itself was great! Very clean, stocked with shampoo and conditioner and wifi available!  This has got to be one of the nicest Best Western's I've stayed in simply because the rooms were cleaner, brighter and also the pool! If you're ever in the area and need a place to crash, I would recommend this place!

Congratulations to Jessica and all the team at the Westminster Inn , for giving us such an excellent experience during our recent stay ! We stayed  for 18 nights in January/feb, so we had plenty of time to really check out this place. All l can say is 10 out of 10 !   The rooms are nicely decorated and spotlessly clean. The beds/pillows are really comfortable and towells are  a nice quality. Parking was never a problem even at weekends when the hotel was full. Breakfast was very good and they served a large selection of items ranging from hot cereal (oatmeal) cold cereals, hard boiled eggs, pastries, yoghurts, selection of  bagels & cream cheese, two types of bread, butter and jams and not to mention a waffle machine where you can make your own waffles every morning if you so

I recently stayed here with a friend and we found it to be perfect. Great price and location. Really nice staff! Shannon provided excellent customer service! Definitely will come back the next time I'm in town

I recently stayed with my here with my boyfriend for a weekend and it was amazing, the location was perfect for hitting any night or social scene and the hotel was cute and quaint and the staff was soo super friendly and super accommodating to anything we needed.  The rooms are so affordable here and that coupled with the amazing and friendly staff of the hotel make me enthusiastic to come back and stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us, we are glad you enjoyed it.

Summary Heading: Dirty, and bad part of town
Summary: We only stayed at this place for 2 nights and this place seems very run down with  a cheap attempt to make it better.  Our room stunk terrible.  This place only surface clean, they have not deep cleaned our room in while.  Yes this place is very affordable, however cheaper is not good in this case.  Best Western corporate should be embarrased to have a hotel like this in their family.  This is also in a very bad part of town.
Manager Response: This is considered the best area of town so surprised with your comment.  I hope you did stay here. we would have loved to talk with you. I talked with all my staff if they received any comments like yours direct from any guests.  None recall. I do hope you will come again and talk directly with any of my staff for any issues. We love to resolve any concerns, sincerely Staff best western westminster inn

Summary: The room was pleasant, the staff accommodating, and the location perfect for my purpose. Only problem was that the breakfast area was much to small for the number of guests using the area.  I was forced  to take my breakfast to my room to eat it.  On the plus side the breakfast was pretty good......and free.

One of the best hotels my family and I have stayed in! Starting from the lobby the place is impeccable clean. Employees provide great service. one of our favorite places was the pool area very clean and nicely furnished, very safe for my kids. Also, internet connection was very fast. The landscaping is very well maintained. It would definitely be my first choice for when I visit Westminster! Thank you for the great service!

An excellent hotel when with your partener its near entertainment and near the freeway when your trying to explore within the cities, they have a pool and jacuzzi . & the staff was friendly not to mention the amazing service. The pricing was satisfying .

Summary Heading: Great studios with very comfortable beds.
Summary: We love the Westminster Inn. They have a lovely courtyard with a ping-pong table, gas grill, sparkling swimming pool, and large spa. The ping-pong table adds a nice touch and always gives us recreational fun. We have stayed at this location over 10 times and are always pleased with our stay. The beds and television are great. The breakfast is sufficient with breakfast sandwiches, fresh make it yourself waffles or the host will make them for you. There is also boiled eggs, assorted pastries and fresh fruit with fresh juices. The price we pay to stay here is an excellent value. There are plenty of good restaurants nearby within walking distance. The beach is fairly close too. You wont be disappointed with your stay at the Westminster Inn.

Great location, easy access to freeway, good food close, great staff UNTIL, we left Sat at 2:30, returned to find door ajar from housekeeping, no contact from management at ALL! Sun Morn no wake up call
Manager Response: Thank you for some of the good words, we have updated your concern of no wakeup to all employees. Door left open by housekeeping is something they have been trained not to do, we have reinforced this in the staff meeting. Hope to see you again soon, sincerely syed

Summary Heading: Excellent service and very nice rooms
Summary: I choose this hotel because it is conveniently located to freeways,restaurants,shopping,gas stations and the beach. The staff provided excellent service. The room was very clean and nicely furnished. The pool area was well mantained and very clean The price is very reasonable. The internet  connection was very fast. Excellent channel line up.Landscaping is  beautiful and well maintained. Thanks for a wonderful experience
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, we love having people feel comfortable here.

Summary Heading: The hotel is very neat and clean and the customer service was excellent.
Summary: The hotel provided excellent service. I felt very comfortable and well attended. I have stayed in several other hotels before but the Best Western Inn provided me with what I needed and was above all my expectations.

The area is very peaceful and the staff is always very helpful. They serve all the clients needs and made my say there peaceful. The pool area is sanitary and the rooms are always kept clean. Its cost is a very reasonable price and there are many stores around that are a walking distance. The beach is also just a few minutes away.Highly recommended

I chose the property because of its location and amenities - free parking and internet, in particular - and can't say enough about the terrific service we received.  The room was also really impressive - attractive furnishings and extremely clean.  The microwave and mini-fridge are a great convenience.  Fantastic channel line-up and the internet connection was immediate.  Above all though, we will always remember the kindness shown to us by the thoughtful lady who came to our rescue when we didn't understand the climate control system.  She not only stopped by to help us turn on the heat (the weather was unseasonably cold) but followed-up and even brought extra blankets just in case.  Our sincerest thanks to her for going above and beyond.  If I'm in the area again, I look

Check-in went easily; we were early so the room was not ready but we had driven 7 hours and didn't want to be in the heavy freeway traffic.  We were not offered a newspaper nor told the breakfast hours at check-in.  The room was clean (except in corners of the bathroom) and was always "made" when we returned each evening.  Because it is convenient to our daughter's home, we would probably stay there again.

Summary Heading: Excellent motel, great value, exceptional service
Summary: BW Westminster is excellent motel for the price with exceptional service and surprising amenities which included pool, spa, large BBQ for guest use, ping-pong table set up on the lawn, patio outside slider with chairs, well maintained grass and garden areas.  The young woman at the front desk was the most helpful person I have ever encountered.  I needed to print out my train ticket however the guest computer was giving me trouble so the young woman at the desk put her keyboard and mouse on the counter, held up the monitor while I went on my e-mail and printed out my ticket - who does this in today's couldn't care less environment.  Room was quiet, very clean, updated, very comfortable bed that didn't irritate my back problems, breakfast included unadvertised fresh waffles

Summary Heading: Very very average, if known would stay other place
Summary: Extremely outdated hotel in need of massive overhaul as soon as poss. Some things & parts of interior look like they are 50 years old or falling apart. Very noisy, rooms on ground floor have paper thin walls and you hear noises from the avenue, other guests, deliveries. While overall is almost like other BWs but crappier. Service okay. Very uncomfortable pillows too.

BW Westminster is a very decent motel but sadly the reviews and website pictures make this place out to be much better than what it is. I chose it because of the reviews and now I wish I had stayed at the next door Best Western Regency Inn which was fabulous (we stayed there for 3 nights before, same price, closer to the beach!). We had no problems with BW, the service was pleasant enough, and we had a great stay at an affordable price. I especially enjoyed the bed and the cleaning staff was amazing. However, this place has a motel feel and could use a little love or new furniture. Especially the armchair and the bathroom need updating. On top of that, the breakfast options were very limited, there were only 3 tables to sit at (and therefore we had to carry our breafast to our
Manager Response: Thank you for giving us perfect ratings on Cleanliness and service.   actually we are the same distance to the beach, just different beach.  You are correct that it did get Crowded for breakfast during the time you stayed, sorry. We had sports teams with upto Four people in some rooms. we have revised our Breakfast timing from 6 to 9:30 am and longer if needed.

Summary: Rooms are large and comfortable. Front desk especially the assistant manager provides good sevice and has a can do attitude. Maid service is a hit or miss proposition and the morning coffee is often not hot.
Manager Response: Thank you for your survey. we did a complete assessment of Coffee temperature and you are correct that sometimes its not very Hot. we have made it better and will continue to improve. everyone appreciates you coming here as our regular customers, Thank you.

Summary: I was pleasantly surprised by the holiday decorations and the extra effort the staff took to make me feel at home while I was on the road this holiday season. I had a basic room that was as clean as I expected. They provided a great warm waffle for me, and even cooked it for me. Overall, it was a small boutique hotel that lived up to the Best Western standard and that provided me great value.
Manager Response: We keep the rooms clean and have checks to assure that. Our Christmas decorations became a big project and we enjoyed sharing it with all our Guests and Community. Thanks you for sharing your review

Summary Heading: Great, Affordable Lodging in a central location
Summary: Nothing short of an amazing experience! Wonderful staff with easy, quick check-in and check-out process.  HUGE, clean room (bigger than most 4 start hotels) with refrigerator, microwave, flatscreen tv and coffee.  Great location- just minutes from south orange county, Huntington Beach, Long Beach and major shopping centers. Easy and accessible parking! Affordable! Best of all, a great complimentary breakfast selection!
Manager Response: We appreciate your feedback, hope to see you back soon. we have just added Christmas lights with light music all over the Hotel and hope you get a chance to come back and  enjoy. Thank you. Jessica General Manager

Summary: This place did not look good as the picture in the web side. but, the Check-in & Check-out only take couple minutes and the room have a refrigerator, microwave, flat screen TV, comfortable beds... good enough if you just need a quiet place to sleep. The Continental Breakfast not too bad! It's like grab & go. We were too busy with the other plan, did not have time to check out the free high-speed internet, so we don't know how fast(or slow) it is.      The reason I gave this BW 3 stars because the door system is poor, we did not feel safe at all and the carpet have a lot stains on it
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. we have added the new RFID  entry System for all our rooms. It is keyless and may apear unsafe but it is the latest Technology and now being used in the Top Hotels.   We would love for you to comeback and try our Wi-Fi, Its free and the fastest in this area. sincerely Jessica General manager

Summary: There is nothing wrong with the BW Westminster, but I felt compelled to write because the over reviews and website pictures make this place out to be much better than what it is. If you are looking for a basic motel, no frills, this is the place for you. We had no problems, pleasant service, and a great stay at an affordable price. However, this place has a motel feel and could use a little updating/love. The bed was really comfy.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, we keep the rooms extra clean and create a Boutique look, sometimes we avoid the newer modern cold look, however we always listen to customers. Please visit us again and try our new free evening snacks with wine. sincerely Jessica General Manager

Summary Heading: Perfect location between Seal Beach and Tustin
Summary: Clean, quiet location. Friendly and helpful staff. Perfect location to be able to visit friends in Seal Beach and Whole Foods in Long Beach. Movie theaters close along with L & L BBQ. Westminster Blvd turns into 2nd street in Long Beach that provides a variety of restaurants to chose. Bed was very comfortable. Parking available close to room. Safe environment.
Manager Response: Thanks you, Glad you went to the long beach second street restaurants and visited Seal beach. They are two of my favourate places also. Next time try dog beach only three miles away or Huntington beach if you liked Seal beach.    Hope to see you again soon, sincerely Jessica  general Manager

Summary: I love this hotel everyone is so helpful and nice They really know the meaning of customer service.to top it off they went all out for the holidays. The place looks great.if in westminster I would give this place a chance it is the only  place I stay when in town
Manager Response: Thank you for the review, we also provide a no surprise hidden fee. lowest occupance Tax at 8%.  Free Wi-fi, parking, breakfast, telephone, HBO's, BBQ and now a glass of Wine in the evening. Hope to see you back, sincerely Jessica General Manager

Summary: The Best Western Westminster Inn is the place you are looking for. From the plush & very comftorable rooms, to the fabulous staff. Wireless Internet, 42 inch flat screen tv w/DVD player. Rooms w/kitchenetttes are available. The beds are very cumfy with fluffy pillows. The bathroom towels are even fluffy. (who doesn't like a fluffy towel?) You'll find the pool area inviting as well. Nice jacuzzi. There is even a BB-Q to cook up your own food if you wish. Short drives to Disney Land, Knotts Berry Farm, & other attractions in Anaheim. Huntington Beach (surf City U.S.A.) is but 6 miles away. They have a fabulous Street Fair on Tuesdays starting at noon. Good food is abundant in the area too. I just don't know why you would choose to stay anywhere else when visiting the Orange County

The property was a very nice hotel.. it was very clean and very quite. the room was very nice and clean. the bed was very comfortable and was able to sleep very easily. i also had a good view of the pool and the jacuzzi
Manager Response: Thanks for the survey and noticing our beds, We tripple sheet for extra Cleanliness. Hope to see you again, sincerely Jessica General Manager

Summary: The desk staff (day & night clerks both named Jessica) were great, friendly and helped us navigate our way through Westminster & directions to the best beaches & Long Beach nearby.  A one night stay turned into an additional night, which they charged the same internet rate the reservation was made.  Super clean hotel room.  No problems with feeling safe in the neighborhood at night.  Very comfortable beds & plenty of pillows.  Bathroom was very clean & plenty of fresh towels.  Balcony overlooking the pool was a plus.  Hot tub was just the right temperature & clean too.   Breakfast was well stocked & computer in lobby was very helpful in locating our next hotel as we were driving northbound up the coast.  I travel a lot and this was one of the best hotels I've stayed at -- Highly
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent staywith us.   Your opinion is very important to us. By telling us what you liked or disliked about your stay is how we are constantly able to improve. This helps the entire staff deliver a superior experience for all our future guests. We hope you will come back and see us again very soon.  If I can be of assistance in the future, please don't hesitate to contact me at 714-898-4043 .  Thank you again for taking the time to complete the survey. We appreciate your loyalty to our brand.  Sincerely,  Laurie Hill General Manager BEST WESTERN Westminster Inn

Summary: I have stayed in many hotels in Orange County and this was perfect for the price. We spent three nights in this hotel and enjoyed it very much. Our king room was large and extremely clean. The bed was very comfortable. Bathroom was large and clean. The pool and area surrounding it was pretty and so clean.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review regarding your recent stay at our property.   Your business is very important to us and we value your opinion. By telling us what you liked or disliked about your stay is how we continue to improve, you are helping us deliver a superior experience for you and all of our future guests. We hope you will come back and stay with us again soon!  If I can be of assistance in the future, please don't hesitate to contact me at 714-898-404  Again, thank you for time. We appreciate your loyalty to our brand.  Sincerely,  Laurie Hill General Manager BEST WESTERN Westminster Inn

Summary: I was moving to California and didn't really know anyone.  And I needed to find an apartment. The entire staff went out of their way to help me navigate in and around LA.  They directed me to the quickest routes, private beaches, and best places to eat.  The room had Clean sheets, bathroom was immaculate, and everything worked fine.  The cleaning staff were amazing and made sure I had everything I needed.    What a nice welcome to California.  I will definitely stay here again.  Thank you all so much!
Manager Response: we appreciate that you had a good experience with us. We also noticed that you are coming back. we have started the 5 pm snacktime with free wine so look forward to you joining us. sincerely Jessica  General manager

Summary: I stayed here a few years ago with my 2 teenage sons and had another fantastic return visit this year. We stayed for 5 nights and had a great time. We asked for a ground floor room near to the pool and were lucky enough to get one right near to reception which meant we could collect our breakfast and eat it outside our room and next to the pool.The food was good with a nice selection with coffee alaways available.
